summary.incident:
Mathias Honsak (Heidenheim) collects a sweet
pass and fires a low shot into the bottom
left corner. What a goal!

It is time for a substitution. Carlo Sickinger
(Elversberg) is on for Semih Sahin.

Budu Zivzivadze (Heidenheim) comes onto
the pitch after Marvin Pieringer signals
to the bench that he cannot continue any
longer after picking up an injury.

Robin Fellhauer (Elversberg) collects a
sweet pass and fires a low shot into the
bottom left corner. What a goal!

Omar Haktab Traore (Heidenheim) is awarded
a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't
seem to agree with the decision, but Sascha
Stegemann ignores the protests.

The goal by Elversberg is DISALLOWED on
the advice of the video assistant referee
due to an offside.

It must be a yellow card. It is. Luca Kerber
(Heidenheim) receives the caution after
an awful tackle.

Tom Zimmerschied (Elversberg) is booked
after bringing down an opponent. Sascha
Stegemann had an easy-decision to make.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Niklas Dorsch (Heidenheim)
is coming onto the pitch as Luca Kerber
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Frank Schmidt has decided to make a change.
Paul Wanner (Heidenheim) replaces Mathias
Honsak.

Sascha Stegemann shows a yellow card to
Paul Wanner (Heidenheim), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

Substitution. Luca Schnellbacher (Elversberg)
has come on for Tom Zimmerschied.

Leo Scienza (Heidenheim) wriggles his way
through the defence and unleashes an accurate
strike which goes inside the left post.
1:2.

It's time for a substitution. Manuel Feil
(Elversberg) comes on in place of Lukas
Petkov.

Horst Steffen decides to make a substitution.
Muhammed Damar will be replaced by Younes
Ebnoutalib (Elversberg).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Benedikt Gimber (Heidenheim)
comes onto the pitch for Leo Scienza.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Jonas
Fohrenbach (Heidenheim) for Frans Kratzig.

Goal! Lukas Petkov (Elversberg) shows good
awareness inside the box as he latches on
to a brilliant pass and fires a first-time
shot into the bottom right corner. Fisnik
Asllani assisted in the goal. 0:1.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Adrian Beck (Heidenheim) was quite harsh
and Sven Jablonski didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Goal! Tom Zimmerschied plays a pass to the
feet of Fisnik Asllani (Elversberg), and
he shoots into the bottom right corner from
inside the box. It's 0:2.

The referee looks satisfied after his VAR
review and duly disallows the goal for offside.
The Heidenheim players look gutted.

The need to improve in the second half has
brought about a change. Adrian Beck (Heidenheim)
comes off for Paul Wanner.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Frank Schmidt probably
wasn't satisfied with the performance of
Marvin Pieringer. He is replaced by Budu
Zivzivadze (Heidenheim).

Frank Schmidt has decided to make a substitution
during the half-time break. Leo Scienza
comes on the pitch for Niklas Dorsch (Heidenheim).

Goal! Tim Siersleben (Heidenheim) fires
the rebound low into the middle of the goal
after the ball breaks to him in the box.
The score is 1:2.

Goal! Mathias Honsak (Heidenheim) was in
the right place at the right time to get
to the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball low inside the left post.
It's 2:2.

Frank Schmidt has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Sirlord Conteh (Heidenheim) replacing
Mathias Honsak.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Robin Fellhauer departs
the field of play to be replaced by Carlo
Sickinger (Elversberg).

Horst Steffen has decided to make a change.
Luca Schnellbacher (Elversberg) replaces
Tom Zimmerschied.

Here is a change. Lukas Petkov is going
off and Horst Steffen gives the last tactical
orders to Frederik Schmahl (Elversberg).

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Fisnik Asllani as
he is replaced by Younes Ebnoutalib (Elversberg).

Phillip Tietz (Augsburg) changes the scoreline
after getting on the end of a brilliant
pass and firing a precise shot that goes
inside the right post!

Here comes a substitution. Marius Wolf is
given a rest as he is replaced by Robert
Gumny (Augsburg).

Jess Thorup has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Arne Maier (Augsburg) replacing
Alexis Claude-Maurice.

Steffen Baumgart prepares a substitution.
Josip Juranovic is replaced by Christopher
Trimmel (Union Berlin).

The manager makes a subsitution with Andrej
Ilic (Union Berlin) coming on for David
Preu.

Substitution. Andras Schafer leaves the
pitch and is replaced by Lucas Tousart (Union
Berlin).

Goal! Andrej Ilic (Union Berlin) was in
the right place at the right time to get
to the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball into the right side of the
goal. It's 1:1.

Jess Thorup decides to make a substitution.
Mert Komur will be replaced by Steve Mounie
(Augsburg).

Substitution. Frank Onyeka walks off the
pitch and Elvis Rexhbecaj (Augsburg) comes
on as a substitute.

The substitution is prepared. Fredrik Jensen
(Augsburg) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Cedric Zesiger.

Steffen Baumgart has decided to substitute
Tim Skarke and he is replaced by Marin Ljubicic
(Union Berlin).

A substitution has been made. Benedict Hollerbach
goes off and Laszlo Benes (Union Berlin)
comes on.

GOAL! A great pass finds Andrej Ilic (Union
Berlin) in acres of space after a fine counter
attack. He brings the ball under control
before firing it past the helpless keeper
from close range. It’s now 1:2.

Mohamed Amoura sends a precise lofted cross
into the box. Lukas Nmecha (Wolfsburg) latches
on to it and finishes with a quick shot
inside the right post. The goalkeeper had
no chance. The score changes to 0:1.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Andreas Skov Olsen (Wolfsburg)
replaces Patrick Wimmer.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Kevin Stoger (B. Monchengladbach) is replacing
Philipp Sander.

Gerardo Seoane decides to make a substitution.
Stefan Lainer will be replaced by Joe Scally
(B. Monchengladbach).

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Robin Hack walks off the pitch to be
replaced by Tomas Cvancara (B. Monchengladbach).

Here comes a substitution. Kevin Behrens
(Wolfsburg) is brought on as a substitute
for Lukas Nmecha.

Daniel Bauer has decided to make a change.
Bence Dardai (Wolfsburg) replaces Lovro
Majer.

The game has come to an end for Franck Honorat.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Florian Neuhaus (B. Monchengladbach).

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Rocco Reitz will be replaced by Shio Fukuda
(B. Monchengladbach).

It is time for a substitution. Sebastiaan
Bornauw (Wolfsburg) is on for Mohamed Amoura.

Goal! Serhou Guirassy (Dortmund) wins the
battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Thomas Dahne into left side
of the goal.

Carl Johansson (Holstein Kiel) receives
a red card after his horrific challenge
and is sent off!

The need to improve in the second half has
brought about a change. Lewis Holtby (Holstein
Kiel) comes off for Magnus Knudsen.

Marcel Rapp makes a half-time substitution.
Max Geschwill comes on in place of Steven
Skrzybski (Holstein Kiel).

Goal! Julian Brandt tees up Marcel Sabitzer
(Dortmund) on the edge of the box and he
fires the ball into the bottom left corner.
2:0.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Karim Adeyemi (Dortmund) was quite harsh
and Harm Osmers didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Shuto Machino trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Finn Porath
(Holstein Kiel).

Niko Kovac decides to make a substitution.
Karim Adeyemi will be replaced by Carney
Chukwuemeka (Dortmund).

Goal! Daniel Svensson tees up Felix Nmecha
(Dortmund) inside the box, and he keeps
his cool to find the bottom right corner.
3:0.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Phil Harres (Holstein
Kiel) will replace Alexander Bernhardsson.

Here is a change. Niklas Sule is going off
and Niko Kovac gives the last tactical orders
to Emre Can (Dortmund).

Niko Kovac has decided to make a change.
Giovanni Reyna (Dortmund) replaces Felix
Nmecha.

Substitution. Julian Brandt makes his way
off the pitch and Jamie Gittens (Dortmund)
comes on as his replacement.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Serhou Guirassy walks off the pitch
to be replaced by Julien Duranville (Dortmund).

Jamie Gittens (Dortmund) receives a yellow
card.

Nicolai Remberg (Holstein Kiel) is awarded
a yellow card. The referee showed him no
mercy.

Marcel Rapp has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Marko Ivezic (Holstein Kiel)
replacing Timo Becker.

Harm Osmers shows a yellow card to Marcel
Sabitzer (Dortmund) for his blatant foul.

That's a GOAL! The long throw is precisely
headed on by Matthias Ginter to teammate
Ritsu Doan (Freiburg), who coolly slots
home from close range. It's now 1:0.

Rasmus Kristensen (Eintracht Frankfurt)
is cautioned by the referee for a foul that
he committed a little earlier.

Ansgar Knauff (Eintracht Frankfurt) finishes
his beautiful individual effort with a superb
strike from inside the box. Noah Atubolu
is just a bystander as the ball flies into
the bottom left corner. The score is 1:1.

Max Rosenfelder (Freiburg) receives a yellow
card from the referee for a foul that he
committed a little earlier.

Rasmus Kristensen (Eintracht Frankfurt)
strikes the ball towards goal from the edge
of the penalty box and it goes straight
inside the left post!

Goal! Ellyes Skhiri (Eintracht Frankfurt)
gets a shot away from inside the box and
the effort is deflected past the goalkeeper.
1:3.

Substitution. Oscar Hojlund (Eintracht Frankfurt)
on for Fares Chaibi.

Here is a change. Max Rosenfelder is going
off and Julian Schuster gives the last tactical
orders to Lukas Kubler (Freiburg).

Ansgar Knauff (Eintracht Frankfurt) picked
up a yellow card for saying too much to
the referee.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Michael
Gregoritsch (Freiburg) for Junior Adamu.

Julian Schuster has decided to substitute
Jordy Makengo and he is replaced by Christian
Gunter (Freiburg).

Substitution. Johan Manzambi (Freiburg)
leaves the pitch and is replaced by Merlin
Rohl.

Dino Toppmoller is forced to make a change.
Ellyes Skhiri is unable to continue due
to injury, Aurele Amenda (Eintracht Frankfurt)
comes on.

Benjamin Brand shows a yellow card to Philipp
Lienhart (Freiburg) for his blatant foul.

Substitution. Ansgar Knauff walks off the
pitch and Elye Wahi (Eintracht Frankfurt)
comes on as a substitute.

Dino Toppmoller decides to make a substitution.
Hugo Ekitike will be replaced by Michy Batshuayi
(Eintracht Frankfurt).

Nnamdi Collins (Eintracht Frankfurt) takes
his opponent down and receives a yellow
card from the referee.

It's a yellow card for Nathaniel Brown (Eintracht
Frankfurt).

Goal! Romano Schmid (Werder Bremen) runs
up to the ball, stops and waits for Kevin
Muller to commit before slotting the penalty
into the bottom left corner.

Goal! The corner is whipped in and Jens
Stage (Werder Bremen) is in the right place
at the right time, planting his header perfectly
into the left side of the goal. He makes
it 0:2.

What was Omar Haktab Traore (Heidenheim)
thinking? He will not get away with that.
The referee shows him a yellow card.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Frank Schmidt probably
wasn't satisfied with the performance of
Jan Schoppner. He is replaced by Luca Kerber
(Heidenheim).

Here is a change after the half-time break.
Niklas Dorsch is replaced by Julian Niehues
(Heidenheim).

Half-time substitution. Benedikt Gimber
is replaced by Budu Zivzivadze (Heidenheim).

Frank Schmidt makes a half-time substitution.
Leo Scienza (Heidenheim) comes on in place
of Adrian Beck.

Jens Stage (Werder Bremen) has tested the
patience of referee Tobias Welz and goes
into the book for a previous late challenge.

A yellow-coloured card is received by Julian
Niehues (Heidenheim).

Goal! Marvin Ducksch (Werder Bremen) is
teed up on the edge of the box by Mitchell
Weiser, and his howitzer of a shot into
the top right corner gives the keeper no
chance. 0:3.

Ole Werner has decided to substitute Felix
Agu and he is replaced by Derrick Kohn (Werder
Bremen).

Substitution. Justin Njinmah (Werder Bremen)
receives a signal from the referee and is
now allowed to enter the pitch as Marco
Grull walks off.

The referee signals a substitution. Leonardo
Bittencourt (Werder Bremen) is brought on
as a substitute for Jens Stage.

Here is a change. Mathias Honsak is going
off and Frank Schmidt gives the last tactical
orders to Jonas Fohrenbach (Heidenheim).

Luca Kerber (Heidenheim) finds his way to
a cross from the corner kick and heads it
in via a deflection off the top of the left
post. There was absolutely nothing Michael
Zetterer could do with it. The score changes
to 1:3.

The referee gives a yellow card to Amos
Pieper (Werder Bremen) for talking back.
He must be careful for the remainder of
the match.

Leo Scienza (Heidenheim) has to be very
careful for the rest of the match after
receiving a yellow card from the referee
for a bad tackle on an opponent.

Here comes a substitution. Marvin Ducksch
is given a rest as he is replaced by Keke
Topp (Werder Bremen).

Ole Werner prepares a substitution. Amos
Pieper is replaced by Anthony Jung (Werder
Bremen).

Keke Topp (Werder Bremen) receives a delightful
pass inside the box and smashes a low shot
into the bottom right corner. What a clinical
finish!

Michael Olise (Bayern Munich) can showcase
his brilliant free kick ability, particularly
from a distance like this. He hits the ball
perfectly and it ends up inside the right
post.

Half-time substitution. Alexander Prass
will not participate anymore and Marius
Bulter (Hoffenheim) is coming on.

Goal! Michael Olise plays it to Joshua Kimmich
(Bayern Munich), whose deflected shot from
inside the box goes past the helpless Oliver
Baumann. 0:2.

The substitution is prepared. Leroy Sane
joins the action as a substitute, replacing
Kingsley Coman (Bayern Munich).

That will be all from Thomas Muller (Bayern
Munich) who is being replaced by the fresh
legs of Harry Kane.

Substitution. Leon Goretzka has come on
for Raphael Guerreiro (Bayern Munich).

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Konrad Laimer (Bayern Munich) walks
off the pitch to be replaced by Sacha Boey.

Christian Ilzer prepares a substitution.
Tom Bischof (Hoffenheim) is replaced by
Bazoumana Toure.

A substitution has been made. Dennis Geiger
is replaced by Umut Tohumcu (Hoffenheim).

Goal! Harry Kane pulls the ball back for
Serge Gnabry (Bayern Munich) on the edge
of the box, and he beats the keeper with
a fine strike into the bottom right corner.
0:3.

Christian Ilzer has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Finn Ole Becker (Hoffenheim)
replacing Anton Stach.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Andrej Kramaric as
he is replaced by Ihlas Bebou (Hoffenheim).

Goal! A great through ball by Sacha Boey
sets up Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) inside
the box, and he makes no mistake and bangs
the ball into the top right corner. 0:4.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Eric Dier trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Gabriel Vidovic
(Bayern Munich).

The referee looks satisfied after his VAR
review and duly disallows the goal for offside.
The Mainz players look gutted.

Problems for Xabi Alonso as Alejandro Grimaldo
is not able to play anymore. His injury
is too serious and Arthur (Bayer Leverkusen)
replaces him.

The goal by Mainz is DISALLOWED on the advice
of the video assistant referee due to a
foul.

A superb goal from great team play! Paul
Nebel (Mainz) latches on to a perfect pass
and fires an excellent low shot inside the
right post. There is nothing a goalkeeper
can do about shots like that.

Stefan Bell (Mainz) has received a yellow
card for his foul.

The foul by Exequiel Palacios (Bayer Leverkusen)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Tobias Reichel.

Tobias Reichel shows a yellow card to Aleix
Garcia (Bayer Leverkusen), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Robert Andrich (Bayer Leverkusen)
comes onto the pitch for Jonas Hofmann.

Half-time substitution. Nathan Tella will
not participate anymore and Amine Adli (Bayer
Leverkusen) is coming on.

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Patrik Schick (Bayer Leverkusen) low
into the right of the net, giving goalkeeper
Robin Zentner no chance!

Goal! Aleix Garcia plays a neat lofted pass
into the box for Patrik Schick (Bayer Leverkusen),
who beats the defender in the air and plants
a header into the left side of the goal
from close range. 1:2.

Tobias Reichel shows a yellow card to Piero
Hincapie (Bayer Leverkusen) for a tough
tackle.

Goal! Lukas Hradecky gets a hand on the
penalty from Jonathan Burkardt (Mainz),
but can't stop it from flying inside the
right post.

Tobias Reichel shows the yellow card to
Arthur (Bayer Leverkusen) for a heavy challenge.

Xabi Alonso (Bayer Leverkusen) gets a yellow
card, off the field.

Bo Henriksen is forced to make an unplanned
substitution as Anthony Caci suffers an
injury and Nikolas Veratschnig (Mainz) comes
on.

Andreas Hanche-Olsen (Mainz) can't expect
anything else than a yellow card for his
hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Tobias
Reichel didn't think twice about pulling
it out of his pocket.

Today's referee Tobias Reichel rightly decides
to book Jonathan Tah (Bayer Leverkusen)
for his harsh tackle.

The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate
this behaviour. Florian Wirtz (Bayer Leverkusen)
is given a yellow card.

That will be all from Aleix Garcia who is
being replaced by the fresh legs of Emiliano
Buendia (Bayer Leverkusen).

Bo Henriksen has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Silvan Widmer (Mainz) replacing
Phillipp Mwene.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Jonathan Burkardt will be replaced by Nelson
Weiper (Mainz).

After what seems an eternity, referee Tobias
Reichel decides there was a handball after
using VAR to review the goal! NO GOAL for
Mainz, play to continue.

GOAL! Xavi Simons (RB Leipzig) finishes
off a sublime move with a delightful back-heel
goal. Ridle Baku provided the assist with
a brilliant pass. 1:0.

Goal! Deniz Undav (VfB Stuttgart) finds
some space in the penalty area after latching
onto a cross and finds the back of the net
with a sweet header!

What was Tidiam Gomis (RB Leipzig) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee
shows him a yellow card.

Ridle Baku (RB Leipzig) is the lucky recipient
of a rebound. He takes advantage of it and
powers the ball into the roof of the net,
leaving the goalkeeper completely helpless.

The score has changed – 2:2. Maximilian
Mittelstadt sends a fantastic cross into
the box from the corner. Nick Woltemade
(VfB Stuttgart) jumps highest and plants
a header inside the right post.

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to make a
change. Ermedin Demirovic (VfB Stuttgart)
replaces Jamie Leweling.

Zsolt Low has decided to substitute Tidiam
Gomis (RB Leipzig) and he is replaced by
Yussuf Poulsen.

Substitution. Chris Fuhrich (VfB Stuttgart)
in, Maximilian Mittelstadt out.

Substitution. Nikolas Nartey on for Enzo
Millot (VfB Stuttgart).

Antonio Nusa (RB Leipzig) will be replaced
by Lois Openda.

Here is a change. Arthur Vermeeren is going
off and Zsolt Low gives the last tactical
orders to Christoph Baumgartner (RB Leipzig).

Deniz Undav passes to Ermedin Demirovic
(VfB Stuttgart), who collects the ball and
unleashes a terrific shot from the edge
of the box. His effort goes into the bottom
left corner. Fabulous goal! The score is
2:3.

The referee looks satisfied after his VAR
review and duly disallows the goal due to
a foul. The RB Leipzig players look gutted.

Here comes a substitution. Jacob Bruun Larsen
(VfB Stuttgart) is brought on as a substitute
for Nick Woltemade.

Sebastian Hoeness prepares a substitution.
Luca Jaquez is replaced by Finn Jeltsch
(VfB Stuttgart).

Zsolt Low is forced to make a change. Yussuf
Poulsen is unable to continue due to injury,
Benjamin Sesko (RB Leipzig) comes on.

Myron Boadu (Bochum) displays great tekkers
inside the box leading to a fantastic goal,
leaving the goalkeeper stranded.

Siebe Van Der Heyden is unable to continue
after that nasty looking head injury. Alexander
Blessin ushers on Lars Ritzka (St. Pauli)
to replace him.

Alexander Blessin makes a half-time substitution.
Noah Weisshaupt (St. Pauli) comes on in
place of Oladapo Afolayan.

Ibrahima Sissoko (Bochum) is being substituted
because of an injury. Dieter Hecking sends
Anthony Losilla on the pitch.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Johannes Eggestein (St. Pauli) is replacing
Danel Sinani.

Alexander Blessin has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Adam Dzwigala (St. Pauli)
replacing Manolis Saliakas.

GOAL! Myron Boadu (Bochum) runs onto a pass
from Felix Passlack after great counter
attacking play and hits a fine first-time
shot into the net from close range. It’s
now 0:2.

Alexander Blessin decides to make a substitution.
Morgan Guilavogui will be replaced by Scott
Banks (St. Pauli).

Substitution. Mats Pannewig makes way for
Dani de Wit (Bochum).

We are about to witness a subsitution. Moritz
Broschinski (Bochum) for Myron Boadu.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Georgios Masouras leaves
the pitch and Koji Miyoshi (Bochum) comes
on.

Dieter Hecking has decided to substitute
Jakov Medic and he is replaced by Kacper
Koscierski (Bochum).

Goal! Atakan Karazor (VfB Stuttgart) was
in the right place at the right time to
get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball low into the middle of the
net. It's 1:0.

Angelo Stiller is substituted due to injury.
Sebastian Hoeness gives a chance to Yannik
Keitel (VfB Stuttgart).

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to make a
change. Luca Jaquez (VfB Stuttgart) replaces
Finn Jeltsch.

Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart) comes onto the
pitch because Yannik Keitel simply cannot
continue any longer after picking up an
injury.

Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Timo Gerach had
an easy-decision to make.

Goal! Nick Woltemade (VfB Stuttgart) is
teed up on the edge of the box by Enzo Millot,
and his howitzer of a shot inside the left
post gives the keeper no chance. 2:0.

The substitution has been made. Henri Koudossou
(Augsburg) has replaced Robert Gumny.

Jess Thorup prepares a substitution. Mert
Komur is replaced by Arne Maier (Augsburg).

Here comes a substitution. Jamie Leweling
(VfB Stuttgart) is given a rest as he is
replaced by Ermedin Demirovic.

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to substitute
Pascal Stenzel and he is replaced by Josha
Vagnoman (VfB Stuttgart).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Phillip Tietz (Augsburg)
comes onto the pitch for Alexis Claude-Maurice.

Goal! Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart) pounced
on a loose ball inside the box and beats
the goalkeeper with a shot inside the left
post. He makes it 3:0.

Jess Thorup has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Elvis Rexhbecaj (Augsburg) replacing
Frank Onyeka.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Dimitrios Giannoulis (Augsburg) was quite
harsh and Timo Gerach didn't hesitate to
show him a yellow card.

Goal! Chris Fuhrich clips a neat ball into
the box in the direction of Ermedin Demirovic
(VfB Stuttgart), who jumps highest and steers
a bullet header from the centre of the box
into the bottom left corner. Finn Dahmen
had no chance of stopping that. 4:0.

Rasmus Kristensen (Eintracht Frankfurt)
collects a killer pass inside the box that
puts him one-on-one against the goalkeeper.
He scores, drilling a low drive deep inside
the left post!

Manolis Saliakas (St. Pauli) receives an
accurate low pass inside the box and slams
the ball home into the top left corner.
The goalkeeper was helpless.

Morgan Guilavogui (St. Pauli) runs on to
a clever pass from Ben Alexander Voll and
finds himself one-on-one with the keeper.
He still has work to do but finishes with
aplomb into the back of the net.

Dino Toppmoller has decided to make a substitution
during the half-time break. Michy Batshuayi
(Eintracht Frankfurt) comes on the pitch
for Jean-Matteo Bahoya.

The manager has been forced to make a substitution
and the injured Philipp Treu limps off the
pitch to be replaced by Adam Dzwigala (St.
Pauli).

Dino Toppmoller is forced to make a change.
Tuta is not able to carry on due to injury.
He is replaced by Can Yilmaz Uzun (Eintracht
Frankfurt).

Substitution. Fares Chaibi (Eintracht Frankfurt)
receives a signal from the referee and is
now allowed to enter the pitch as Ellyes
Skhiri walks off.

Michy Batshuayi (Eintracht Frankfurt) has
acres of space after latching on to a precise
pass into the box. He doesn't hesitate to
release a low effort which ends up in the
bottom right corner.

Alexander Blessin prepares a substitution.
Oladapo Afolayan is replaced by Noah Weisshaupt
(St. Pauli).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Eric Smith (St. Pauli) was quite harsh
and Christian Dingert didn't hesitate to
show him a yellow card.

Dino Toppmoller has decided to substitute
Ansgar Knauff and he is replaced by Nnamdi
Collins (Eintracht Frankfurt).

Here comes a substitution. Connor Metcalfe
(St. Pauli) is brought on as a substitute
for Morgan Guilavogui.

Here is a change. Lars Ritzka is going off
and Alexander Blessin gives the last tactical
orders to Robert Wagner (St. Pauli).

Arthur Theate (Eintracht Frankfurt) violates
the laws of the game and is shown a deserved
yellow card by the referee.

Rasmus Kristensen (Eintracht Frankfurt)
makes it easy for the referee to show him
a yellow card.

Ben Alexander Voll (St. Pauli) gives the
referee no choice but to show him a yellow
card.

away_team:
Van Der Heyden S.
Red Card

summary.incident:
Pascal Gross (Dortmund) violates the laws
of the game and is shown a deserved yellow
card by the referee.

Goal! Jeremie Frimpong (Bayer Leverkusen)
finds himself some space inside the box
to get on the end of a pass from Florian
Wirtz, then sends ball into the top left
corner. 1:0.

Goal - 1:1! Karim Adeyemi tees up Julian
Brandt (Dortmund) inside the box and he
rolls the ball into the bottom left corner
and past Lukas Hradecky.

Goal - 1:2! Julian Ryerson (Dortmund) gets
a shot away from the edge of the box and
scores into the bottom left corner. Pascal
Gross provided an assist for the goal.

This is a yellow card! Felix Nmecha (Dortmund)
is not happy with the decision, but from
our point of view it was clear.

Niko Kovac makes a half-time substitution.
Marcel Sabitzer comes on in place of Felix
Nmecha (Dortmund).

Substitution. Nathan Tella will be replaced
by Jonas Hofmann (Bayer Leverkusen).

Xabi Alonso prepares a substitution. Amine
Adli is replaced by Patrik Schick (Bayer
Leverkusen).

It's time for a substitution. Exequiel Palacios
(Bayer Leverkusen) comes on in place of
Robert Andrich.

Karim Adeyemi (Dortmund) with a wonderful
piece of finishing. He makes a yard for
himself after a well-taken pass inside the
box and nets under the crossbar.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Karim Adeyemi trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Emre Can (Dortmund).

Serhou Guirassy (Dortmund) strikes the ball
towards goal from the edge of the penalty
box and it goes straight inside the left
post!

Xabi Alonso has decided to substitute Granit
Xhaka and he is replaced by Aleix Garcia
(Bayer Leverkusen).

We are about to witness a subsitution. Arthur
(Bayer Leverkusen) for Piero Hincapie.

Substitution. Pascal Gross makes way for
Salih Ozcan (Dortmund).

Niko Kovac has decided to make a change.
Yan Couto (Dortmund) replaces Julian Ryerson.

Substitution. Jamie Gittens (Dortmund) on
for Julian Brandt.

Goal! Jonas Hofmann (Bayer Leverkusen) ran
onto a clever lofted pass from Florian Wirtz
and easily beat the keeper with a header
into the left side of the goal from close
range. 2:4.

Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) scores with a
bullet of a header that goes into the top
left corner!

Gerardo Seoane prepares a substitution.
Nico Elvedi is replaced by Joe Scally (B.
Monchengladbach).

Sven Jablonski shows a yellow card to Julian
Weigl (B. Monchengladbach) for his blatant
foul.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Leroy Sane (Bayern Munich)
will replace Kingsley Coman.

Vincent Kompany has decided to substitute
Josip Stanisic and he is replaced by Aleksandar
Pavlovic (Bayern Munich).

Today's match ends for Philipp Sander who
will be replaced by Alassane Plea (B. Monchengladbach).

Gerardo Seoane has decided to make a change.
Kevin Stoger (B. Monchengladbach) replaces
Robin Hack.

Substitution. Franck Honorat will be replaced
by Tomas Cvancara (B. Monchengladbach).

Raphael Guerreiro comes off the pitch to
be replaced by Joao Palhinha (Bayern Munich).

Here is a change. Thomas Muller is going
off and Vincent Kompany gives the last tactical
orders to Serge Gnabry (Bayern Munich).

Substitution. Rocco Reitz makes his way
off the pitch and Florian Neuhaus (B. Monchengladbach)
comes on as his replacement.

Goal! Leroy Sane shows great vision to find
Michael Olise (Bayern Munich) with a cheeky
pass inside the box, and his first-time
shot is precise and sails into the bottom
left corner. 2:0.

Michael Olise (Bayern Munich) is shown a
yellow card by the referee for making a
challenge on his opponent, but he looks
angry with the decision.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Harry Kane will be replaced by Gabriel Vidovic
(Bayern Munich).

Nadiem Amiri (Mainz) can showcase his brilliant
free kick ability, particularly from a distance
like this. He hits the ball perfectly and
it ends up in the roof of the net.

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Dieter
Hecking gives a chance to Gerrit Holtmann
and Felix Passlack (Bochum) is off.

Half-time substitution. Tom Krauss (Bochum)
is replaced by Mats Pannewig.

It will be a substitution. Dani de Wit (Bochum)
is ready to enter the pitch as Matus Bero
walks off.

Goal! Phillipp Mwene (Mainz) takes a short
pass from Jae-Sung Lee in his stride in
the box, jinks inside his man and unleashes
an unstoppable shot into the bottom left
corner. 0:2.

That's the end of the game for Phillipp
Mwene, who is replaced by Silvan Widmer
(Mainz).

Bo Henriksen has decided to make a change.
Hyun-Seok Hong (Mainz) replaces Jae-Sung
Lee.

Ibrahima Sissoko (Bochum) sees a yellow
card from Tobias Stieler after he sent one
of the opposing players to the ground.

Dieter Hecking prepares a substitution.
Ibrahima Sissoko is replaced by Anthony
Losilla (Bochum).

Substitution. Cristian Gamboa (Bochum) has
come on for Tim Oermann.

Jonathan Burkardt (Mainz) scores! He latches
on to a pass and produces a perfect strike
from the edge of the box. The ball goes
into the bottom right corner and past the
goalkeeper.

Ivan Ordets (Bochum) can't expect anything
else than a yellow card for his hard tackle.
And a yellow it is. Tobias Stieler didn't
think twice about pulling it out of his
pocket.

Gerrit Holtmann (Bochum) takes a great first
touch to control a killer pass on the edge
of the box and drills a shot into the bottom
right corner in trademark fashion.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Stefan Bell departs the
field of play to be replaced by Nikolas
Veratschnig (Mainz).

Bo Henriksen decides to make a substitution.
Jonathan Burkardt will be replaced by Lennard
Maloney (Mainz).

That will be all from Nadiem Amiri who is
being replaced by the fresh legs of Nelson
Weiper (Mainz).

Paul Nebel (Mainz) received a delightful
pass inside the box before slotting the
ball past the goalkeeper. What a brilliant
finish!

Lasse Rosenboom (Holstein Kiel) receives
a precise pass inside the box from Shuto
Machino and he beats the goalkeeper with
a neat finish into the left side of the
net. 1:0.

Goal! Johan Manzambi (Freiburg) slots the
ball into an unguarded net from close range
after a shot rebounds off a defender. 1:1.

Julian Schuster has made a change at the
break. Lucas Holer (Freiburg) has come on
in place of Johan Manzambi.

Lucas Holer (Freiburg) receives a delightful
pass inside the box and smashes a precise
shot inside the right post. What a lovely
finish!

Lasse Rosenboom will be replaced by Phil
Harres (Holstein Kiel).

Armin Gigovic (Holstein Kiel) can't expect
anything else than a yellow card for his
hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Robert
Schroder didn't think twice about pulling
it out of his pocket.

Finn Porath (Holstein Kiel) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing John Tolkin.

Julian Schuster has decided to substitute
Vincenzo Grifo and he is replaced by Christian
Gunter (Freiburg).

A substitution has been made. Max Rosenfelder
is replaced by Lukas Kubler (Freiburg).

It is time for a substitution. Lewis Holtby
(Holstein Kiel) is on for Armin Gigovic.

Marcel Rapp has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Benedikt Pichler (Holstein Kiel)
replacing Carl Johansson.

Julian Schuster prepares a substitution.
Ritsu Doan is replaced by Nicolas Hofler
(Freiburg).

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Junior Adamu will be replaced by Kiliann
Sildillia (Freiburg).

Adrian Beck (Heidenheim) has acres of space
after latching on to a precise pass into
the box. He doesn't hesitate to release
a low effort which ends up in the middle
of the net.

Leopold Querfeld (Union Berlin) takes his
opponent down and receives a yellow card
from the referee.

Substitution. Andrej Ilic walks off the
pitch and Marin Ljubicic (Union Berlin)
comes on as a substitute.

Jan Schoppner (Heidenheim) finishes his
beautiful individual effort with a superb
strike from inside the box. Frederik Ronnow
is just a bystander as the ball flies low
into the middle of the goal. The score is
0:2.

The referee looks satisfied after his VAR
review and duly disallows the goal for offside.
The Union Berlin players look gutted.

Janik Haberer (Union Berlin) receives a
yellow card from the referee for a foul
that he committed a little earlier.

Substitution. Josip Juranovic (Union Berlin)
on for Tom Rothe.

Steffen Baumgart prepares a substitution.
Christopher Trimmel is replaced by David
Preu (Union Berlin).

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Kevin Vogt as he is
replaced by Tim Skarke (Union Berlin).

We are about to witness a subsitution. Andras
Schafer (Union Berlin) for Laszlo Benes.

Adrian Beck (Heidenheim) receives a well-taken
defence-splitting pass inside the box and
scores! He buries the ball into the bottom
left corner.

A substitution has been made. Niklas Dorsch
goes off and Marnon Busch (Heidenheim) comes
on.

Frank Schmidt decides to make a substitution.
Adrian Beck will be replaced by Mathias
Honsak (Heidenheim).

Today's match ends for Omar Haktab Traore
who will be replaced by Luca Kerber (Heidenheim).

That's the end of the game for Marvin Pieringer,
who is replaced by Budu Zivzivadze (Heidenheim).

Frank Schmidt has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Julian Niehues (Heidenheim) replacing
Jan Schoppner.

Lukas Klostermann (RB Leipzig) picks up
a yellow card for a foul.

Today's referee Bastian Dankert rightly
decides to book Marco Friedl (Werder Bremen)
for his harsh tackle.

Arthur Vermeeren (RB Leipzig) fouls his
opponent and receives a yellow card from
the referee, but he is clearly not happy
with the decision.

Today's match ends for Benjamin Sesko who
will be replaced by Antonio Nusa (RB Leipzig).

Zsolt Low has decided to make a change.
Yussuf Poulsen (RB Leipzig) replaces Lois
Openda.

A yellow card for a tackle by Kosta Nedeljkovic
(RB Leipzig). Bastian Dankert doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Substitution. Felix Agu makes way for Derrick
Kohn (Werder Bremen).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Marco Grull (Werder Bremen)
replaces Oliver Burke.

Zsolt Low has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Ridle Baku (RB Leipzig) replacing
Christoph Baumgartner.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Senne Lynen as he
is replaced by Leonardo Bittencourt (Werder
Bremen).

The substitution has been made. Tidiam Gomis
(RB Leipzig) has replaced Arthur Vermeeren.

Ole Werner decides to make a substitution.
Mitchell Weiser will be replaced by Justin
Njinmah (Werder Bremen).

This is definitely not what Leo Ostigard
(Hoffenheim) wanted. Attempting to intercept
an offensive pass, he scored an own goal
and made it 1:0.

Marius Bulter sends a precise lofted cross
into the box. Pavel Kaderabek (Hoffenheim)
latches on to it and finishes with a quick
shot into the top right corner. The goalkeeper
had no chance. The score changes to 1:1.

A yellow card for a tackle by Anton Stach
(Hoffenheim). Matthias Jollenbeck doesn't
hesitate at all to make this decision.

Daniel Bauer makes a switch. Andreas Skov
Olsen (Wolfsburg) is coming on in place
of Aster Vranckx at the start of the second
period.

The game is over for Jakub Kaminski. Lovro
Majer (Wolfsburg) comes on for the second
half.

Problems for Daniel Bauer as Kilian Fischer
is not able to play anymore. His injury
is too serious and Mads Roerslev Rasmussen
(Wolfsburg) replaces him.

That's the end of the game for Bazoumana
Toure, who is replaced by Haris Tabakovic
(Hoffenheim).

Daniel Bauer has decided to make a change.
Lukas Nmecha (Wolfsburg) replaces Patrick
Wimmer.

Matthias Jollenbeck shows a yellow card
to Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) for his
blatant foul.

Jonas Wind (Wolfsburg) jumped highest to
meet a perfectly executed corner kick by
Lovro Majer. His header was precise and
ended up in the back of the net, leaving
the goalkeeper flapping in the wind. The
score is 2:1.

What a finish by Marius Bulter (Hoffenheim)!
He latches on to a cross inside the penalty
area, takes a good first touch, pulls the
trigger and the cannon of a shot ricochets
off the right post into the bottom corner.

Finn Ole Becker (Hoffenheim) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Tom Bischof.

Daniel Bauer has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Tiago Tomas (Wolfsburg) replacing
Mohamed Amoura.

Here is a change. Andrej Kramaric is going
off and Christian Ilzer gives the last tactical
orders to Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim).

Dominik Kohr (Mainz) is substituted due
to injury. Bo Henriksen gives a chance to
Stefan Bell.

It's in the back of the net! Superb finishing
from Rasmus Kristensen (Eintracht Frankfurt).
Hugo Ekitike plays a fantastic through ball
and finds Rasmus Kristensen (Eintracht Frankfurt),
who reacts quickly to get in front of the
goalkeeper and fire a close-range shot into
the bottom right corner. 0:1.

Bo Henriksen is forced to make a change.
Danny da Costa is not able to carry on due
to injury. He is replaced by Silvan Widmer
(Mainz).

Celebrations are cut short for Mainz as
the referee indicates NO GOAL after the
VAR review shows it was offside!

Jonathan Burkardt (Mainz) gets on the end
of a delightful cross and sends the ball
inside the right post!

Nadiem Amiri (Mainz) gives the referee no
choice but to show him a yellow card.

Substitution. Jean-Matteo Bahoya walks off
the pitch and Fares Chaibi (Eintracht Frankfurt)
comes on as a substitute.

Dino Toppmoller decides to make a substitution.
Ansgar Knauff will be replaced by Can Yilmaz
Uzun (Eintracht Frankfurt).

Substitution. Hyun-Seok Hong (Mainz) replaces
Anthony Caci.

Bo Henriksen has decided to make a change.
Nelson Weiper (Mainz) replaces Phillipp
Mwene.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Nikolas Veratschnig (Mainz)
will replace Jae-Sung Lee.

Here comes a substitution. Niels Nkounkou
(Eintracht Frankfurt) is brought on as a
substitute for Nathaniel Brown.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Hugo Ekitike walks off the pitch to
be replaced by Michy Batshuayi (Eintracht
Frankfurt).

The foul by Johan Manzambi (Freiburg) is
worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown
by Daniel Siebert.

Goal! That was a fantastic finish by Maximilian
Eggestein (Freiburg) from just outside the
box. He wasted little time in getting away
a bullet of a shot that flew past the goalkeeper
into the top left corner of the net.

Here is an example of luck not being on
your side. A slightly disorientated Piero
Hincapie (Bayer Leverkusen) puts the ball
into his own net.

That's the end of the game for Edmond Tapsoba,
who is replaced by Arthur (Bayer Leverkusen).

Xabi Alonso has decided to make a change.
Exequiel Palacios (Bayer Leverkusen) replaces
Aleix Garcia.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Emiliano Buendia leaves
the pitch and Amine Adli (Bayer Leverkusen)
comes on.

Amine Adli (Bayer Leverkusen) sees a yellow
card from Daniel Siebert after he sent one
of the opposing players to the ground.

A substitution has been made. Max Rosenfelder
goes off and Lukas Kubler (Freiburg) comes
on.

Julian Schuster has decided to substitute
Johan Manzambi and he is replaced by Merlin
Rohl (Freiburg).

Substitution. Jeremie Frimpong is replaced
by Nathan Tella (Bayer Leverkusen).

Here is a change. Ritsu Doan is going off
and Julian Schuster gives the last tactical
orders to Jan-Niklas Beste (Freiburg).

Florian Wirtz (Bayer Leverkusen) scores!
He latches on to a pass and produces a perfect
strike from the edge of the box that goes
inside the left post and past the goalkeeper.

Today's referee Daniel Siebert rightly decides
to book Alejandro Grimaldo (Bayer Leverkusen)
for his harsh tackle.

Here comes a substitution. Kiliann Sildillia
(Freiburg) is brought on as a substitute
for Vincenzo Grifo.

Jonathan Tah (Bayer Leverkusen) heads the
ball low inside the right post after a splendid
cross. This timely header produces a wonderful
moment.

Goal! Shuto Machino (Holstein Kiel) puts
the ball into the right side of the goal
past the outstretched arm of Finn Dahmen.

Marcel Rapp is forced to make a change.
Shuto Machino (Holstein Kiel) is unable
to continue due to injury, Phil Harres comes
on.

What a finish by Alexander Bernhardsson
(Holstein Kiel)! He rises high to get to
a rebound and produces a long-range header
from inside the box which goes into the
roof of the net. The goalkeeper was unable
to stop the ball from hitting the net.

Goal! Alexander Bernhardsson (Holstein Kiel)
takes a short pass from Steven Skrzybski
in his stride in the box, jinks inside his
man and unleashes an unstoppable shot inside
the left post. 0:3.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Cedric Zesiger as
he is replaced by Phillip Tietz (Augsburg).

Jess Thorup has decided to substitute Marius
Wolf and he is replaced by Henri Koudossou
(Augsburg).

Here comes a substitution. Magnus Knudsen
(Holstein Kiel) is brought on as a substitute
for Alexander Bernhardsson.

Substitution. Mert Komur will be replaced
by Arne Maier (Augsburg).

Jess Thorup decides to make a substitution.
Samuel Essende will be replaced by Steve
Mounie (Augsburg).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Marvin Schulz (Holstein
Kiel) comes onto the pitch for Armin Gigovic.

Marcel Rapp has decided to make a change.
Jann-Fiete Arp (Holstein Kiel) replaces
Steven Skrzybski.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Elvis Rexhbecaj (Augsburg)
will replace Frank Onyeka.

Jann-Fiete Arp (Holstein Kiel) is booked
after bringing down an opponent. Harm Osmers
had an easy-decision to make.

Phillip Tietz fires in a promising shot
which ricochets off the goalkeeper back
to Steve Mounie (Augsburg) inside the box.
He releases a quick shot into the right
side of the goal. The score is 1:3.

Harm Osmers shows a yellow card to Nicolai
Remberg (Holstein Kiel) for his blatant
foul. Nicolai Remberg (Holstein Kiel) will
miss the next game because of that yellow
card.

Serhou Guirassy (Dortmund) receives a well-taken
defence-splitting low pass inside the box
and scores! His great effort makes its way
into the bottom right corner of the net.

Kilian Fischer (Wolfsburg) makes it easy
for the referee to show him a yellow card.

It's a goal! Pascal Gross plays the ball
to the feet of Serhou Guirassy (Dortmund),
who hits a tremendous first-time shot inside
the right post. The goalkeeper was unable
to keep it out. 2:0.

A substitution has been made. Jamie Gittens
is replaced by Karim Adeyemi (Dortmund).

An amazing individual effort from Karim
Adeyemi (Dortmund) ends with a strike from
inside the penalty area. He sends the ball
precisely into the top right corner and
makes it 3:0. Kamil Grabara was helpless.

Ralph Hasenhuttl has decided to make a change.
Jonas Wind (Wolfsburg) replaces Lukas Nmecha.

Tiago Tomas comes off the pitch to be replaced
by Mohamed Amoura (Wolfsburg).

Substitution. Patrick Wimmer is replaced
by Lovro Majer (Wolfsburg).

Karim Adeyemi (Dortmund) finishes his beautiful
individual effort with a superb strike from
inside the box. Kamil Grabara is just a
bystander as the ball flies into bottom
right corner. The score is 4:0.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and David Odogu (Wolfsburg)
replaces Denis Vavro.

Ralph Hasenhuttl prepares a substitution.
Kilian Fischer is replaced by Mads Roerslev
Rasmussen (Wolfsburg).

Substitution. Felix Nmecha leaves the pitch
and is replaced by Emre Can (Dortmund).

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Julian Brandt walks off the pitch to
be replaced by Julien Duranville (Dortmund).

Substitution. Carney Chukwuemeka (Dortmund)
replaces Serhou Guirassy.

Here is a change. Pascal Gross is going
off and Niko Kovac gives the last tactical
orders to Marcel Sabitzer (Dortmund).

Franck Honorat takes the corner kick and
sends over a fantastic cross to the edge
of the penalty area. Fabio Cristian Chiarodia
(B. Monchengladbach) jumps highest and plants
a header into the goal. It's 1:0.

The goal by B. Monchengladbach won't count
as it has been disallowed due to offside
on the advice of the video assistant referee!

Goal! Rocco Reitz (B. Monchengladbach) dribbles
into the box then perfectly lifts the ball
over the goalkeeper and into the net. He
couldn't do anything to stop that cheeky
lob. 2:0.

Goal! The rebound fell to Arthur Chaves
(Hoffenheim) and he fired home from close
range. The score is 2:1.

Goal! Andrej Kramaric slips it to Marius
Bulter (Hoffenheim) on the edge of the box
and he finds the bottom right corner with
a great effort. The score is 2:2.

Franck Honorat (B. Monchengladbach) receives
the ball inside the box, reacts quickly
and without any problems fires the ball
into the back of the net.

Here is a change. Franck Honorat (B. Monchengladbach)
is going off and Gerardo Seoane gives the
last tactical orders to Tomas Cvancara.

Goal! Andrej Kramaric slips it to Adam Hlozek
(Hoffenheim) on the edge of the box and
he finds the top right corner with a great
effort. The score is 3:3.

The referee signals a substitution. Haris
Tabakovic (Hoffenheim) is brought on as
a substitute for Adam Hlozek.

Here's the change. Fabio Cristian Chiarodia
(B. Monchengladbach) leaves the pitch and
Stefan Lainer comes on as a substitute.

Haris Tabakovic (Hoffenheim) meets the corner
and displays his eye for goal as he coolly
plants a header into the roof of the net
from close range. The score is 3:4.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Luca Netz comes onto
the pitch so that Lukas Ullrich (B. Monchengladbach)
can be given a rest.

Gerardo Seoane decides to make a substitution.
Kevin Stoger (B. Monchengladbach) will be
replaced by Florian Neuhaus.

Here comes a substitution. Philipp Sander
is brought on as a substitute for Julian
Weigl (B. Monchengladbach).

Substitution. Finn Ole Becker (Hoffenheim)
on for Bazoumana Toure.

Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach) reacts
well to a deflected cross from Robin Hack
and places a close-range header beyond the
keeper into the bottom right corner. 4:4.

Christian Ilzer has decided to substitute
Marius Bulter and he is replaced by Kevin
Akpoguma (Hoffenheim).

Goal! Xavi Simons finds Benjamin Sesko (RB
Leipzig) on the edge of the area, he times
his run to perfection and beautifully chips
the ball over the goalkeeper. 1:0.

It's in the back of the net! David Raum
flights the free kick into the box, where
Lukas Klostermann (RB Leipzig) peels off
his marker and heads straight into the left
side of the net from the edge of the six-yard
box. He makes it 2:0.

David Raum (RB Leipzig) gives the referee
no choice but to show him a yellow card.
David Raum (RB Leipzig) will miss the next
game because of that yellow card.

Vincent Kompany prepares a substitution.
Thomas Muller is replaced by Kingsley Coman
(Bayern Munich).

The game has come to an end for Sacha Boey.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Leon Goretzka (Bayern Munich).

Goal! Eric Dier (Bayern Munich) jumps highest
inside the box to meet the resulting corner
from Michael Olise. His well-placed header
ends up in the top of the net, leaving the
goalkeeper flapping in the wind. 2:1.

Goal! Michael Olise (Bayern Munich) has
a shot from the edge of the box which goes
past the goalkeeper and into the back of
the net. Serge Gnabry provided the assistance
with a headed pass. 2:2.

Substitution. Yussuf Poulsen (RB Leipzig)
on for Benjamin Sesko.

Zsolt Low has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Arthur Vermeeren (RB Leipzig)
replacing Amadou Haidara.

This is a yellow card! Eric Dier (Bayern
Munich) is not happy with the decision,
but from our point of view it was clear.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Kevin Kampl (RB Leipzig) was quite harsh
and Felix Zwayer didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card. Kevin Kampl (RB Leipzig)
will miss the next game.

Here comes a substitution. Kevin Kampl is
given a rest as he is replaced by Ridle
Baku (RB Leipzig).

Goal - 2:3! Joshua Kimmich tees up Leroy
Sane (Bayern Munich) inside the box and
he curls the ball into the left side of
the net and past Maarten Vandevoordt.

It will be a substitution. Lutsharel Geertruida
(RB Leipzig) is ready to enter the pitch
as Kosta Nedeljkovic walks off.

Zsolt Low has decided to make a change.
Antonio Nusa (RB Leipzig) replaces Lois
Openda.

A substitution has been made. Serge Gnabry
goes off and Joao Palhinha (Bayern Munich)
comes on.

The referee is firm and issues Arthur Vermeeren
(RB Leipzig) a deserved yellow card.

It's 3:3! Xavi Simons feeds Yussuf Poulsen
(RB Leipzig) inside the box, who is unmarked
and buries the ball in the top of the net.

Jeff Chabot (VfB Stuttgart) is given a fully
deserved yellow card.

That's a clear yellow card. Siebe Van Der
Heyden (St. Pauli) goes into the book.

Carlo Boukhalfa (St. Pauli) violates the
laws of the game and is shown a deserved
yellow card by the referee.

Angelo Stiller (VfB Stuttgart) is awarded
a yellow card. The referee showed him no
mercy.

Nick Woltemade (VfB Stuttgart) places the
ball on the penalty spot and sends it towards
the right post. His effort isn't powerful
enough, allowing Nikola Vasilj to dive and
keep the ball out with an excellent save.
The ball is out of play and the linesman
points at the corner flag. Corner to Stuttgart.

Substitution. Oladapo Afolayan (St. Pauli)

Arthur Chaves (Hoffenheim) is the one who

Problems for Bo Henriksen as Phillipp Mwene

The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate
this behaviour. Stanley Nsoki (Hoffenheim)

The referee gives a yellow card to Paul
Nebel (Mainz).

Today's match ends for Nikolas Veratschnig
who will be replaced by Armindo Sieb (Mainz).

Here is a change. Bazoumana Toure is going

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Marius Bulter will be replaced by David

Tom Bischof (Hoffenheim) picks up a yellow
card.

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Oliver Baumann (Hoffenheim) receives a yellow

This was really stupid from Paul Nebel (Mainz)!

Alexander Bernhardsson (Holstein Kiel) gets
to the ball on the edge of the box and fires

The strike is excellent and goes straight
into the bottom left corner. He couldn't

Goal! 1:1. The ball rebounds to Danel Sinani

Is that a yellow card in the referee's hand?

Alexander Blessin makes a half-time substitution.

Oladapo Afolayan (St. Pauli) has to be very

We are about to witness a substitution.
Noah Weisshaupt (St. Pauli) is replacing

Alexander Blessin has decided to make a

Marcel Rapp has decided to introduce fresh

Phil Harres (Holstein Kiel) commits a foul

Hauke Wahl (St. Pauli) picks up a yellow

(Holstein Kiel).

Marvin Schulz (Holstein Kiel) is given a
yellow card.

Alexander Blessin decides to make a substitution.

Metcalfe (St. Pauli).

What bad luck! Max Geschwill (Holstein Kiel)

Goal! The ball sits up nicely for Lois Openda
(RB Leipzig) and he hits a crackerjack of

of the month.

Celebrations are cut short for RB Leipzig

What a beautiful moment! Xavi Simons (RB
Leipzig) got to the ball and unleashed a
strong shot from distance. It turned out
to be a good decision as his effort found
its way into the bottom left corner. Kamil
Grabara just shakes his head in disbelief.
The score changes to 0:2.

Yannick Gerhardt (Wolfsburg) is shown a

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by El Chadaille Bitshiabu (RB Leipzig) was

Xavi Simons (RB Leipzig) is shown a deserved
yellow card for saying too much to the referee.

Xavi Simons (RB Leipzig) breaks through

What a beauty from just outside the box!
Kilian Fischer (Wolfsburg) lashed the ball

It must be a yellow card. It is. Kilian

Christian Dingert shows a yellow card to

summary.incident:
Romano Schmid takes over corner duties and

right corner. He makes it 1:0.

(Werder Bremen) a deserved yellow card.

Michy Batshuayi comes on in place of Tuta

Whoa! Such gestures are commonly penalised
and Jens Stage (Werder Bremen) duly receives
a yellow card.

Steven Skrzybski will be replaced by Phil

Moritz Jenz (Mainz) can't expect anything

Timo Becker (Holstein Kiel) picked up a

a substitution and Lukas Kubler (Freiburg)

Steffen Baumgart decides to make a substitution.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle

Andrej Ilic (Union Berlin) makes it easy

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Andrej Ilic (Union Berlin) will be replaced

Steffen Baumgart prepares a substitution.

Soren Storks shows a yellow card to Andras

Josip Juranovic (Union Berlin) is rightly

Johan Manzambi (Freiburg) violates the laws

Eren Dinkci (Freiburg) has tested the patience

The foul by Tuta (Eintracht Frankfurt) is

Dino Toppmoller is forced to make an unplanned

Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart) sees a yellow!

A yellow card for a tackle by Maximilian
Mittelstadt (VfB Stuttgart). Deniz Aytekin
doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.

We have witnessed a sending-off! Ameen Al
Dakhil (VfB Stuttgart) is given a red card
for his dangerous challenge. Deniz Aytekin's
decision is final.

Substitution. Nick Woltemade (VfB Stuttgart)

Sebastian Hoeness decides to make a substitution.
Enzo Millot will be replaced by Ramon Hendriks
(VfB Stuttgart).

Goal! Mario Gotze (Eintracht Frankfurt)

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to introduce

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to substitute

It's time for a substitution. Ellyes Skhiri

Here is a change. Hugo Larsson is going

Dino Toppmoller prepares a substitution.
Jean-Matteo Bahoya is replaced by Fares

Angelo Stiller (VfB Stuttgart) is booked

Ridle Baku (RB Leipzig) is awarded a yellow

Julian Weigl (B. Monchengladbach) violates

Alassane Plea (B. Monchengladbach) gets

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Gerardo Seoane has decided to substitute

Substitution. Benjamin Sesko (RB Leipzig)

Substitution. Ridle Baku leaves the pitch

Stefan Lainer (B. Monchengladbach) comes

Here comes a substitution. Castello Lukeba

We are about to witness a substitution.
Nathan Ngoumou (B. Monchengladbach) is replacing

Gerardo Seoane has decided to make a change.
Florian Neuhaus (B. Monchengladbach) replaces

Substitution. Yussuf Poulsen (RB Leipzig)

Tidiam Gomis (RB Leipzig) can't expect anything

And a yellow it is. Tobias Stieler didn't

pocket.

Tobias Stieler shows a yellow card to Tomas

Florian Badstubner shows the yellow card

Michael Olise feeds the ball through to

Goal! After receiving a sweet pass, Elias

A yellow card for a tackle by Michael Olise

Leon Goretzka comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Joao Palhinha (Bayern Munich).

Florian Badstubner shows a yellow card to
Joao Palhinha (Bayern Munich) for a tough

It's a goal! Leroy Sane (Bayern Munich)

the box by a superb lofted pass from Michael
Olise. The score is 2:1.

Vincent Kompany has decided to make a change.
Hiroki Ito (Bayern Munich) replaces Raphael

The manager has been forced to make a substitution

It's in the back of the net! Harry Kane

Leroy Sane (Bayern Munich) who simply steers

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Oladapo Afolayan (St.

Here comes a substitution. Jamal Musiala

Konrad Laimer will be replaced by Josip
Stanisic (Bayern Munich).

A substitution has been made. Harry Kane
goes off and Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich)
comes on.

The defending players give Lars Ritzka (St.
Pauli) far too much free space and he knows
how to take advantage of it. He produces
a howitzer in the direction of the bottom
right corner. Jonas Urbig was taken unawares
by his effort and the score is 3:2.

Cedric Zesiger (Augsburg) receives a yellow

committed a little earlier.

Half-time substitution. Phillip Tietz (Augsburg)

Goal - 0:1! Cedric Zesiger laid the ball

leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

Yellow card. Frank Onyeka (Augsburg) goes

It's time for a substitution. That's the

Christian Ilzer prepares a substitution.
Pavel Kaderabek is replaced by Valentin

Substitution. Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim)

Goal! Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) wins

Kristijan Jakic (Augsburg) joins the action

Jess Thorup has decided to substitute Marius

Marius Bulter (Hoffenheim) is booked after

Christian Ilzer decides to make a substitution.
David Jurasek will be replaced by Stanley

That will be all from Alexis Claude-Maurice

Sascha Stegemann rightly pulls out a yellow

Marvin Ducksch (Werder Bremen) takes the

Marko Ivezic (Holstein Kiel) sees a yellow

A yellow card for a tackle by Alexander

Felix Agu (Werder Bremen) finds some space

Here's the change. Nicolai Remberg leaves

The referee signals that it is time for

Jens Stage (Werder Bremen) can't expect

Romano Schmid goes off the pitch and Marco

The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet

Finn Jeltsch (VfB Stuttgart) violates the

The ball hits the back of the net! Frans

He heads it inside the right post and gets

The game is over for Lasse Rosenboom (Holstein

Half-time substitution. Armin Gigovic (Holstein

Marco Komenda (Holstein Kiel) violates the

Phil Harres (Holstein Kiel) pounces on a

Frank Schmidt has decided to introduce fresh

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Tom Krauss (Bochum) receives a harsh yellow

It's in the back of the net! Hugo Ekitike

Junior Adamu (Freiburg) has tested the patience

card for his foul.

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Julian
Schuster gives a chance to Michael Gregoritsch
(Freiburg) and Junior Adamu is off.

Half-time substitution. Phillipp Mwene is
replaced by Andreas Hanche-Olsen (Mainz).

Michael Gregoritsch (Freiburg) heads the
ball inside the left post after a splendid
cross. This timely header produces a wonderful
moment.

Goal! A nice lofted pass into the box by
Anthony Caci is pounced on by Andreas Hanche-Olsen
(Mainz). His close-range strike flashes
past Noah Atubolu and into the bottom left
corner. 2:1.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Nicolas Hofler (Freiburg)
comes onto the pitch for Maximilian Eggestein.

Here is a change. Kiliann Sildillia is going
off and Julian Schuster gives the last tactical
orders to Lukas Kubler (Freiburg).

Goal! Ritsu Doan puts the ball across the
area and Lukas Kubler (Freiburg) has the
easiest task in the world to tuck the ball
into an empty net. 2:2.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Vincenzo Grifo as
he is replaced by Jan-Niklas Beste (Freiburg).

The foul by Lucas Holer (Freiburg) is worthy
of a card and a yellow is duly shown by
Benjamin Brand.

Jamal Musiala (Bayern Munich) was probably
a bit loose with his words to Florian Exner,
who decides to show him a yellow.

Josip Juranovic (Union Berlin) is shown
a yellow card after a horrible tackle.

The substitution has been made. Marin Ljubicic
(Union Berlin) has replaced Andrej Ilic.

Rene Wagner has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Benedict Hollerbach (Union Berlin)
replacing Janik Haberer.

Substitution. Serge Gnabry did his best
and is replaced by Leroy Sane (Bayern Munich).

Here comes a substitution. Christopher Trimmel
is given a rest as he is replaced by Tom
Rothe (Union Berlin).

Goal! A great through ball by Josip Stanisic
sets up Leroy Sane (Bayern Munich) inside
the box, and he makes no mistake and bangs
the ball into the bottom left corner. 0:1.

Joshua Kimmich (Bayern Munich) sees a yellow
card. He should be more careful because
one more challenge like that could result
in a red card.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Laszlo Benes (Union Berlin)
is coming onto the pitch as Andras Schafer
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Here is a change. Woo-Yeong Jeong is going
off and Rene Wagner gives the last tactical
orders to Tim Skarke (Union Berlin).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Hiroki Ito (Bayern Munich)
comes onto the pitch for Michael Olise.

Goal! Benedict Hollerbach (Union Berlin)
fires the rebound into the bottom left corner
after the ball breaks to him in the box.
The score is 1:1.

Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach) is
awarded a yellow card. The referee showed
him no mercy.

Goal! Alassane Plea (B. Monchengladbach)
runs up to the ball, stops and waits for
Michael Zetterer to commit before slotting
the penalty into the bottom left corner.

The main referee, Timo Gerach, is apparently
not going to tolerate any discussions. Senne
Lynen (Werder Bremen) is given a yellow
card for dissent.

Goal! Alassane Plea (B. Monchengladbach)
pounced on a loose ball inside the box and
beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the
bottom left corner. He makes it 0:2.

Romano Schmid (Werder Bremen) takes the
free kick with a powerful low drive that
goes inside the right-hand post and ends
up behind the goalkeeper. A real jaw dropper!

Andre Silva (Werder Bremen) steps up to
take the penalty and converts it with a
shot into the middle of the goal.

Alassane Plea (B. Monchengladbach) collects
a delightful pass inside the box and nets
with a perfect low drive into the middle
of the goal. What a clinical finish!

Substitution. Justin Njinmah (Werder Bremen)
receives a signal from the referee and is
now allowed to enter the pitch as Andre
Silva walks off.

Ole Werner has decided to substitute Senne
Lynen and he is replaced by Leonardo Bittencourt
(Werder Bremen).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Tomas Cvancara (B. Monchengladbach)
is coming onto the pitch as Nathan Ngoumou
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Substitution. Luca Netz (B. Monchengladbach)
in, Lukas Ullrich out.

Gerardo Seoane decides to make a substitution.
Jonas Omlin will be replaced by Tiago Pereira
Cardoso (B. Monchengladbach).

Alassane Plea sends a precise lofted cross
into the box. Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach)
latches on to it and finishes with a quick
shot inside the right post. The goalkeeper
had no chance. The score changes to 2:4.

Ole Werner prepares a substitution. Milos
Veljkovic is replaced by Marco Friedl (Werder
Bremen).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Keke Topp (Werder Bremen)
replaces Issa Kabore.

A substitution has been made. Oliver Burke
is replaced by Marvin Ducksch (Werder Bremen).

Alassane Plea comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Marvin Friedrich (B. Monchengladbach).

Today's match ends for Philipp Sander who
will be replaced by Rocco Reitz (B. Monchengladbach).

RED CARD! Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach)
makes a bad challenge and receives a second
yellow card from Timo Gerach. He can have
an early bath.

GOAL! And it’s the keeper’s mistake after
his poor pass is easily intercepted close
in by Noah Weisshaupt (St. Pauli), who gleefully
fires it into the net. That makes it 1:0.

The referee had an easy-decision to make.
A yellow card is given to Anton Stach (Hoffenheim)
for a foul that he committed a little earlier.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Gift Orban walks off the pitch to be
replaced by Haris Tabakovic (Hoffenheim).

Christian Ilzer has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Marius Bulter (Hoffenheim)
replacing Umut Tohumcu.

Substitution. Pavel Kaderabek is replaced
by Valentin Gendrey (Hoffenheim).

Christian Ilzer prepares a substitution.
Finn Ole Becker is replaced by Bazoumana
Toure (Hoffenheim).

It is time for a substitution. Johannes
Eggestein (St. Pauli) is on for Elias Saad.

Substitution. Oladapo Afolayan (St. Pauli)
has come on for Noah Weisshaupt.

The manager has been forced to make a substitution
and the injured Siebe Van Der Heyden limps
off the pitch to be replaced by Lars Ritzka
(St. Pauli).

Today's match ends for David Jurasek who
will be replaced by Erencan Yardimci (Hoffenheim).

Alexander Blessin has decided to make a
change. Carlo Boukhalfa (St. Pauli) replaces
Danel Sinani.

summary.incident:

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle

harsh and Daniel Schlager didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

after bringing down an opponent. Daniel
Schlager had an easy-decision to make.

That's a GOAL! Somehow the long throw in
evades everyone except Haris Tabakovic (Hoffenheim),
who calmly nods the ball into the net from
inside the six-yard box. That makes it 1:0.

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Frank
Schmidt gives a chance to Budu Zivzivadze
(Heidenheim) and Tim Siersleben is off.

Goal! Great link up play between Budu Zivzivadze
(Heidenheim) and Niklas Dorsch gives the
former a clear sight of goal on the edge
of the box. He doesn't disappoint and beats
the keeper in the top right corner. 1:1.
