referee, who shows him a yellow card.

Philipp Treu (St. Pauli) picks up a yellow
card.

Bo Henriksen makes a switch. Jae-Sung Lee
is coming on in place of Nelson Weiper (Mainz)
at the start of the second period.

Yellow card! It's like Dominik Kohr (Mainz)
was asking for a caution with his behaviour.
Felix Zwayer agrees and books him.

Peter Nemeth is forced to make an unplanned
substitution as Lars Ritzka (St. Pauli)
suffers an injury and Adam Dzwigala comes
on.

Siebe Van Der Heyden (St. Pauli) gives the
referee no choice but to show him a yellow
card.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Dominik Kohr departs the
field of play to be replaced by Andreas
Hanche-Olsen (Mainz).

Goal! Jae-Sung Lee (Mainz) was in the right
place at the right time to get to the rebound
inside the box and gleefully rifles the
ball into the right side of the goal. It's
1:0.

Here is a change. Elias Saad is going off
and Peter Nemeth gives the last tactical
orders to Oladapo Afolayan (St. Pauli).

A substitution has been made. Jonathan Burkardt
goes off and Armindo Sieb (Mainz) comes
on.

Peter Nemeth has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Abdoulie Ceesay (St. Pauli) replacing
Philipp Treu.

A substitution has been made. Noah Weisshaupt
is replaced by Danel Sinani (St. Pauli).

Here comes a substitution. Silvan Widmer
(Mainz) is brought on as a substitute for
Phillipp Mwene.

Paul Nebel (Mainz) violates the laws of
the game and is shown a deserved yellow
card by the referee.

David Nemeth (St. Pauli) receives a yellow
card for infringement.

It's in the back of the net! Jae-Sung Lee
plays it into the box, and Paul Nebel (Mainz)
gets on the end of the cross to put it low
into the middle of the net. 2:0.

That's a clear yellow card. Matus Bero (Bochum)
goes into the book.

Erhan Masovic (Bochum) outjumps the defence
inside the six-yard box to meet the corner
and scores with a great header into the
right side of the goal. The keeper had no
chance to react. The score is now 0:1.

Ralph Hasenhuttl has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Andreas Skov Olsen (Wolfsburg)
replacing Tiago Tomas.

That's the end of the game for Mads Roerslev
Rasmussen, who is replaced by Sebastiaan
Bornauw (Wolfsburg).

Ralph Hasenhuttl has decided to substitute
Patrick Wimmer and he is replaced by Yannick
Gerhardt (Wolfsburg).

Bence Dardai (Wolfsburg) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Aster Vranckx.

The referee looks satisfied after his VAR
review and duly disallows the goal due to
a foul. The Wolfsburg players look gutted.

The referee is firm and issues Jonas Wind
(Wolfsburg) a deserved yellow card.

Ivan Ordets (Bochum) violates the laws of
the game and is shown a deserved yellow
card by the referee.

Problems for Dieter Hecking as Gerrit Holtmann
(Bochum) is not able to play anymore. His
injury is too serious and Maximilian Wittek
replaces him.

Goal 1:1! Mattias Svanberg (Wolfsburg) taps
home from close range after the rebound
fell kindly into his path.

Here is a change. Philipp Hofmann is going
off and Dieter Hecking gives the last tactical
orders to Moritz Broschinski (Bochum).

Sebastiaan Bornauw (Wolfsburg) is awarded
a yellow card. The referee showed him no
mercy.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Mohamed Amoura leaves the
pitch and Lukas Nmecha (Wolfsburg) comes
on.

It's like he was asking for a caution. Maximilian
Wittek (Bochum) receives a yellow card.

Dieter Hecking decides to make a substitution.
Ibrahima Sissoko will be replaced by Anthony
Losilla (Bochum).

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Georgios Masouras
as he is replaced by Cristian Gamboa (Bochum).

GOAL! Kiliann Sildillia (Freiburg) gets
to the rebound inside the box and fires
in a stunning overhead kick. Phenomenal
finish! 1:0.

Maximilian Eggestein (Freiburg) picks up
a yellow card.

Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) scores a great
goal from the resulting free kick from mid-range.
He sends the ball directly inside the right
post.

Matthias Ginter (Freiburg) is cautioned
by the referee for a foul that he committed
a little earlier.

Andre Silva (Werder Bremen) fails to beat
the goalkeeper from the penalty spot with
a shot inside the right post. Noah Atubolu
anticipates his intention perfectly, though,
and leaps to stop his effort.

It's a goal! Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) scores
with a brilliant shot into the left side
of the goal after being released inside
the box by a superb lofted pass from Lucas
Holer. The score is now 3:0.

Marvin Ducksch (Werder Bremen) joins the
action as a substitute, replacing Justin
Njinmah.

The referee signals a substitution. Felix
Agu (Werder Bremen) is brought on as a substitute
for Derrick Kohn.

Ole Werner has decided to substitute Leonardo
Bittencourt and he is replaced by Jens Stage
(Werder Bremen).

Merlin Rohl (Freiburg) has to be very careful
for the rest of the match after receiving
a yellow card from the referee for a bad
tackle on an opponent.

Substitution. Merlin Rohl will be replaced
by Eren Dinkci (Freiburg).

Julian Schuster has decided to make a change.
Jan-Niklas Beste (Freiburg) replaces Vincenzo
Grifo.

It's time for a substitution. Marco Grull
(Werder Bremen) comes on in place of Andre
Silva.

Eren Dinkci passes to Ritsu Doan (Freiburg),
who collects the ball and unleashes a terrific
shot from the edge of the box. His effort
goes into the bottom right corner. Fabulous
goal! The score is 4:0.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Lucas Holer walks off the pitch to be
replaced by Junior Adamu (Freiburg).

Julian Schuster has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Jordy Makengo (Freiburg)
replacing Christian Gunter.

Here's the change. Maximilian Eggestein
leaves the pitch and Johan Manzambi (Freiburg)
comes on as a substitute.

Substitution. Julian Malatini (Werder Bremen)
in, Amos Pieper out.

Goal! Jan-Niklas Beste plays a pass to the
feet of Ritsu Doan (Freiburg), and he shoots
into the bottom right corner from inside
the box. It's 5:0.

It's in the back of the net! Anthony Caci
sprays a pass out to Jonathan Burkardt (Mainz),
and he has an easy job to slot the ball
into an empty net. The score is 0:1.

Thomas Keller comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Marvin Pieringer (Heidenheim).

Frank Schmidt decides to make a substitution.
Adrian Beck will be replaced by Paul Wanner
(Heidenheim).

Goal! Jonathan Burkardt puts the ball on
the head of Nelson Weiper (Mainz), who has
the easy task to score into an empty net.
0:2.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Leo
Scienza (Heidenheim) for Jonas Fohrenbach.

Felix Brych shows a yellow card to Marvin
Pieringer (Heidenheim) for a tough tackle.

Bo Henriksen has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Jae-Sung Lee (Mainz) replacing
Jonathan Burkardt.

The foul by Dominik Kohr (Mainz) is worthy
of a card and a yellow is duly shown by
Felix Brych.

Substitution. Julian Niehues (Heidenheim)
has come on for Frans Kratzig.

Anthony Caci (Mainz) can't expect anything
else than a yellow card for his hard tackle.
And a yellow it is. Felix Brych didn't think
twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

Bo Henriksen has decided to make a change.
Armindo Sieb (Mainz) replaces Nelson Weiper.

Today's referee Felix Brych rightly decides
to book Nadiem Amiri (Mainz) for his harsh
tackle.

Bo Henriksen has decided to substitute Anthony
Caci and he is replaced by Silvan Widmer
(Mainz).

Substitution. Dominik Kohr will be replaced
by Andreas Hanche-Olsen (Mainz).

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Nadiem Amiri walks off the pitch to
be replaced by Lennard Maloney (Mainz).

Frank Schmidt prepares a substitution. Jan
Schoppner is replaced by Luca Kerber (Heidenheim).

Goal! Nathaniel Brown shows great vision
to find Hugo Larsson (Eintracht Frankfurt)
with a cheeky pass inside the box, and his
first-time shot is precise and sails into
the right side of the goal. 1:0.

Tuta (Eintracht Frankfurt) finds some space
inside the box to meet a beautiful cross
and with a precise low drive puts the ball
into the bottom left corner.

Hugo Ekitike (Eintracht Frankfurt) wastes
a huge opportunity to score from the penalty
spot. He attempts to slot into the bottom
right corner, but Thomas Dahne pulls off
a superb save. Eintracht Frankfurt get a
corner.

Here is a change after the half-time break.
Timo Becker is replaced by Dominik Javorcek
(Holstein Kiel).

Dino Toppmoller is forced to make a change.
Oscar Hojlund is unable to continue due
to injury, Mahmoud Dahoud (Eintracht Frankfurt)
comes on.

Phil Harres will be replaced by Shuto Machino
(Holstein Kiel).

Marcel Rapp prepares a substitution. Lewis
Holtby is replaced by Andu Yobel Kelati
(Holstein Kiel).

Goal! A mistake from the defence gifted
a chance to a lurking Can Yilmaz Uzun (Eintracht
Frankfurt), who keeps his cool and rolls
the ball into the net from close range.
3:0.

Robert Hartmann shows the yellow card to
Mahmoud Dahoud (Eintracht Frankfurt) for
a heavy challenge.

It's time for a substitution. Niels Nkounkou
(Eintracht Frankfurt) comes on in place
of Nathaniel Brown.

Dino Toppmoller has decided to make a change.
Elye Wahi (Eintracht Frankfurt) replaces
Can Yilmaz Uzun.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Marko Ivezic (Holstein Kiel)
is coming onto the pitch as Ivan Nekic cannot
continue after picking up an injury.

Finn Porath (Holstein Kiel) pounces on a
rebound inside the box from a Jann-Fiete
Arp shot and sends the ball into the back
of the net. The score is 3:1.

The substitution is prepared. Magnus Knudsen
(Holstein Kiel) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Marco Komenda.

The foul by Rasmus Kristensen (Eintracht
Frankfurt) is worthy of a card and a yellow
is duly shown by Robert Hartmann.

The substitution has been made. Jean-Matteo
Bahoya (Eintracht Frankfurt) has replaced
Hugo Ekitike.

Stanley Nsoki (Hoffenheim) attempts to head
the ball away after a cross into the penalty
area, but instead he accidentally sends
it inside the right post of his own goal.
The goalkeeper was helpless.

Goal - 1:1! Anton Stach (Hoffenheim) gets
a shot away from the edge of the box and
scores into the bottom right corner. Andrej
Kramaric provided an assist for the goal.

Frank Willenborg shows a yellow card to
Romano Schmid (Werder Bremen) for a tough
tackle.

Tom Bischof (Hoffenheim) takes a great first
touch to control a killer pass on the edge
of the box and drills a shot into the bottom
right corner in trademark fashion.

Ole Werner has made a change at the break.
Amos Pieper has come on in place of Milos
Veljkovic (Werder Bremen).

Here is a change after the half-time break.
Marvin Ducksch (Werder Bremen) is replaced
by Andre Silva.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Ole Werner probably wasn't
satisfied with the performance of Issa Kabore
(Werder Bremen). He is replaced by Derrick
Kohn.

A yellow card for a tackle by Gift Orban
(Hoffenheim). Frank Willenborg doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Arthur Chaves (Hoffenheim) is booked for
saying more than Frank Willenborg was willing
to tolerate.

It's a goal! Gift Orban (Hoffenheim) bursts
into the box to get on the end of a whipped
in cross from Andrej Kramaric and scores
magnificently from close range low into
the middle of the goal. 1:3.

Today's match ends for Marco Grull who will
be replaced by Justin Njinmah (Werder Bremen).

Christian Ilzer prepares a substitution.
Gift Orban is replaced by Erencan Yardimci
(Hoffenheim).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim)
is coming onto the pitch as Anton Stach
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Alexander Prass (Hoffenheim) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Stanley Nsoki.

Ole Werner decides to make a substitution.
Anthony Jung will be replaced by Oliver
Burke (Werder Bremen).

The foul by Erencan Yardimci (Hoffenheim)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Frank Willenborg.

Here's the change. Andrej Kramaric leaves
the pitch and Kevin Akpoguma (Hoffenheim)
comes on as a substitute.

Frank Willenborg shows the yellow card to
Oliver Burke (Werder Bremen) for a heavy
challenge.

Piero Hincapie (Bayer Leverkusen) is awarded
a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't
seem to agree with the decision, but Daniel
Siebert ignores the protests.

The foul by Hiroki Ito (Bayern Munich) is
worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown
by Daniel Siebert.

Daniel Siebert shows a yellow card to Aleksandar
Pavlovic (Bayern Munich), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

Josip Stanisic (Bayern Munich) joins the
action as a substitute, replacing Hiroki
Ito.

Here is a change. Michael Olise is going
off and Vincent Kompany gives the last tactical
orders to Serge Gnabry (Bayern Munich).

It will be a substitution. Leon Goretzka
(Bayern Munich) is ready to enter the pitch
as Aleksandar Pavlovic walks off.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Kingsley Coman will be replaced by Leroy
Sane (Bayern Munich).

A yellow card for a tackle by Dayot Upamecano
(Bayern Munich). Daniel Siebert doesn't
hesitate at all to make this decision.

Here's the change. Nathan Tella leaves the
pitch and Amine Adli (Bayer Leverkusen)
comes on as a substitute.

Vincent Kompany has decided to substitute
Jamal Musiala and he is replaced by Sacha
Boey (Bayern Munich).

The referee signals a substitution. Patrik
Schick (Bayer Leverkusen) is brought on
as a substitute for Alejandro Grimaldo.

Edmond Tapsoba (Bayer Leverkusen) is booked
for saying more than Daniel Siebert was
willing to tolerate.

GOAL! Superb work from Philipp Hofmann,
who plays a vital role in the build-up.
He squares it to Georgios Masouras (Bochum),
who beats Gregor Kobel with a brilliant
shot into the bottom right corner. 2:0.

Goal! The ball breaks to Georgios Masouras
(Bochum) after some poor defending, he finds
himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper and
calmly puts the ball into the back of the
net! He makes it 2:0.

Here is a change. Marcel Sabitzer is going
off and Niko Kovac gives the last tactical
orders to Salih Ozcan (Dortmund).

Bernardo (Bochum) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Harm Osmers had an easy-decision
to make.

Niko Kovac prepares a substitution. Jamie
Gittens is replaced by Maximilian Beier
(Dortmund).

Substitution. Yan Couto (Dortmund) receives
a signal from the referee and is now allowed
to enter the pitch as Niklas Sule walks
off.

Niko Kovac has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Julien Duranville (Dortmund)
replacing Karim Adeyemi.

It's time for a substitution. Cristian Gamboa
(Bochum) comes on in place of Gerrit Holtmann.

It will be a substitution. Giovanni Reyna
(Dortmund) is ready to enter the pitch as
Pascal Gross walks off.

Here's the change. Georgios Masouras leaves
the pitch and Moritz Broschinski (Bochum)
comes on as a substitute.

Dieter Hecking has decided to substitute
Philipp Hofmann and he is replaced by Dani
de Wit (Bochum).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Anthony Losilla (Bochum)
will replace Tom Krauss.

Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) wastes a huge
opportunity to score from the penalty spot.
He attempts to slot into the middle of the
target, but Nikola Vasilj pulls off a save.

Here is a change. Elias Saad is going off
and Alexander Blessin gives the last tactical
orders to Oladapo Afolayan (St. Pauli).

David Nemeth (St. Pauli) shouldn't be surprised
it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the
situation down well.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Jan-Niklas Beste (Freiburg)
will replace Vincenzo Grifo.

Julian Schuster decides to make a substitution.
Merlin Rohl will be replaced by Eren Dinkci
(Freiburg).

Alexander Blessin has decided to make a
change. Scott Banks (St. Pauli) replaces
Noah Weisshaupt.

A substitution has been made. Siebe Van
Der Heyden is replaced by Lars Ritzka (St.
Pauli).

OWN GOAL! Philipp Treu (St. Pauli) scores
an unlucky own goal after he deflected a
shot which went into his own net! 0:1.

It is time for a substitution. Abdoulie
Ceesay (St. Pauli) is on for David Nemeth.

Alexander Blessin has decided to substitute
Johannes Eggestein and he is replaced by
Andreas Nielsen Albers (St. Pauli).

We are about to witness a substitution.
Max Rosenfelder (Freiburg) is replacing
Ritsu Doan.

summary.incident:
A yellow card for a tackle by Kilian Fischer
(Wolfsburg). Tobias Welz doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Tobias Welz shows a yellow card to Jeff
Chabot (VfB Stuttgart) for his blatant foul.

Atakan Karazor (VfB Stuttgart) can't expect
anything else than a yellow card for his
hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Tobias
Welz didn't think twice about pulling it
out of his pocket.

Yannick Gerhardt (Wolfsburg) gets a yellow
card. The referee Tobias Welz made the right
call.

Ralph Hasenhuttl makes a half-time substitution.
Mads Roerslev Rasmussen (Wolfsburg) comes
on in place of Kilian Fischer.

A substitution has been made. Jamie Leweling
goes off and Justin Diehl (VfB Stuttgart)
comes on.

Sebastian Hoeness decides to make a substitution.
Deniz Undav will be replaced by Nick Woltemade
(VfB Stuttgart).

Substitution. Jonas Wind is replaced by
Andreas Skov Olsen (Wolfsburg).

Nick Woltemade (VfB Stuttgart) finishes
his beautiful individual effort with a superb
strike from inside the box. Marius Muller
is just a bystander as the ball flies into
the right side of the goal. The score is
1:0.

Mattias Svanberg (Wolfsburg) is awarded
a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't
seem to agree with the decision, but Tobias
Welz ignores the protests.

Goal! Mohamed Amoura provides Tiago Tomas
(Wolfsburg) with a nice pass inside the
box. It allows him to finish with a precise
effort under the bar. 1:1.

A substitution has been made. Chris Fuhrich
is replaced by Ermedin Demirovic (VfB Stuttgart).

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Mohamed Amoura (Wolfsburg) low into the
right of the net, giving goalkeeper Alexander
Nubel no chance!

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to substitute
Atakan Karazor and he is replaced by Fabian
Rieder (VfB Stuttgart).

Here comes a substitution. Josha Vagnoman
is given a rest as he is replaced by Finn
Jeltsch (VfB Stuttgart).

Ralph Hasenhuttl prepares a substitution.
Tiago Tomas is replaced by Kevin Behrens
(Wolfsburg).

Ramon Hendriks (VfB Stuttgart) sees a yellow!
His tackle wasn't that harsh, but he probably
talked himself into Tobias Welz's book.

Kevin Behrens (Wolfsburg) was probably a
bit loose with his words to Tobias Welz,
who decides to show him a yellow.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Sebastiaan Bornauw (Wolfsburg) is replacing
Mohamed Amoura.

After receiving a sweet pass, Lukas Ullrich
(B. Monchengladbach) unleashes a shot straight
into the top left corner. Good team effort!

Gerardo Seoane is forced to make a change.
Moritz Nicolas is unable to continue due
to injury, Jonas Omlin (B. Monchengladbach)
comes on.

Beautiful move! Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach)
latches on to a brilliant pass and aims
accurately beyond the helpless goalkeeper.
Great action there!

Problems for Steffen Baumgart as Robert
Skov (Union Berlin) is not able to play
anymore. His injury is too serious and Tom
Rothe replaces him.

Steffen Baumgart makes a half-time substitution.
Leopold Querfeld (Union Berlin) comes on
in place of Tim Skarke.

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Andrej Ilic (Union Berlin) into the left
of the net, giving goalkeeper Moritz Nicolas
no chance!

That's the end of the game for Andrej Ilic,
who is replaced by Ivan Prtajin (Union Berlin).

Steffen Baumgart has decided to make a change.
Laszlo Benes (Union Berlin) replaces Janik
Haberer.

Here comes a substitution. Nathan Ngoumou
is given a rest as he is replaced by Marvin
Friedrich (B. Monchengladbach).

Gerardo Seoane decides to make a substitution.
Joe Scally will be replaced by Stefan Lainer
(B. Monchengladbach).

The foul by Philipp Sander (B. Monchengladbach)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Sven Jablonski.

Substitution. Tomas Cvancara (B. Monchengladbach)
in, Kevin Stoger out.

Gerardo Seoane prepares a substitution.
Robin Hack is replaced by Florian Neuhaus
(B. Monchengladbach).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Marin Ljubicic (Union
Berlin) is coming onto the pitch as Woo-Yeong
Jeong cannot continue after picking up an
injury.

Alexis Claude-Maurice (Augsburg) takes his
opponent down and receives a yellow card
from the referee.

Chrislain Matsima (Augsburg) is cautioned
by the referee for a foul that he committed
a little earlier.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Samuel Essende walks off the pitch to
be replaced by Phillip Tietz (Augsburg).

Sascha Stegemann shows a yellow card to
Kevin Kampl (RB Leipzig) for his blatant
foul.

Marco Rose has decided to substitute Christoph
Baumgartner and he is replaced by Lois Openda
(RB Leipzig).

Marco Rose has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Nicolas Seiwald (RB Leipzig)
replacing Castello Lukeba.

A substitution has been made. Kevin Kampl
is replaced by Arthur Vermeeren (RB Leipzig).

It is time for a substitution. Arne Maier
(Augsburg) is on for Fredrik Jensen.

Jess Thorup is forced to make a change.
Marius Wolf (Augsburg) is unable to continue
due to injury, Henri Koudossou comes on.

The manager makes a subsitution with Kosta
Nedeljkovic (RB Leipzig) coming on for Ridle
Baku.

Marco Rose has decided to make a change.
Yussuf Poulsen (RB Leipzig) replaces Benjamin
Sesko.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Lutsharel Geertruida (RB Leipzig) was
quite harsh and Florian Badstubner didn't
hesitate to show him a yellow card.

Siebe Van Der Heyden (St. Pauli) receives
a yellow card for a nasty tackle.

It's in the back of the net! Superb finishing
from Benjamin Sesko (RB Leipzig). Xavi Simons
plays a fantastic through ball and finds
Benjamin Sesko (RB Leipzig), who reacts
quickly to get in front of the goalkeeper
and fire a close-range shot into the bottom
right corner. 1:0.

Goal! Benjamin Sesko plays a simple square
pass into the feet of Xavi Simons (RB Leipzig)
in the box, who composes himself and lashes
the ball inside the left post. 2:0.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Marco Rose probably wasn't
satisfied with the performance of Lutsharel
Geertruida (RB Leipzig). He is replaced
by Nicolas Seiwald.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Siebe Van Der Heyden walks off the pitch
to be replaced by Adam Dzwigala (St. Pauli).

Alexander Blessin prepares a substitution.
Carlo Boukhalfa is replaced by Elias Saad
(St. Pauli).

Adam Dzwigala (St. Pauli) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Florian Badstubner
had an easy-decision to make.

Kevin Kampl (RB Leipzig) is cautioned by
the referee for a foul that he committed
a little earlier.

Willi Orban (RB Leipzig) makes an awful
challenge on his opponent and the referee
shows him a deserved red card!

Substitution. Antonio Nusa will be replaced
by Christoph Baumgartner (RB Leipzig).

Marco Rose has decided to make a change.
Lois Openda (RB Leipzig) replaces Benjamin
Sesko.

The substitution has been made. El Chadaille
Bitshiabu (RB Leipzig) has replaced Kevin
Kampl.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Scott Banks (St. Pauli)
replaces Noah Weisshaupt.

Alexander Blessin has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Abdoulie Ceesay (St. Pauli)
replacing David Nemeth.

Today's match ends for Castello Lukeba who
will be replaced by Lukas Klostermann (RB
Leipzig).

summary.incident:
Goal! Steven Skrzybski (Holstein Kiel) wins
the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Patrick Drewes into the bottom
left corner.

Marco Komenda is being substituted because
of an injury. Marcel Rapp sends Marko Ivezic
(Holstein Kiel) on the pitch.

Problems for Marcel Rapp as Steven Skrzybski
(Holstein Kiel) is not able to play anymore.
His injury is too serious and Shuto Machino
replaces him.

Myron Boadu (Bochum) scores! He latches
on to a pass and produces a perfect strike
from the edge of the box that goes inside
the left post and past the goalkeeper.

Myron Boadu (Bochum) finds some space in
front of goal and scores after heading the
ball into the roof of the net!

Substitution. Moritz Broschinski (Bochum)
on for Myron Boadu.

Marcel Rapp makes a half-time substitution.
Armin Gigovic (Holstein Kiel) comes on in
place of Finn Porath.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Marcel Rapp probably wasn't
satisfied with the performance of Lasse
Rosenboom. He is replaced by Jann-Fiete
Arp (Holstein Kiel).

Half-time substitution. Gerrit Holtmann
will not participate anymore and Philipp
Hofmann (Bochum) is coming on.

John Tolkin launches a beautiful lofted
cross into the box, where David Zec (Holstein
Kiel) rises high to head the ball into the
right side of the goal and beyond the goalkeeper.
2:2.

Nicolai Remberg (Holstein Kiel) makes it
easy for the referee to show him a yellow
card.

Maximilian Wittek (Bochum) is rightly booked
by the referee because it could not have
been anything other than a yellow card.

Matus Bero (Bochum) receives a harsh yellow
card from the referee after committing a
minor foul on his opponent.

The goal by Holstein Kiel is DISALLOWED
on the advice of the video assistant referee
due to a foul.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Anthony Losilla (Bochum) is replacing Tom
Krauss.

Here is a change. Matus Bero is going off
and Dieter Hecking gives the last tactical
orders to Dani de Wit (Bochum).

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Georgios Masouras walks off the pitch
to be replaced by Erhan Masovic (Bochum).

David Zec (Holstein Kiel) goes in the referee's
notebook after being shown a yellow card.

Goal! Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach)

header in the left side of the goal after
a good run and cross by Florian Neuhaus.

Goal! The rebound fell to Hugo Ekitike (Eintracht
Frankfurt) and he fired home from close
range. The score is 1:1.

Mario Gotze (Eintracht Frankfurt) can't
expect anything else than a yellow card
for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is.
Christian Dingert didn't think twice about
pulling it out of his pocket.

Christian Dingert rightly pulls out a yellow
card and shows it to Ko Itakura (B. Monchengladbach).

Yellow card! It's like Michy Batshuayi (Eintracht
Frankfurt) was asking for a caution with
his behaviour. Christian Dingert agrees
and books him.

Christian Dingert shows the yellow card
to Lukas Ullrich (B. Monchengladbach) for
a heavy challenge.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Can Yilmaz Uzun (Eintracht
Frankfurt) comes onto the pitch so that
Michy Batshuayi can be given a rest.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Robin Hack trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Tomas Cvancara
(B. Monchengladbach).

Gerardo Seoane has decided to substitute
Lukas Ullrich and he is replaced by Luca
Netz (B. Monchengladbach).

Dino Toppmoller has decided to make a change.
Oscar Hojlund (Eintracht Frankfurt) replaces
Ellyes Skhiri.

Substitution. Nathaniel Brown walks off
the pitch and Niels Nkounkou (Eintracht
Frankfurt) comes on as a substitute.

Christian Dingert shows a yellow card to
Can Yilmaz Uzun (Eintracht Frankfurt) for
a tough tackle.

It will be a substitution. Elye Wahi (Eintracht
Frankfurt) is ready to enter the pitch as
Mario Gotze walks off.

Dino Toppmoller decides to make a substitution.
Ansgar Knauff will be replaced by Nnamdi
Collins (Eintracht Frankfurt).

Christian Dingert shows a yellow card to
Florian Neuhaus (B. Monchengladbach), who
isn't surprised as the tackle was really
hard and late.

The substitution has been made. Alassane
Plea (B. Monchengladbach) has replaced Nathan
Ngoumou.

Emre Can (Dortmund) has received a yellow
card for his foul.

Waldemar Anton (Dortmund) puts the ball
into the back of the net but, unfortunately
for him and his teammates, it's into his
own goal!

Julian Ryerson (Dortmund) is cautioned by
the referee after being shown a yellow card

Daniel Siebert shows a yellow card to Karim
Adeyemi (Dortmund), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

What a hit! Jeff Chabot (VfB Stuttgart)
shows good composure inside the box to fire
a first-time shot inside the left post.
0:2.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Josha Vagnoman (VfB Stuttgart)
is coming onto the pitch as Chris Fuhrich
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Ermedin Demirovic (VfB
Stuttgart) replacing Deniz Undav.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Karim Adeyemi as he
is replaced by Maximilian Beier (Dortmund).

The manager makes a subsitution with Yannik
Keitel (VfB Stuttgart) coming on for Enzo
Millot.

Julian Brandt (Dortmund) receives a great
chance inside the box and drills a shot
into the bottom right corner.

Here's the change. Jamie Gittens leaves
the pitch and Julien Duranville (Dortmund)
comes on as a substitute.

Niko Kovac has decided to substitute Ramy
Bensebaini and he is replaced by Daniel
Svensson (Dortmund).

Substitution. Giovanni Reyna (Dortmund)
on for Pascal Gross.

Substitution. Jamie Leweling did his best
and is replaced by Nick Woltemade (VfB Stuttgart).

Angelo Stiller (VfB Stuttgart) fouls his
opponent and receives a yellow card from
the referee, but he is clearly not happy
with the decision.

Yet another yellow card and Julian Ryerson
(Dortmund) is sent off for talking out of
turn to the referee. Definitely a harebrained
moment from the player. Daniel Siebert doesn't
allow any discussions.

Julien Duranville (Dortmund) can't expect
anything else than a yellow card for his
hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Daniel
Siebert didn't think twice about pulling
it out of his pocket.

Daniel Siebert shows a yellow card to Atakan
Karazor (VfB Stuttgart) for a tough tackle.

Tobias Reichel shows a yellow card to Benedikt
Gimber (Heidenheim) for his blatant foul.

Jonas Fohrenbach looks very unsteady on
his feet after that head injury. Safety
first, so he’s coming off and Frank Schmidt
has decided that Marnon Busch (Heidenheim)
is the man to take his place.

Goooooal! Ritsu Doan beats his man and slings
in a cross towards Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg),
who evades his marker and plants a fine
header into the bottom right corner from
close in. 1:0.

Maximilian Eggestein (Freiburg) has tested
the patience of referee Tobias Reichel and

Frank Schmidt has decided to make a substitution

Gimber.

Lucas Holer (Freiburg) has to be very careful

a yellow card from the referee for a bad

The substitution has been made. Junior Adamu
(Freiburg) has replaced Lucas Holer.

Julian Schuster decides to make a substitution.
Eren Dinkci will be replaced by Merlin Rohl
(Freiburg).

That's the end of the game for Luca Kerber,
who is replaced by Sirlord Conteh (Heidenheim).

Frank Schmidt prepares a substitution. Frans
Kratzig is replaced by Paul Wanner (Heidenheim).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) was quite harsh
and Tobias Reichel didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Adrian Beck departs the
field of play to be replaced by Julian Niehues

Julian Schuster has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Jan-Niklas Beste (Freiburg)

Substitution. Christian Gunter leaves the

Patrick Osterhage (Freiburg) replaces Vincenzo

Marius Bulter (Hoffenheim) is shown a yellow

Goal! Benedict Hollerbach (Union Berlin)

The score is 0:1.

Whoa! Such gestures are commonly penalised
and Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim) duly receives
a yellow card.

It's time for a substitution. Gift Orban
(Hoffenheim) comes on in place of Max Moerstedt.

Steffen Baumgart decides to make a substitution.
Ivan Prtajin will be replaced by Andrej

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Janik Haberer trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Lucas Tousart
(Union Berlin).

Steffen Baumgart prepares a substitution.
Tim Skarke is replaced by Marin Ljubicic
(Union Berlin).

Goal Marin Ljubicic (Union Berlin)! Marin
Ljubicic (Union Berlin) was put through
by Woo-Yeong Jeong and he showed brilliant
composure inside the box to fire into the
bottom right corner. 0:2.

Substitution. Marius Bulter did his best
and is replaced by Erencan Yardimci (Hoffenheim).

Here is a change. Kevin Akpoguma is going

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Bazoumana Toure (Hoffenheim)

Andrej Ilic (Union Berlin) receives a precise

shot into the top right corner. 0:3.

Christian Ilzer has decided to make a change.
Alexander Prass (Hoffenheim) replaces David
Jurasek.

That's the end of the game for Josip Juranovic,

Benedict Hollerbach (Union Berlin) gets

The manager makes a subsitution with Tom

Christopher Trimmel (Union Berlin) commits

Moritz Jenz (Mainz) is booked after bringing

Jess Thorup is forced to make a change.
Kristijan Jakic is not able to carry on

Samuel Essende (Augsburg) is booked.

Cedric Zesiger (Augsburg) is literally asking

Michael Silberbauer makes a switch. Maxim

It will be a substitution. Fredrik Jensen

Michael Silberbauer decides to make a substitution.

Maxim Leitsch (Mainz) picked up a yellow

Jess Thorup has decided to substitute Cedric

Jeffrey Gouweleeuw (Augsburg) picks up a

The referee looks satisfied after his VAR

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle

It's like he was asking for a caution. Robert

Here's the change. Nathan Tella leaves the

Problems for Patrick Kohlmann as Jens Stage

Anthony Jung (Werder Bremen) picked up a

A yellow card for bad language! Mitchell

Goal! Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) wins the

The referee shows the yellow card to Andre

Goal! Konrad Laimer displays great vision

Leon Goretzka (Bayern Munich) is shown a

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot

Goal Victor Boniface (Bayer Leverkusen)!
Victor Boniface (Bayer Leverkusen) was put

into the right side of the net. 1:0.

GOAL! Superb work from Aleix Garcia, who

Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim) gives the referee

Nathan Tella (Bayer Leverkusen) is substituted

The teams are back out for the second half

Emiliano Buendia fires in a promising shot

Sending-off! Alejandro Grimaldo (Bayer Leverkusen)

Substitution. Dennis Geiger will be replaced

Christian Ilzer prepares a substitution.

Christian Ilzer has decided to introduce

This is a yellow card! Aleix Garcia (Bayer

Tuta (Eintracht Frankfurt) puts the ball

Ellyes Skhiri comes off the pitch to be

Today's match ends for Mattias Svanberg

Ralph Hasenhuttl has decided to substitute

Can Yilmaz Uzun (Eintracht Frankfurt) scores

Yannick Gerhardt (Wolfsburg) receives a

Marco Rose has decided to make a substitution

Diogo Leite (Union Berlin) has tested the

Nicolas Seiwald comes off the pitch to be

Steffen Baumgart has decided to introduce

A yellow card is awarded to Laszlo Benes

Goal! Michael Olise shows great vision to

left corner. 1:0.

It's a goal! Harry Kane (Bayern Munich)

the bottom left corner. 2:0.

Vincent Kompany has made a change at the
break. Serge Gnabry (Bayern Munich) has

Raphael Guerreiro sends a superb cross into
the box. Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) latches
on to it and from close range plants a header
into the top right corner, leaving Timon
Weiner beaten. He displayed his eye for
goal there - excellent finish. The score
is 3:0.

Goal! Serge Gnabry (Bayern Munich) pounced
on a loose ball inside the box and beats
the goalkeeper with a shot into the top
right corner. He makes it 4:0.

Vincent Kompany has decided to substitute

Steven Skrzybski (Holstein Kiel) scores

Goal! The corner is whipped in and Kiliann

Frank Willenborg shows a yellow card to

Half-time substitution. Julien Duranville

and fired past Kevin Muller. 0:2.

What a brilliant finish! Mathias Honsak

Yellow card! It's like Gregor Kobel (Dortmund)

Frank Willenborg agrees and books him.

Serhou Guirassy (Dortmund) is awarded a

Here is an example of luck not being on
your side. A slightly disorientated Noahkai

Jess Thorup makes a switch. Arne Maier (Augsburg)

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Dimitrios Giannoulis (Augsburg) was quite
harsh and Tobias Reichel didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Phillip Tietz (Augsburg) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Samuel Essende.

Alexander Blessin has decided to substitute
Morgan Guilavogui and he is replaced by
Oladapo Afolayan (St. Pauli).

Johannes Eggestein (St. Pauli) has tested
the patience of referee Tobias Reichel and
goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

The game is interrupted because of a yellow
card that is shown to Noahkai Banks (Augsburg).

Substitution. Frank Onyeka makes way for
Mert Komur (Augsburg).

Jess Thorup has decided to make a change.
Robert Gumny (Augsburg) replaces Marius
Wolf.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Noahkai Banks walks off the pitch to
be replaced by Steve Mounie (Augsburg).

Manolis Saliakas (St. Pauli) has picked
up an injury and is replaced by Siebe Van
Der Heyden.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Johannes Eggestein trots
off the pitch and is replaced by Danel Sinani
(St. Pauli).

Mert Komur (Augsburg) finds the back of
the net! He connects with a fine cross and
sends the ball precisely inside the right
post!

Here is a change. Noah Weisshaupt is going
off and Alexander Blessin gives the last
tactical orders to Elias Saad (St. Pauli).

Robert Gumny (Augsburg) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Tobias Reichel
had an easy-decision to make.

summary.incident:
It's in the back of the net! Superb finishing
from Nathan Ngoumou (B. Monchengladbach).
Julian Weigl plays a fantastic through ball
and finds Nathan Ngoumou (B. Monchengladbach),
who reacts quickly to get in front of the
goalkeeper and fire a close-range shot into
the roof of the net. It's now 0:1.

A yellow-coloured card is received by Kevin
Stoger (B. Monchengladbach).

What bad luck! Nico Elvedi (B. Monchengladbach)
got in the way of a pass and unintentionally
sent the ball past his own goalkeeper. The
score is 1:1.

Ramon Hendriks (VfB Stuttgart) is booked
by the referee.

The whistle is blown for an infringement
and Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach)
receives a yellow card!

The substitution is prepared. Maximilian
Mittelstadt (VfB Stuttgart) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Ameen Al Dakhil.

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to substitute
Jamie Leweling and he is replaced by Chris
Fuhrich (VfB Stuttgart).

Yellow card. Maximilian Mittelstadt (VfB
Stuttgart) goes into the book for a bad
tackle on his opponent.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Ermedin Demirovic trots
off the pitch and is replaced by Deniz Undav
(VfB Stuttgart).

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Nathan Ngoumou as
he is replaced by Luca Netz (B. Monchengladbach).

Sebastian Hoeness decides to make a substitution.
Jacob Bruun Larsen will be replaced by Fabian
Rieder (VfB Stuttgart).

The substitution has been made. Yannik Keitel
(VfB Stuttgart) has replaced Enzo Millot.

Referee Robert Hartmann points to the centre
spot to indicate that the goal stands after
the VAR review. Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach)
goes wild in celebration.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Robin Hack walks off the pitch to be
replaced by Stefan Lainer (B. Monchengladbach).

Here is a change. Tim Kleindienst is going
off and Gerardo Seoane gives the last tactical
orders to Tomas Cvancara (B. Monchengladbach).

Substitution. Kevin Stoger makes way for
Marvin Friedrich (B. Monchengladbach).

Substitution. Fabio Cristian Chiarodia (B.
Monchengladbach) receives a signal from
the referee and is now allowed to enter
the pitch as Lukas Ullrich walks off.

Martin Petersen shows a yellow card to Robin
Zentner (Mainz) for his blatant foul.

Marvin Ducksch (Werder Bremen) has a great
chance to score from the penalty. He shoots
to the left post, but Robin Zentner leaps
out to thwart his attempt.

A shot is blocked but the rebound lands
at the feet of Leonardo Bittencourt (Werder
Bremen) who fires the ball into the back
of the net.

Bo Henriksen (Mainz) gets a yellow card,
off the field.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Marco Friedl (Werder Bremen) was quite
harsh and Martin Petersen didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Leonardo Bittencourt is substituted due
to injury. Ole Werner gives a chance to
Skelly Alvero (Werder Bremen).

Niklas Stark (Werder Bremen) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Martin Petersen
had an easy-decision to make.

Anthony Caci (Mainz) has tested the patience
of referee Martin Petersen and goes into
the book for a previous late challenge.

Bo Henriksen has decided to make a substitution
during the half-time break. Hyun-Seok Hong
comes on the pitch for Nadiem Amiri (Mainz).

Stefan Bell is being substituted because
of an injury. Bo Henriksen sends Maxim Leitsch
(Mainz) on the pitch.

Here comes a substitution. Marvin Ducksch
is given a rest as he is replaced by Marco
Grull (Werder Bremen).

Ole Werner has decided to make a change.
Derrick Kohn (Werder Bremen) replaces Issa
Kabore.

The substitution is prepared. Armindo Sieb
(Mainz) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Nelson Weiper.

Romano Schmid (Werder Bremen) has tested
the patience of referee Martin Petersen
and goes into the book for a previous late
challenge.

Jae-Sung Lee (Mainz) goes into the book
for a horrible tackle. A yellow card is
necessary in this case.

Bo Henriksen decides to make a substitution.
Anthony Caci will be replaced by Silvan
Widmer (Mainz).

A substitution has been made. Phillipp Mwene
is replaced by Arnaud Nordin (Mainz).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Amos Pieper (Werder Bremen)
is coming onto the pitch as Anthony Jung
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Michael Zetterer (Werder Bremen) violates
the laws of the game and is shown a deserved
yellow card by the referee.

Martin Petersen shows a yellow card to Senne
Lynen (Werder Bremen) for his blatant foul.

Niklas Stark (Werder Bremen) receives a
second yellow card and is sent off.

Was it necessary? Marco Friedl (Werder Bremen)
is shown a second yellow card for dissent
and has to leave the pitch. Martin Petersen
had no hesitation in issuing a red card!

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Mitchell Weiser (Werder Bremen) was quite
harsh and Martin Petersen didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Goal! Jackson Irvine plays a pass to the
feet of Morgan Guilavogui (St. Pauli), and
he shoots into the roof of the net from
inside the box. It's 1:0.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Andras Schafer (Union Berlin) was quite
harsh and Soren Storks didn't hesitate to
show him a yellow card.

Alexander Blessin has decided to make a
substitution during the half-time break.
Carlo Boukhalfa comes on the pitch for Lars
Ritzka (St. Pauli).

The need to improve in the second half has
brought about a change. Andras Schafer (Union
Berlin) comes off for Laszlo Benes.

Laszlo Benes (Union Berlin) makes a bad
tackle on his opponent and is angry when
the referee shows him a deserved yellow
card.

It's in the back of the net! Johannes Eggestein
slips the ball through to Morgan Guilavogui
(St. Pauli), and he darts into the box to
unleash a magnificent low shot into the
back of the net. He makes it 2:0.

Leopold Querfeld (Union Berlin) receives
a yellow card from the referee as expected.
Leopold Querfeld (Union Berlin) will miss
the next game.

Here comes a substitution. Kevin Volland
(Union Berlin) is brought on as a substitute
for Jordan Siebatcheu.

Steffen Baumgart has decided to substitute
Leopold Querfeld and he is replaced by Yorbe
Vertessen (Union Berlin).

Substitution. Tim Skarke (Union Berlin)
replaces Janik Haberer.

Here is a change. Robert Skov is going off
and Steffen Baumgart gives the last tactical
orders to Tom Rothe (Union Berlin).

Alexander Blessin has decided to make a
change. Oladapo Afolayan (St. Pauli) replaces
Noah Weisshaupt.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Danel Sinani (St. Pauli)
replaces Johannes Eggestein.

Alexander Blessin decides to make a substitution.
Manolis Saliakas will be replaced by Fin
Stevens (St. Pauli).

Goal! Morgan Guilavogui shows great vision
to find Danel Sinani (St. Pauli) with a
cheeky pass inside the box, and his first-time
shot is precise and sails into the roof
of the net. 3:0.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Morgan Guilavogui departs
the field of play to be replaced by Scott
Banks (St. Pauli).

Goal! Hugo Ekitike (Eintracht Frankfurt)
runs up to the ball, stops and waits for
Luca Philipp to commit before slotting the
penalty into the bottom right corner.

Arthur Chaves (Hoffenheim) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Sascha Stegemann
had an easy-decision to make.

The goal by Hoffenheim won't count as it
has been disallowed due to offside on the
advice of the video assistant referee!

Substitution. Mario Gotze is replaced by
Fares Chaibi (Eintracht Frankfurt).

Here is a change. Can Yilmaz Uzun is going
off and Dino Toppmoller gives the last tactical
orders to Tuta (Eintracht Frankfurt).

Gift Orban (Hoffenheim) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Max Moerstedt.

Goal! Gift Orban (Hoffenheim) fires home
from very close range after latching on
to a pass from Adam Hlozek. The score is
1:1.

It's a goal! Rasmus Kristensen plays a lovely
pass into the box and finds Hugo Ekitike
(Eintracht Frankfurt). He tries his luck
from close range and coolly strikes the
ball into the back of the net. 1:2.

Substitution. Pavel Kaderabek (Hoffenheim)
on for Valentin Gendrey.

Christian Ilzer has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Marius Bulter (Hoffenheim)
replacing Finn Ole Becker.

A substitution has been made. Hugo Ekitike
goes off and Igor Matanovic (Eintracht Frankfurt)
comes on.

Anton Stach (Hoffenheim) makes a bad challenge
on his opponent and is booked by the referee.

Christian Ilzer decides to make a substitution.
Tom Bischof will be replaced by Dennis Geiger
(Hoffenheim).

It's time for a substitution. Timothy Chandler
(Eintracht Frankfurt) comes on in place
of Hugo Larsson.

Dino Toppmoller has decided to make a change.
Jean-Matteo Bahoya (Eintracht Frankfurt)
replaces Ansgar Knauff.

Goal! Adam Hlozek (Hoffenheim) unleashes
a first-time shot from inside the box and
beats the goalkeeper into the bottom right
corner. 2:2.

The referee is firm and issues Adam Hlozek
(Hoffenheim) a deserved yellow card.

Nico Elvedi (B. Monchengladbach) shouldn't
be surprised it's a yellow from the ref,
who cooled the situation down well.

Kevin Stoger finds Rocco Reitz (B. Monchengladbach)
with a sweet pass inside the penalty box,
who then smashes the ball inside the right
post. What a clinical finish to make it
1:0.

Robin Hack (B. Monchengladbach) finishes
his beautiful individual effort with a superb
strike from inside the box. Patrick Drewes
is just a bystander as the ball flies into
bottom right corner. The score is 2:0.

Felix Passlack (Bochum) takes his opponent
down and receives a yellow card from the
referee.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Moritz Broschinski (Bochum) is replacing
Myron Boadu.

Dieter Hecking prepares a substitution.
Anthony Losilla is replaced by Lukas Daschner
(Bochum).

Substitution. Felix Passlack will be replaced
by Gerrit Holtmann (Bochum).

Gerardo Seoane has decided to substitute
Tomas Cvancara and he is replaced by Nathan
Ngoumou (B. Monchengladbach).

A substitution has been made. Robin Hack
goes off and Luca Netz (B. Monchengladbach)
comes on.

Gerardo Seoane decides to make a substitution.
Kevin Stoger will be replaced by Philipp
Sander (B. Monchengladbach).

Gerrit Holtmann (Bochum) is cautioned by
the referee for a foul that he committed
a little earlier.

Substitution. Jakov Medic is replaced by
Cristian Gamboa (Bochum).

The substitution has been made. Mats Pannewig
(Bochum) has replaced Ibrahima Sissoko.

Patrick Drewes (Bochum) receives a yellow
card for a nasty tackle.

Matthias Jollenbeck shows a yellow card
to Dieter Hecking (Bochum) for his unsportsmanlike
behavior after the match has ended.

Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach) places
the ball on the penalty spot and sends it
towards the middle of the target. His effort
isn't powerful nor precise enough, allowing
Patrick Drewes to keep the ball out of the
net.

Goal! Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach)
was in the right place at the right time
to get to the rebound inside the box and
gleefully rifles the ball low into the middle
of the net. It's 3:0.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Florian Neuhaus (B. Monchengladbach)
comes onto the pitch so that Rocco Reitz
can be given a rest.

Gerardo Seoane has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Fabio Cristian Chiarodia
(B. Monchengladbach) replacing Lukas Ullrich.

A great solo run by Leo Scienza (Heidenheim)
took him deep inside the box, but his weak
effort low towards the middle of the goal
was easily caught by Finn Dahmen.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Luca Kerber trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Sirlord Conteh
(Heidenheim).

Frank Schmidt decides to make a substitution.
Adrian Beck will be replaced by Marvin Pieringer
(Heidenheim).

Substitution. Arne Maier walks off the pitch
and Mert Komur (Augsburg) comes on as a
substitute.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Marius Wolf departs the
field of play to be replaced by Robert Gumny
(Augsburg).

It will be a substitution. Keven Schlotterbeck
(Augsburg) is ready to enter the pitch as
Noahkai Banks walks off.

Frank Schmidt has decided to substitute
Omar Haktab Traore and he is replaced by
Marnon Busch (Heidenheim).

The substitution is prepared. Leo Scienza
(Heidenheim) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Frans Kratzig.

Goal! Marnon Busch tees up Patrick Mainka
(Heidenheim) on the edge of the box and
he fires the ball into the top of the net.
1:1.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Phillip Tietz (Augsburg)

Jess Thorup prepares a substitution. Alexis
Claude-Maurice is replaced by Fredrik Jensen

Booking. Robert Gumny (Augsburg) receives

Substitution. Paul Wanner leaves the pitch
and is replaced by Maximilian Breunig (Heidenheim).

A well-taken corner kick finds Keven Schlotterbeck
(Augsburg) who heads home. His precise effort

Julian Ryerson (Dortmund) has tested the
patience of referee Christian Dingert and
goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

Felix Nmecha is being substituted because
of an injury. Mike Tullberg sends Marcel
Sabitzer (Dortmund) on the pitch.

We have witnessed a sending-off! Nico Schlotterbeck
(Dortmund) is given a red card for his dangerous
challenge. Christian Dingert's decision
is final.

Serhou Guirassy (Dortmund) gets on the end
of a delightful cross and powers a sweet
header towards goal that goes in off the
crossbar!

Here is an example of luck not being on
your side. A slightly disorientated Marco
Friedl (Werder Bremen) puts the ball into
his own net.

Ole Werner has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Issa Kabore (Werder Bremen) replacing
Derrick Kohn.

Substitution. Senne Lynen leaves the pitch
and is replaced by Leonardo Bittencourt
(Werder Bremen).

The substitution is prepared. Justin Njinmah
(Werder Bremen) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Marco Grull.

Here comes a substitution. Julien Duranville
(Dortmund) is brought on as a substitute
for Karim Adeyemi.

Here is a change. Jamie Gittens is going
off and Mike Tullberg gives the last tactical
orders to Maximilian Beier (Dortmund).

Christian Dingert shows a yellow card to
Leonardo Bittencourt (Werder Bremen) for
his blatant foul.

Leonardo Bittencourt (Werder Bremen) scores
as he latches on to a pass and unleashes
a perfect strike from the edge of the box
that goes into the top left corner of the
goal and past the goalkeeper.

Goal! A great through ball by Jens Stage
sets up Marvin Ducksch (Werder Bremen) inside
the box, and he makes no mistake and bangs
the ball into the left side of the goal.
2:2.

Mike Tullberg has decided to substitute
Julian Brandt and he is replaced by Waldemar
Anton (Dortmund).

Christian Dingert rightly pulls out a yellow
card and shows it to Justin Njinmah (Werder
Bremen).

It's time for a substitution. Oliver Burke
(Werder Bremen) comes on in place of Marvin
Ducksch.

Jens Stage (Werder Bremen) sees a yellow
card from Christian Dingert after he sent
one of the opposing players to the ground.

Marco Friedl (Werder Bremen) is shown a
yellow card for a late challenge.

Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) creates some
space for himself just outside the penalty
area after getting on the end of an amazing
pass and smashes the ball into the back
of the net!

Leon Goretzka is not able to continue due
to his injury and will be replaced by Josip
Stanisic (Bayern Munich).

Julian Schuster has decided to make a substitution
during the half-time break. Matthias Ginter
(Freiburg) comes on the pitch for Max Rosenfelder.

Lukas Kubler (Freiburg) is shown a yellow
card by the referee for making a challenge
on his opponent, but he looks angry with
the decision.

Min-Jae Kim (Bayern Munich) meets the corner
and displays his eye for goal as he coolly
plants a header from close range into the
left side of the goal. The score is 0:2.

Noah Atubolu (Freiburg) is arguing with
the referee and is given a caution.

Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) has to be very
careful for the rest of the match after
receiving a yellow card from the referee
for a bad tackle on an opponent.

Vincent Kompany prepares a substitution.
Serge Gnabry is replaced by Kingsley Coman
(Bayern Munich).

That's the end of the game for Leroy Sane,
who is replaced by Michael Olise (Bayern
Munich).

Matthias Ginter (Freiburg) meets the corner
and displays his eye for goal as he coolly
plants a header from close range into the
bottom left corner. The score is 1:2.

The substitution is prepared. Junior Adamu
(Freiburg) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Lucas Holer.

What was Ritsu Doan (Freiburg) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee
shows him a yellow card.

Here is a change. Eren Dinkci is going off
and Julian Schuster gives the last tactical
orders to Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg).

Here comes a substitution. Johan Manzambi
(Freiburg) is brought on as a substitute
for Maximilian Eggestein.

Vincent Kompany has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich)
replacing Jamal Musiala.

Joao Palhinha (Bayern Munich) joins the
action as a substitute, replacing Raphael
Guerreiro.

That will be all from Jordy Makengo who
is being replaced by the fresh legs of Michael
Gregoritsch (Freiburg).

The referee cannot ignore such behaviour.
Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) sees a yellow
card and needs to watch himself for the
rest of the game.

Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) sees a yellow
card. He should be more careful because
one more challenge like that could result
in a red card.

Kaishu Sano (Mainz) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Tobias Stieler had an
easy-decision to make.

Paul Nebel is in a good shooting position,
but he sees his teammate and passes the
ball to him. Nelson Weiper (Mainz) takes
it nicely and beats the goalkeeper with
a precise shot into the bottom left corner
to make the score 1:0.

Whoa! Such gestures are commonly penalised
and Nelson Weiper (Mainz) duly receives
a yellow card.

Robin Zentner (Mainz) is arguing with the
referee and is given a caution.

Jae-Sung Lee (Mainz) has to be very careful
for the rest of the match after receiving
a yellow card from the referee for a bad
tackle on an opponent.

Atakan Karazor (VfB Stuttgart) has tested
the patience of referee Tobias Stieler and
goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

Substitution. Maximilian Mittelstadt makes
way for Ramon Hendriks (VfB Stuttgart).

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to make a
change. Jamie Leweling (VfB Stuttgart) replaces
Chris Fuhrich.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Danny da Costa leaves the
pitch and Andreas Hanche-Olsen (Mainz) comes
on.

Angelo Stiller (VfB Stuttgart) is cautioned
by the referee for a foul that he committed
a little earlier.

Here comes a substitution. Jacob Bruun Larsen
is given a rest as he is replaced by Ermedin
Demirovic (VfB Stuttgart).

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Fabian Rieder (VfB Stuttgart)
replacing Atakan Karazor.

Nelson Weiper comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Armindo Sieb (Mainz).

Maxim Leitsch (Mainz) joins the action as
a substitute, replacing Dominik Kohr.

Goal! Anthony Caci (Mainz) beautifully controls
a strongly hit pass from Armindo Sieb inside
the box. He cuts inside his marker and rifles
the ball into the bottom right corner. 2:0.

The manager makes a subsitution with Jeff
Chabot (VfB Stuttgart) coming on for Anthony
Rouault.

Bo Henriksen prepares a substitution. Anthony
Caci is replaced by Silvan Widmer (Mainz).

Jeff Chabot (VfB Stuttgart) receives a yellow
card from the referee for a foul that he
committed a little earlier.

Goal! Patrik Schick (Bayer Leverkusen) was
in the right place at the right time to
get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball into the top of the net.
It's 0:1.

Goal! Aleix Garcia (Bayer Leverkusen) finds
himself some space inside the box to get
on the end of a pass from Florian Wirtz,
then sends the ball into the bottom right
corner. 0:2.

Robert Andrich (Bayer Leverkusen) can't
expect anything else than a yellow card
for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is.
Bastian Dankert didn't think twice about
pulling it out of his pocket.

Goal! David Raum (RB Leipzig) takes the
resulting free-kick from the edge of the
box, but the ball takes a deflection off
a defender and goes past the helpless Lukas
Hradecky and into the net. 1:2.

Edmond Tapsoba (Bayer Leverkusen) is literally
asking for a yellow card with his behaviour.
The referee agrees and books him.

Xabi Alonso makes a half-time substitution.
Exequiel Palacios (Bayer Leverkusen) comes
on in place of Robert Andrich.

The manager has been forced to make a substitution
and the injured Kevin Kampl (RB Leipzig)
leaves the pitch to be replaced by Nicolas
Seiwald.

Marco Rose decides to make a substitution.
Arthur Vermeeren will be replaced by Amadou
Haidara (RB Leipzig).

Xabi Alonso prepares a substitution. Patrik
Schick is replaced by Nathan Tella (Bayer
Leverkusen).

The manager makes a subsitution with Jeremie
Frimpong (Bayer Leverkusen) coming on for
Arthur.

Here's the change. Antonio Nusa leaves the
pitch and Christoph Baumgartner (RB Leipzig)
comes on as a substitute.

Substitution. Lukas Klostermann makes way
for Ridle Baku (RB Leipzig).

A substitution has been made. Lois Openda
goes off and Yussuf Poulsen (RB Leipzig)
comes on.

A yellow card for a tackle by Xavi Simons
(RB Leipzig). Bastian Dankert doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

OWN GOAL! The free kick is whipped in and
Edmond Tapsoba (Bayer Leverkusen) is unlucky
enough to head the ball into his own net.
2:2.

Bastian Dankert shows a yellow card to Christoph
Baumgartner (RB Leipzig) for a tough tackle.

Goal! Dominik Javorcek launched the corner
kick and superbly found the head of David
Zec (Holstein Kiel), whose accurate effort
from near the penalty spot went straight
into the top left corner. It's 0:1.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by David Zec (Holstein Kiel) was quite harsh
and Sven Jablonski didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Ralph Hasenhuttl makes a switch. Andreas
Skov Olsen is coming on in place of Kilian
Fischer (Wolfsburg) at the start of the
second period.

Here is a change after the half-time break.
Yannick Gerhardt (Wolfsburg) is replaced
by Patrick Wimmer.

Goal! Jonas Wind displays great vision and
sends a pass to Patrick Wimmer (Wolfsburg),
who shows brilliant composure inside the
box to bury the ball into the back of the
net. The score is 1:1.

Jonas Wind (Wolfsburg) meets the corner
and displays his eye for goal as he coolly
plants a header from close range into the
left side of the goal. The score is 2:1.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Steven Skrzybski (Holstein
Kiel) comes onto the pitch for Shuto Machino.

Patrick Wimmer (Wolfsburg) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Sven Jablonski
had an easy-decision to make. Patrick Wimmer
(Wolfsburg) will miss the next game.

Magnus Knudsen comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Jann-Fiete Arp (Holstein Kiel).

Ralph Hasenhuttl prepares a substitution.
Mattias Svanberg is replaced by Sebastiaan
Bornauw (Wolfsburg).

That's the end of the game for Phil Harres,
who is replaced by Benedikt Pichler (Holstein
Kiel).

Marcel Rapp has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Armin Gigovic (Holstein Kiel)
replacing Andu Yobel Kelati.

Substitution. Dominik Javorcek will be replaced
by John Tolkin (Holstein Kiel).

Goal! A terrific long pass from Benedikt
Pichler picks out an unmarked Steven Skrzybski
(Holstein Kiel) inside the box. He has time
and space to pick his spot and slams the
ball into the right side of the goal. 2:2.

Substitution. Tiago Tomas did his best and
is replaced by Aster Vranckx (Wolfsburg).

Ralph Hasenhuttl decides to make a substitution.
Konstantinos Koulierakis will be replaced
by Lukas Nmecha (Wolfsburg).

This is a yellow card! Joakim Maehle (Wolfsburg)
is not happy with the decision, but from
our point of view it was clear.

Nicolai Remberg (Holstein Kiel) is given
a fully deserved yellow card.

Sven Jablonski shows a yellow card to Jann-Fiete
Arp (Holstein Kiel) for his blatant foul.

Benedikt Pichler (Holstein Kiel) violates
the laws of the game and is shown a deserved
yellow card by the referee.

Samuel Essende (Augsburg) unleashes a ferocious
shot from just outside the penalty area
and the ball goes into the left side of
the goal!

Samuel Essende (Augsburg) scores from a
quite difficult position as he leaps high
to connect with a cross and powers his header
low inside the left post. Excellent finish.

Marvin Ducksch (Werder Bremen) is punished
with a yellow card for violating the rules.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Skelly Alvero (Werder
Bremen) is coming onto the pitch as Leonardo
Bittencourt cannot continue after picking
up an injury.

Jess Thorup has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Phillip Tietz (Augsburg) replacing
Samuel Essende.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Mert Komur (Augsburg) is replacing Arne
Maier.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Noahkai Banks (Augsburg)
replaces Jeffrey Gouweleeuw.

Cedric Zesiger (Augsburg) is awarded a yellow
card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to
agree with the decision, but Benjamin Brand
ignores the protests.

The game has come to an end for Marvin Ducksch.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Justin Njinmah (Werder Bremen).

Ole Werner has decided to make a change.
Julian Malatini (Werder Bremen) replaces
Niklas Stark.

Substitution. Derrick Kohn will be replaced
by Issa Kabore (Werder Bremen).

Today's match ends for Alexis Claude-Maurice
who will be replaced by Fredrik Jensen (Augsburg).

Benjamin Brand shows a yellow card to Elvis
Rexhbecaj (Augsburg), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

That's the end of the game for Marco Grull,
who is replaced by Oliver Burke (Werder
Bremen).

Jess Thorup decides to make a substitution.
Henri Koudossou will be replaced by Marius
Wolf (Augsburg).

Goal! It's a catastrophic error from the
opponent which has gifted a chance to Benedict
Hollerbach (Union Berlin), who rolls the
ball into the back of the net from close
range. 1:0.

Goal! Nadiem Amiri (Mainz) wins the battle
of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty
past Alexander Schwolow into the bottom
left corner.

Goal! Robert Skov (Union Berlin) wins the
battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Robin Zentner into the bottom
right corner.

Anthony Caci (Mainz) is awarded a yellow
card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to
agree with the decision, but Florian Exner
ignores the protests.

Today's referee Florian Exner rightly decides
to book Stefan Bell (Mainz) for his harsh
tackle.

Aljoscha Kemlein (Union Berlin) receives
a yellow card for infringement.

Substitution. Josip Juranovic walks off
the pitch and Christopher Trimmel (Union
Berlin) comes on as a substitute.

Here is a change. Jordan Siebatcheu is going
off and Steffen Baumgart gives the last
tactical orders to Tim Skarke (Union Berlin).

It's time for a substitution. Nelson Weiper
(Mainz) comes on in place of Anthony Caci.

Substitution. Silvan Widmer (Mainz) on for
Armindo Sieb.

Michael Silberbauer prepares a substitution.
Danny da Costa is replaced by Andreas Hanche-Olsen
(Mainz).

The referee signals a substitution. Rani
Khedira (Union Berlin) is brought on as
a substitute for Andras Schafer.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Stefan Bell leaves the pitch
and Maxim Leitsch (Mainz) comes on.

Substitution. Nikolas Veratschnig (Mainz)
receives a signal from the referee and is
now allowed to enter the pitch as Phillipp

Steffen Baumgart has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Jerome Roussillon (Union

Benedict Hollerbach comes off the pitch

The foul by Leopold Querfeld (Union Berlin)

Martin Terrier (Bayer Leverkusen) is substituted

Goal! Florian Wirtz (Bayer Leverkusen) weaves

a magnificent effort from the edge of the
box into the bottom right corner. Moritz
Nicolas had no chance of reaching it. The
score is 1:0.

Tomas Cvancara (B. Monchengladbach) gives
the referee no choice but to show him a
yellow card.

Goal! Florian Wirtz (Bayer Leverkusen) wins
the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Moritz Nicolas into right side
of the goal.

Nathan Tella comes off the pitch to be replaced
by Jeremie Frimpong (Bayer Leverkusen).

It's in the back of the net! Superb finishing
from Patrik Schick (Bayer Leverkusen). Florian
Wirtz plays a fantastic through ball and
finds Patrik Schick (Bayer Leverkusen),
who reacts quickly to get in front of the
goalkeeper and fire a close-range shot into
the bottom right corner. 3:0.

Here's the change. Tomas Cvancara leaves
the pitch and Alassane Plea (B. Monchengladbach)
comes on as a substitute.

Gerardo Seoane has decided to make a change.
Kevin Stoger (B. Monchengladbach) replaces
Robin Hack.

It will be a substitution. Luca Netz (B.
Monchengladbach) is ready to enter the pitch
as Lukas Ullrich walks off.

Here is a change. Florian Wirtz is going
off and Xabi Alonso gives the last tactical
orders to Jonas Hofmann (Bayer Leverkusen).

Substitution. Fabio Cristian Chiarodia (B.
Monchengladbach) in, Rocco Reitz out.

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Substitution. Exequiel Palacios (Bayer Leverkusen)

Gerardo Seoane has decided to introduce

It's a goal! Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach)

and the score changes to 3:1.

Stefan Lainer (B. Monchengladbach) makes
it easy for the referee to show him a yellow

Goal! Joshua Kimmich tees up Leon Goretzka
(Bayern Munich) on the edge of the box and
he fires the ball into the bottom left corner.
1:0.

Goal! Mohamed Amoura (Wolfsburg) pounced
on a loose ball inside the box and beats
the goalkeeper with a shot inside the right
post. He makes it 1:1.

GOAL after a blunder! Keeper Kamil Grabara
makes a complete hash of a weak mid range
shot from Michael Olise (Bayern Munich)
and let’s the ball squirm into the net.
It’s now 2:1.

Joakim Maehle (Wolfsburg) makes it easy
for the referee to show him a yellow card.

The goal by Bayern Munich is DISALLOWED
on the advice of the video assistant referee
due to a handball.

It must be a yellow card. It is. Patrick
Wimmer (Wolfsburg) receives the caution
after an awful tackle.

Perfectly executed free kick. Michael Olise
floats the ball in and Leon Goretzka (Bayern
Munich) leaps high to connect with it near
the penalty spot. His bullet header flicks
off the post into the right side of the
goal. The score is now 3:1.

Ralph Hasenhuttl decides to make a substitution.
Yannick Gerhardt will be replaced by Aster
Vranckx (Wolfsburg).

Substitution. Tiago Tomas (Wolfsburg) has

It's time for a substitution. Serge Gnabry
(Bayern Munich) comes on in place of Leroy
Sane.

Ralph Hasenhuttl prepares a substitution.
Bence Dardai is replaced by Mattias Svanberg

The game has come to an end for Patrick
Wimmer. He has contributed as much as he
could today. He will be replaced by the

Jamal Musiala (Bayern Munich) joins the
action as a substitute, replacing Kingsley
Coman.

Tobias Reichel shows a yellow card to Konrad
Laimer (Bayern Munich) for his blatant foul.
Konrad Laimer (Bayern Munich) will miss
the next game because of that yellow card.

It's 3:2! Tiago Tomas feeds Mohamed Amoura
(Wolfsburg) inside the box, who is unmarked

the net.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Kilian Fischer (Wolfsburg) was quite
harsh and Tobias Reichel didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

The RB Leipzig players can't believe it
after the referee disallows the goal after
the intervention of the VAR!

Robert Hartmann shows a yellow card to Matus
Bero (Bochum) for his blatant foul.

Goal! Willi Orban (RB Leipzig) collects
a pass and without hesitation fires an unstoppable

The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet
of Antonio Nusa (RB Leipzig) just outside
the box. He doesn't think twice and fires
a brilliant shot into the bottom left corner.
His attempt was beyond the reach of Patrick
Drewes. 0:2.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Felix Passlack (Bochum) was quite harsh
and Robert Hartmann didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Goal! Christoph Baumgartner (RB Leipzig)
finds himself some space inside the box

Dieter Hecking has decided to make a substitution

Goal! Gerrit Holtmann plays a simple square

in the box, who composes himself and lashes
the ball low into the middle of the goal.
1:3.

GOAL! Moritz Broschinski meets a cross inside
the box and heads the ball across the goal,
where Myron Boadu (Bochum) lurks and pokes
it into the back of the net. 2:3.

Goal! Myron Boadu (Bochum) runs up to the
ball, stops and waits for Peter Gulacsi
to commit before slotting the penalty into
the roof of the net.

Ibrahima Sissoko (Bochum) is punished with

The referee stops play so that a substitution

The referee signals that it is time for

It's like he was asking for a caution. Ivan
Ordets (Bochum) receives a yellow card.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Lukas Daschner (Bochum) is replacing Myron
Boadu.

Here is a change. Dani de Wit is going off

Goal! Johannes Eggestein (St. Pauli) runs

James Sands (St. Pauli) is literally asking

The teams are back out for the second half

The need to improve in the second half has

Substitution. Jan Schoppner makes his way

Eric Smith (St. Pauli) sees a yellow card.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle

The Heidenheim players can't believe it

Goal! Adam Hlozek (Hoffenheim) unleashes

Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) finishes his

Timon Weiner (Holstein Kiel) has received

Problems for Christian Ilzer as Erencan

Problems for Julian Schuster as Matthias

The referee looks satisfied after his VAR

The Stuttgart players look gutted.

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot

Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart) gets booked

Philipp Lienhart (Freiburg) violates the

The main referee, Felix Zwayer, is apparently

Vincenzo Grifo goes off the pitch and Eren

Jacob Bruun Larsen (VfB Stuttgart) is rightly

Jordy Makengo (Freiburg) receives a yellow

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle

harsh and Felix Zwayer didn't hesitate to

Goal - 1:0! Rasmus Kristensen tees up Hugo

Half-time substitution. Ramy Bensebaini

It's time for a substitution. That's the

Nuri Sahin has decided to substitute Felix

The referee signals that it is time for

Oscar Hojlund (Eintracht Frankfurt) joins

Emre Can (Dortmund) sees a yellow! His tackle

Serhou Guirassy (Dortmund) is cautioned

Dino Toppmoller has decided to introduce

That will be all from Julian Ryerson who

Goal! It's a catastrophic error from the

Today's match ends for Hugo Ekitike who

Goal! Thomas Muller plays a simple square

Goal! Harry Kane tees up Raphael Guerreiro

2:0.

Goal! Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) wins the

Problems for Christian Ilzer as Diadie Samassekou

There will be a change on the pitch for

Half-time substitution. Erencan Yardimci

It's in the back of the net! Mathys Tel

Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) is booked

Substitution. Leon Goretzka (Bayern Munich)

Serge Gnabry (Bayern Munich) receives a

It's time for a substitution. Michael Olise

A substitution has been made. Valentin Gendrey

The referee shows the yellow card to Pavel

Deniz Undav (VfB Stuttgart) makes a bad

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to substitute

Lutsharel Geertruida (RB Leipzig) joins

Jamie Leweling (VfB Stuttgart) is rightly

Having seen unsporting behavior, Sascha

Lois Openda (RB Leipzig) receives a yellow

El Chadaille Bitshiabu (RB Leipzig) is booked

Alexis Claude-Maurice (Augsburg) scores

His attempt was beyond the reach of Michael

The main referee, Matthias Jollenbeck, is

Skelly Alvero (Werder Bremen) is given a

Leo Scienza (Heidenheim) takes a wonderful

Robin Koch (Eintracht Frankfurt) sees a

Omar Marmoush (Eintracht Frankfurt) produces

corner of the net!

Nnamdi Collins (Eintracht Frankfurt) is

Harm Osmers had an easy-decision to make.

Substitution. Oladapo Afolayan leaves the
pitch and is replaced by Noah Weisshaupt

Dino Toppmoller has decided to introduce

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Oscar Hojlund (Eintracht

Ekitike cannot continue after picking up
an injury.

Here is a change. Danel Sinani is going
off and Alexander Blessin gives the last

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and James Sands (St. Pauli)

Substitution. Nathaniel Brown walks off
the pitch and Tuta (Eintracht Frankfurt)

Dino Toppmoller has decided to substitute

Substitution. David Nemeth did his best

Rasmus Kristensen (Eintracht Frankfurt)

Goal! Nathan Tella (Bayer Leverkusen) has

with a headed pass. 0:1.

Goal! Piero Hincapie displays great vision
and sends a pass to Patrik Schick (Bayer
Leverkusen), who shows brilliant composure
inside the box to bury the ball into the
top right corner. The score is 0:2.

Goal! Jamie Gittens (Dortmund) fires the
rebound into the roof of the net after the
ball breaks to him in the box. The score
is 1:2.

Jeremie Frimpong sends a precise lofted
cross into the box. Patrik Schick (Bayer
Leverkusen) latches on to it and finishes
with a quick shot into the bottom left corner.
The goalkeeper had no chance. The score
changes to 1:3.

Substitution. Patrik Schick is replaced
by Florian Wirtz (Bayer Leverkusen).

Nuri Sahin has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Julien Duranville (Dortmund)
replacing Karim Adeyemi.

Substitution. Nathan Tella leaves the pitch
and is replaced by Martin Terrier (Bayer
Leverkusen).

Tobias Stieler shows a yellow card to Edmond
Tapsoba (Bayer Leverkusen) for his blatant
foul.

A substitution has been made. Jamie Gittens
is replaced by Donyell Malen (Dortmund).

Nuri Sahin prepares a substitution. Almugera
Kabar is replaced by Marcel Sabitzer (Dortmund).

We are about to witness a subsitution. Giovanni
Reyna (Dortmund) for Maximilian Beier.

Serhou Guirassy (Dortmund) smoothly converts
the penalty with a beautiful low drive into
the right side of the goal.

It is time for a substitution. Arthur (Bayer
Leverkusen) is on for Jeremie Frimpong.

Xabi Alonso decides to make a substitution.
Alejandro Grimaldo will be replaced by Exequiel
Palacios (Bayer Leverkusen).

The referee stops play so that a substitution

(Dortmund).

Felix Nmecha (Dortmund) is punished with
a yellow card for violating the rules.

Donyell Malen (Dortmund) blasts the ball
inside the right post after a well-executed

his strong and precise shot, the goalkeeper
had no chance of stopping it.

Julian Brandt looks around to decide who
he is going to pass to. He picks out Maximilian
Beier (Dortmund), who collects the ball
perfectly and unleashes a terrific shot
that ricochets in off the left post. The
score is 0:2.

Goal! Maximilian Beier sets up Julian Brandt
(Dortmund) for a shot on the edge of the
box. He doesn't hit the cleanest of shots,
but the ball somehow finds its way into
the bottom left corner. 0:3.

The need to improve in the second half has
brought about a change. Kilian Fischer comes
off for Tiago Tomas (Wolfsburg).

Ralph Hasenhuttl makes a switch. Lukas Nmecha
(Wolfsburg) is coming on in place of Mattias
Svanberg at the start of the second period.

Konstantinos Koulierakis (Wolfsburg) takes
his opponent down and receives a yellow
card from the referee.

The foul by Yannick Gerhardt (Wolfsburg)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Matthias Jollenbeck.

Denis Vavro (Wolfsburg) meets the corner
and displays his eye for goal as he coolly
plants a bullet header from close range
low into the middle of the net. The score
is 1:3.

We have witnessed a sending-off! Pascal
Gross (Dortmund) is given a red card for
his dangerous challenge. Matthias Jollenbeck's
decision is final.

Donyell Malen (Dortmund) is given a yellow
card.

A substitution has been made. Donyell Malen
is replaced by Waldemar Anton (Dortmund).

Matthias Jollenbeck shows a yellow card

The referee stops play so that a substitution

It's time for a substitution. That's the

Nuri Sahin prepares a substitution. Jamie

We are about to witness a subsitution. Giovanni

Matthias Jollenbeck has issued a yellow

Ibrahima Sissoko sends a precise lofted

had no chance. The score changes to 1:0.

Bernardo (Bochum) goes into the referee's

Jan Schoppner (Heidenheim) receives a yellow
card from the referee for a foul that he
committed a little earlier.

Paul Wanner (Heidenheim) commits a foul
and is shown a yellow card without any hesitation

Matus Bero (Bochum) collects a sweet pass
inside the penalty box and smashes the ball
inside the left post. What a clinical finish!

Frank Schmidt makes a switch. Mikkel Kaufmann
Sorensen is coming on in place of Paul Wanner
(Heidenheim) at the start of the second
period.

Frank Schmidt has made a change at the break.
Stefan Schimmer has come on in place of

The need to improve in the second half has

Marvin Pieringer (Heidenheim) shouldn't

Thomas Keller (Heidenheim) is cautioned

What was Matus Bero (Bochum) thinking? He
will not get away with that. The referee

Substitution. Thomas Keller did his best
and is replaced by Luca Kerber (Heidenheim).

Luca Kerber (Heidenheim) takes his opponent
down and receives a yellow card from the

The referee cannot ignore such behaviour.
Tim Siersleben (Heidenheim) sees a yellow

The game has come to an end for Maximilian
Wittek. He has contributed as much as he

Problems for Frank Schmidt as Mathias Honsak
(Heidenheim) is not able to play anymore.
His injury is too serious and Sirlord Conteh

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Sirlord Conteh (Heidenheim) was quite
harsh and Sven Jablonski didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Dani de Wit (Bochum)

cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Here is a change. Moritz Broschinski is
going off and Dieter Hecking gives the last

The referee looks satisfied after his VAR
review and duly disallows the goal for offside.
The Bochum players look gutted.

Substitution. Philipp Hofmann leaves the
pitch and is replaced by Samuel Bamba (Bochum).

Lukas Kubler (Freiburg) is lucky to receive

Noah Atubolu anticipates the direction of

He attempted to put the ball inside the
left post, but the goalkeeper was there

Goal! Florian Wirtz finds Patrik Schick
