Goal! Exequiel Palacios shows great vision

the left side of the goal. 2:0.

Brilliant finish! Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg)

A substitution has been made. Ritsu Doan

It's a goal! Patrik Schick (Bayer Leverkusen)

into the left of the goal. 3:1.

The substitution has been made. Martin Terrier
(Bayer Leverkusen) has replaced Nathan Tella.

It's in! Florian Wirtz spots his teammate
in a good position on the edge of the box
and provides him with a nice pass. Patrik
Schick (Bayer Leverkusen) doesn't think

the left side of the goal. The score is
now 4:1.

Substitution. Junior Adamu (Freiburg) in,

Julian Schuster has decided to make a change.
Kiliann Sildillia (Freiburg) replaces Patrick
Osterhage.

The manager makes a subsitution with Max
Rosenfelder (Freiburg) coming on for Lukas

Alejandro Grimaldo sends the resulting corner

(Bayer Leverkusen), who jumps highest and

of the net. It's 5:1.

Patrik Schick (Bayer Leverkusen) gives the

Substitution. Alejandro Grimaldo is replaced

Xabi Alonso prepares a substitution. Patrik

Xabi Alonso has decided to introduce fresh

Merlin Rohl (Freiburg) will have to be careful

Phillipp Mwene (Mainz) commits a foul and

It's an own goal! Kaua Santos (Eintracht

Nadiem Amiri (Mainz) takes out his opponent

Paul Nebel (Mainz) has a sight of goal and

The need to improve in the second half has

The goal by B. Monchengladbach is DISALLOWED

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot

Alassane Plea (B. Monchengladbach) finishes

Alexis Claude-Maurice (Augsburg) scores!

Problems for Jess Thorup as Keven Schlotterbeck

Goal - 1:1! Shuto Machino tees up Lasse
Rosenboom (Holstein Kiel) inside the box

Marius Wolf (Augsburg) is booked after bringing

Phil Harres (Holstein Kiel) scores from
quite a difficult position as he leaps high

Goal! Some very poor defending from the

It's 3:1.

Shuto Machino (Holstein Kiel) unleashes
a beautiful rocket of a shot from a long-range

takes hours and hours on the training ground.
The score is 4:1.

The goal by Holstein Kiel won't count as

Kristijan Jakic goes off the pitch and Arne

Shuto Machino (Holstein Kiel) receives a

Goal! Johannes Eggestein (St. Pauli) fires

Johannes Eggestein (St. Pauli) is shown

Half-time substitution. Sebastian Hoeness

Goal! A nice lofted pass into the box by

Goal! Derrick Kohn displays great vision

Marco Friedl (Werder Bremen) is shown a

Spectacular goal! Mitchell Weiser (Werder

Rani Khedira (Union Berlin) is cautioned

The game is over for Christopher Trimmel

Here is a change after the half-time break.

Bo Svensson has decided to substitute Rani

Problems for Bo Svensson as Yorbe Vertessen

Jens Stage (Werder Bremen) finds some space

Ole Werner has decided to introduce fresh

Oliver Burke (Werder Bremen) is cautioned

Jamal Musiala (Bayern Munich) receives a

What a clinical finish!

Benjamin Sesko (RB Leipzig) gets on the

helpless.

The foul by Dayot Upamecano (Bayern Munich)

What a hit! Konrad Laimer (Bayern Munich)

2:1.

Xaver Schlager (RB Leipzig) sees a yellow

Joshua Kimmich (Bayern Munich) latches on
to a superb pass and breaks through the
defence before firing a shot from mid-range
that goes past the goalkeeper inside the
right post.

Daniel Siebert shows a yellow card to Michael
Olise (Bayern Munich) for his blatant foul.

A yellow card for a tackle by Benjamin Henrichs
(RB Leipzig). Daniel Siebert doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) uses bad language
while talking to the referee and receives
a yellow card for dissent.

Konrad Laimer (Bayern Munich) is awarded
a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't
seem to agree with the decision, but Daniel
Siebert ignores the protests.

It's time for a substitution. Aleksandar
Pavlovic (Bayern Munich) comes on in place

Marco Rose decides to make a substitution.
Xaver Schlager will be replaced by Kevin
Kampl (RB Leipzig).

The game has come to an end for Benjamin
Sesko. He has contributed as much as he
could today. He will be replaced by the
fresh legs of Andre Silva (RB Leipzig).

A superb goal from great team play! Leroy
Sane (Bayern Munich) latches on to a perfect

the right post. There is nothing a goalkeeper
can do about shots like that.

Alphonso Davies (Bayern Munich) scores from

to connect with a cross and powers his header
inside the left post. Excellent finish.

Joshua Kimmich (Bayern Munich) picks up
a yellow card for a foul.

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Marco Rose has decided to make a change.
Lukas Klostermann (RB Leipzig) replaces

We are about to witness a subsitution. Eric

Substitution. Michael Olise makes his way

Vincent Kompany has decided to substitute

Benjamin Sesko (RB Leipzig) is first to

Can Yilmaz Uzun produces a killer pass to

Today's referee Benjamin Brand rightly decides

Lois Openda (RB Leipzig) wins himself some

A yellow card for a tackle by Willi Orban

Dino Toppmoller has decided to make a change.

Ansgar Knauff will be replaced by Jean-Matteo

Nathaniel Brown (Eintracht Frankfurt) is

Harm Osmers shows a yellow card to Marvin

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to make a
change. Anthony Rouault (VfB Stuttgart)
replaces Maximilian Mittelstadt.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Marco Grull (Werder Bremen)
comes onto the pitch for Romano Schmid.

What was Lewis Holtby (Holstein Kiel) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee
shows him a yellow card.

Shuto Machino (Holstein Kiel) gets a yellow
card, off the field.

Manolis Saliakas (St. Pauli) controls the
ball on the edge of the box after a superb
low pass by Johannes Eggestein. He makes
a yard for himself and fires a wonderful
strike into the bottom left corner via the
post. 1:0!

Marko Ivezic (Holstein Kiel) shouldn't be
surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who
cooled the situation down well.

Timo Becker (Holstein Kiel) goes into the
referee's book. Yellow card.

The referee Felix Zwayer awards Eric Smith
(St. Pauli) a yellow card.

Jann-Fiete Arp (Holstein Kiel) blows a huge
chance to score! He sends the penalty to
the left side of the goal, but it's not
enough to beat Nikola Vasilj who easily
stops the effort.

Superb finishing from Morgan Guilavogui
(St. Pauli). Johannes Eggestein plays a
fantastic through ball and finds Morgan
Guilavogui (St. Pauli), who reacts quickly
to get in front of the goal and fire a close-range
shot past the goalkeeper. It's 2:0.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Shuto Machino (Holstein
Kiel) comes onto the pitch for Jann-Fiete
Arp.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Benedikt Pichler (Holstein
Kiel) comes onto the pitch so that Lewis
Holtby can be given a rest.

Marcel Rapp has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Tymoteusz Puchacz (Holstein Kiel)
replacing Max Geschwill.

Here comes a substitution. Lars Ritzka (St.
Pauli) is brought on as a substitute for
Manolis Saliakas.

Alexander Blessin is forced to make a change.
Morgan Guilavogui is not able to carry on
due to injury. He is replaced by Danel Sinani
(St. Pauli).

Here is a change. Magnus Knudsen is going
off and Marcel Rapp gives the last tactical
orders to Armin Gigovic (Holstein Kiel).

Here comes a substitution. Finn Porath is
given a rest as he is replaced by Lasse
Rosenboom (Holstein Kiel).

Goal! Johannes Eggestein (St. Pauli) finds
himself some space inside the box to get
on the end of a pass from Philipp Treu,
then sends the ball inside the left post.
3:0.

Oladapo Afolayan (St. Pauli) infringed the
rules and goes into the book. Felix Zwayer
pulls out a yellow card.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Andreas Nielsen Albers
(St. Pauli) is coming onto the pitch as
Johannes Eggestein cannot continue after
picking up an injury.

Alexander Blessin has decided to make a
change. Erik Ahlstrand (St. Pauli) replaces
Oladapo Afolayan.

What a beauty from just outside the box!
Phil Harres (Holstein Kiel) lashed the ball
with incredible pace and power into the
bottom left corner.

Patrick Erras (Holstein Kiel) has to be
very careful for the rest of the match after
receiving a yellow card from the referee
for a bad tackle on an opponent.

Fantastic team goal! Alassane Plea (B. Monchengladbach)
was set free in the area by Marvin Friedrich
and made no mistake with a lovely finish
into the left side of the net. 1:0.

It looks like Joe Scally may be concussed
after that challenge from an opposing player.
He’s definitely coming off in line and Gerardo
Seoane replaces him with Stefan Lainer (B.
Monchengladbach).

GOAL - 2:0! Robin Hack found Tim Kleindienst
(B. Monchengladbach) inside the box, he
spotted goalkeeper Nikola Vasilj off his
line and chipped the ball into the net.
What a cheeky lob!

Lukas Ullrich (B. Monchengladbach) has tested
the patience of referee Robin Braun and
goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

The substitution has been made. Florian
Neuhaus (B. Monchengladbach) has replaced
Alassane Plea.

It is time for a substitution. Kevin Stoger
(B. Monchengladbach) is on for Robin Hack.

Substitution. Lukas Ullrich will be replaced
by Fabio Cristian Chiarodia (B. Monchengladbach).

Alexander Blessin has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Erik Ahlstrand (St. Pauli)
replacing Johannes Eggestein.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Carlo Boukhalfa will be replaced by Danel
Sinani (St. Pauli).

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Alexander Blessin has decided to make a
change. Andreas Nielsen Albers (St. Pauli)
replaces Morgan Guilavogui.

Goal! Nadiem Amiri (Mainz) weaves his way

effort from the edge of the box into the
bottom left corner. Timon Weiner had no
chance of reaching it. The score is 0:1.

Shuto Machino will be replaced by Finn Porath
(Holstein Kiel).

Here is a change. Tymoteusz Puchacz is going
off and Marcel Rapp gives the last tactical
orders to Armin Gigovic (Holstein Kiel).

Goal! Jonathan Burkardt (Mainz) wins the
battle of wills and sends an unstoppable

Substitution. Lewis Holtby will be replaced
by Benedikt Pichler (Holstein Kiel).

The ball hits the back of the net! Jae-Sung
Lee (Mainz) meets a brilliant cross from
Anthony Caci and scores with a cracking
header from near the penalty spot in off
the bottom of the left post. Timon Weiner
had no chance of stopping that. The score
is 0:3.

Patrick Erras (Holstein Kiel) is literally
asking for a yellow card with his behaviour.
The referee agrees and books him.

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Marcel Rapp has decided to introduce fresh

The referee signals that it is time for

Substitution. Silvan Widmer (Mainz) in,

Bo Henriksen decides to make a substitution.

Bo Henriksen prepares a substitution. Phillipp

Substitution. Dominik Kohr is replaced by

Derrick Kohn (Werder Bremen) takes his opponent

Goal! Hugo Ekitike shows great vision to

Ole Werner is stunned as referee Florian

What was Senne Lynen (Werder Bremen) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee

Omar Marmoush (Eintracht Frankfurt) is cautioned

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Justin Njinmah (Werder

Dino Toppmoller decides to make a substitution.

Leonardo Bittencourt will be replaced by

Ole Werner has decided to introduce fresh

Here is a change. Omar Marmoush is going

It's time for a substitution. Hugo Larsson

The referee signals that it is time for

The referee signals that it is time for

Ellyes Skhiri (Eintracht Frankfurt) has

Niklas Dorsch (Heidenheim) receives a well-taken

Mathias Honsak (Heidenheim) finishes his

Frank Schmidt is forced to make a change.
Marvin Pieringer is unable to continue due

Goal - 1:2! Granit Xhaka laid the ball off
to Exequiel Palacios (Bayer Leverkusen),
who shot from close range into the right
side of the goal, leaving the goalkeeper
helpless.

GOAL! Patrik Schick (Bayer Leverkusen) collects
a pass and from inside the box he lifts
the ball over Kevin Muller, who was off
his line. What a finish that is! 2:2.

Jeremie Frimpong (Bayer Leverkusen) is substituted
due to injury. Xabi Alonso gives a chance
to Nathan Tella.

GOAL! Superb work from Florian Wirtz, who
plays a vital role in the build-up. He squares
it to Patrik Schick (Bayer Leverkusen),
who beats Kevin Muller with a brilliant
shot into the top of the net. 3:2.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Leo Scienza (Heidenheim)
comes onto the pitch so that Niklas Dorsch
can be given a rest.

Frank Schmidt has decided to substitute

Here comes a substitution. Mikkel Kaufmann
Sorensen (Heidenheim) is brought on as a

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Arthur (Bayer Leverkusen)

Goal! Patrik Schick (Bayer Leverkusen) makes

Here comes a substitution. Exequiel Palacios
is given a rest as he is replaced by Robert

Xabi Alonso has decided to make a change.

Goal - 5:2! Granit Xhaka (Bayer Leverkusen)

Substitution. Lennard Maloney makes way

Maximilian Beier (Dortmund) latches on to

Goal! Jamie Gittens tees up Felix Nmecha

2:0.

What was Patrick Osterhage (Freiburg) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee
shows him a yellow card.

Julian Schuster prepares a substitution.
Nicolas Hofler is replaced by Junior Adamu
(Freiburg).

The substitution has been made. Max Rosenfelder
(Freiburg) has replaced Lukas Kubler.

Felix Brych blows his whistle and Patrick
Osterhage (Freiburg) is shown a second yellow
card for his foul. His manager will not
be pleased. He has lot of time to think
about it as he walks off.

Julian Brandt (Dortmund) scores a goal from
the resulting free kick, sending it into
the top right corner. What a strike that
is, absolutely fantastic!

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Here comes a substitution. Vincenzo Grifo

Here is a change. Ritsu Doan is going off

Fantastic team goal! Jamie Gittens (Dortmund)

into the top right corner. 4:0.

The game has come to an end for Ramy Bensebaini.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Yan Couto (Dortmund).

A substitution has been made. Jamie Gittens
is replaced by Julien Duranville (Dortmund).

Nuri Sahin has decided to introduce fresh

Yan Couto (Dortmund) commits a foul and

It's time for a substitution. Jordy Makengo

Substitution. Almugera Kabar (Dortmund)

Here comes the VAR decision. Referee Felix

Willi Orban (RB Leipzig) meets a perfect
cross from Antonio Nusa deep inside the

He produces an accurate strike inside the

Stunning strike! Adam Hlozek (Hoffenheim)
latches on to a precise through ball from
Alexander Prass before unleashing an unstoppable
shot into the back of the net from the edge
of the area. Fantastic goal. The score is
now 1:1.

Goal! Lois Openda puts Antonio Nusa (RB
Leipzig) in the clear with just the keeper

edge of the box and scores beautifully into
the top right corner. 1:2.

The need to improve in the second half has
brought about a change. Lukas Klostermann
(RB Leipzig) comes off for Lutsharel Geertruida.

Fantastic goal! Tom Bischof (Hoffenheim)
again proved his ability to execute a free
kick! His shot just floated in, grazing
the left post on the way, and gave the keeper
no chance!

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Benjamin Sesko as
he is replaced by Assan Ouedraogo (RB Leipzig).

Marco Rose has decided to make a change.
Nicolas Seiwald (RB Leipzig) replaces Arthur
Vermeeren.

Mergim Berisha (Hoffenheim) joins the action

It's an own goal! A pitiful moment for Stanley
Nsoki (Hoffenheim), who tries to clear a
cross into the six-yard box but instead
sends the ball behind his own keeper. The
score is 2:3.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) was quite
harsh and Frank Willenborg didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

The manager makes a subsitution with Amadou
Haidara (RB Leipzig) coming on for Kevin
Kampl.

Christian Ilzer has decided to substitute
Andrej Kramaric and he is replaced by Jacob
Bruun Larsen (Hoffenheim).

Substitution. Tom Bischof makes way for
Umut Tohumcu (Hoffenheim).

It's time for a substitution. Andre Silva
(RB Leipzig) comes on in place of Lois Openda.

Goal! Adam Hlozek (Hoffenheim) neatly controls

Castello Lukeba (RB Leipzig) is shown a

Christian Ilzer decides to make a substitution.
Alexander Prass will be replaced by Kevin

Goal – 4:3! Anton Stach sends a precise

Frank Willenborg shows a yellow card to

Jeff Chabot (VfB Stuttgart) is booked after

Ibrahima Sissoko (Bochum) takes out his

Chris Fuhrich (VfB Stuttgart) takes a great

It is time for a substitution. Angelo Stiller

Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart) is awarded a

The yellow card goes to Philipp Hofmann

Substitution. Chris Fuhrich did his best

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to make a

Justin Diehl (VfB Stuttgart) receives a

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to introduce

Substitution. Jeff Chabot is replaced by

Here's the change. Moritz Broschinski leaves

Matus Bero (Bochum) attempts to discuss

The referee signals that it is time for

Patrick Wimmer (Wolfsburg) is booked after

Kevin Vogt (Union Berlin) is literally asking

That will be all from Rani Khedira who is

Mads Pedersen (Augsburg) comes onto the

GOAL! That’s a perfect strike from the spot

We are about to witness a subsitution. Sacha

It's a goal! Harry Kane (Bayern Munich)

Yannick Gerhardt (Wolfsburg) collected a

Joakim Maehle is being substituted because

The referee looks satisfied after his VAR

The Heidenheim players look gutted.

After a scramble inside the penalty area

Harm Osmers shows a yellow card to Jonas

Mohamed Amoura goes off the pitch and Tiago

Cedric Zesiger (Wolfsburg) sees a yellow

Paul Wanner will be replaced by Maximilian

The referee Harm Osmers awards Kamil Grabara

Ralph Hasenhuttl decides to make a substitution.

Substitution. Kilian Fischer is replaced

Tiago Tomas (Wolfsburg) gets a yellow card.

Substitution. Leo Scienza will be replaced

Frank Schmidt has decided to introduce fresh

Tiago Tomas (Wolfsburg) gets on the end
of a pass inside the box and fires into

helpless.

Kevin Behrens (Wolfsburg) infringed the
rules and goes into the book. Harm Osmers

Penalty saved! Ermedin Demirovic (VfB Stuttgart)
sends the penalty towards the bottom left

Whoa! Such gestures are commonly penalised
and Tuta (Eintracht Frankfurt) duly receives
a yellow card.

Goal! The corner is whipped in and Hugo
Ekitike (Eintracht Frankfurt) is in the

He makes it 0:1.

It's time for a substitution. Ansgar Knauff

Goal! Nathaniel Brown (Eintracht Frankfurt)

It's time for a substitution. That's the

Felix Zwayer shows the yellow card to Jeff

The referee signals that it is time for

Omar Marmoush (Eintracht Frankfurt) unleashes
a beautiful rocket of a shot from a long-range
free kick. The ball goes inside the left
post and leaves the goalkeeper beaten. This
takes hours and hours on the training ground.
The score is 0:3.

Substitution. Ramon Hendriks (VfB Stuttgart)
on for Anthony Rouault.

Sebastian Hoeness prepares a substitution.
Ermedin Demirovic is replaced by Nick Woltemade

The referee signals that it is time for

Nnamdi Collins will be replaced by Jean-Matteo

That's the end of the game for Nathaniel
Brown, who is replaced by Igor Matanovic

Josha Vagnoman (VfB Stuttgart) receives
a brilliant pass and hammers the ball inside
the left post. It couldn't have gone in
a better place. What a beautiful long-range
goal.

Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart) sees a yellow

one more challenge like that could result

Angelo Stiller feeds the ball through to
Nick Woltemade (VfB Stuttgart), who picks

it into the bottom left corner! The goalkeeper
was helpless. 2:3!

Felix Zwayer rightly pulls out a yellow
card and shows it to Fares Chaibi (Eintracht
Frankfurt).

Celebrations are cut short for Stuttgart
as the referee indicates NO GOAL after the
VAR review shows it was offside!

Pavel Kaderabek (Hoffenheim) is booked after

It's a goal! Jonathan Burkardt (Mainz) shows

What a hit that is! Jamal Musiala (Bayern

Here comes the VAR verdict. NO GOAL for

Simply stunning!

A superb goal from great team play! Can

A superb goal from great team play! Hugo
Ekitike (Eintracht Frankfurt) latches on

rules and gets a yellow card.

Substitution. Marius Wolf makes his way
off the pitch and Henri Koudossou (Augsburg)
comes on as his replacement.

Elvis Rexhbecaj (Augsburg) receives a yellow
card.

Jess Thorup decides to make a substitution.
Elvis Rexhbecaj will be replaced by Arne
Maier (Augsburg).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Lukas Nmecha (Wolfsburg)
is coming onto the pitch as Tiago Tomas
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

The game has come to an end for Ridle Baku.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Jakub Kaminski (Wolfsburg).

Goal! Joakim Maehle slips it to Mohamed
Amoura (Wolfsburg) on the edge of the box
and he finds the top right corner with a
great effort. The score is 1:1.

Samuel Essende (Augsburg) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Felix Brych had
an easy-decision to make.

Mohamed Amoura (Wolfsburg) makes a bad challenge
and receives a yellow card. The referee
had no doubt.

Sebastian Hoeness is forced to make a change.
Jamie Leweling is unable to continue due
to injury, Fabian Rieder (VfB Stuttgart)
comes on.

Robert Andrich (Bayer Leverkusen) receives
a yellow card from the referee as expected.

Nordi Mukiele (Bayer Leverkusen) receives
a yellow card for infringement.

Whoa! Such gestures are commonly penalised
and Granit Xhaka (Bayer Leverkusen) duly
receives a yellow card.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Atakan Karazor (VfB Stuttgart) was quite
harsh and Daniel Siebert didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Xabi Alonso is forced to make a change.
Nordi Mukiele (Bayer Leverkusen) is not
able to carry on due to injury. He is replaced
by Jonas Hofmann.

This is a yellow card! Enzo Millot (VfB
Stuttgart) is not happy with the decision,
but from our point of view it was clear.

Substitution. Maximilian Mittelstadt did
his best and is replaced by Ramon Hendriks
(VfB Stuttgart).

Here is a change. Fabian Rieder is going
off and Sebastian Hoeness gives the last
tactical orders to Chris Fuhrich (VfB Stuttgart).

Angelo Stiller (VfB Stuttgart) is shown
a deserved yellow card for saying too much
to the referee.

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to make a
change. Ermedin Demirovic (VfB Stuttgart)
replaces El Bilal Toure.

Enzo Millot goes off the pitch and Ameen
Al Dakhil (VfB Stuttgart) comes on.

Xabi Alonso has decided to substitute Jeremie
Frimpong and he is replaced by Nathan Tella
(Bayer Leverkusen).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Exequiel Palacios (Bayer
Leverkusen) comes onto the pitch so that
Robert Andrich can be given a rest.

Substitution. Victor Boniface walks off
the pitch and Patrik Schick (Bayer Leverkusen)
comes on as a substitute.

What was Marvin Pieringer (Heidenheim) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee
shows him a yellow card.

Anton Stach (Hoffenheim) receives a yellow
card for a nasty tackle.

That will be all from Florian Grillitsch
who is being replaced by the fresh legs
of Umut Tohumcu (Hoffenheim).

Pellegrino Matarazzo prepares a substitution.
Valentin Gendrey is replaced by Pavel Kaderabek
(Hoffenheim).

The substitution has been made. Mergim Berisha
(Hoffenheim) has replaced Marius Bulter.

Here is a change. Marvin Pieringer is going
off and Frank Schmidt gives the last tactical
orders to Maximilian Breunig (Heidenheim).

Substitution. Sirlord Conteh (Heidenheim)
on for Niklas Dorsch.

Tom Bischof will be replaced by Diadie Samassekou
(Hoffenheim).

Pellegrino Matarazzo has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Arthur Chaves (Hoffenheim)
replacing Stanley Nsoki.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Adrian Beck (Heidenheim)
will replace Paul Wanner.

Yellow card. Mergim Berisha (Hoffenheim)
goes into the book for a bad tackle on his
opponent.

It's in the back of the net! Ellyes Skhiri
sprays a pass out to Mario Gotze (Eintracht
Frankfurt), and he has an easy job to slot
the ball into an empty net. The score is
0:1.

Aljoscha Kemlein (Union Berlin) commits
a foul and is shown a yellow card without
any hesitation from the referee.

Arthur Theate (Eintracht Frankfurt) is cautioned
and receives a yellow card.

Dino Toppmoller is forced to make a change.
Rasmus Kristensen is not able to carry on
due to injury. He is replaced by Junior
Dina Ebimbe (Eintracht Frankfurt).

Diogo Leite (Union Berlin) goes in the referee's
notebook after being shown a yellow card.

Substitution. Mario Gotze leaves the pitch
and is replaced by Fares Chaibi (Eintracht
Frankfurt).

Dino Toppmoller has decided to make a change.
Igor Matanovic (Eintracht Frankfurt) replaces
Hugo Ekitike.

It is time for a substitution. Robert Skov
(Union Berlin) is on for Tom Rothe.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Aljoscha Kemlein will be replaced by Andras
Schafer (Union Berlin).

Substitution. Jordan Siebatcheu (Union Berlin)
receives a signal from the referee and is
now allowed to enter the pitch as Woo-Yeong
Jeong walks off.

Benedict Hollerbach (Union Berlin) breaks
through before collecting a brilliant pass
and producing a precise strike to beat the
goalkeeper. The ball went into the bottom
left corner.

Tuta (Eintracht Frankfurt) receives a yellow
card for a nasty tackle.

Here comes a substitution. Tim Skarke (Union
Berlin) is brought on as a substitute for
Benedict Hollerbach.

Arthur Theate (Eintracht Frankfurt) makes
a bad challenge and is given a second yellow
card which means he's off.

Dino Toppmoller decides to make a substitution.
Ansgar Knauff will be replaced by Aurele
Amenda (Eintracht Frankfurt).

A substitution has been made. Omar Marmoush
goes off and Nathaniel Brown (Eintracht
Frankfurt) comes on.

Christopher Trimmel (Union Berlin) is cautioned
by the referee for a foul that he committed
a little earlier.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Laszlo
Benes (Union Berlin) for Yorbe Vertessen.

Kevin Vogt (Union Berlin) shouldn't be surprised
it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the
situation down well.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Andras Schafer (Union Berlin) was quite
harsh and Harm Osmers didn't hesitate to
show him a yellow card.

The goal by Union Berlin won't count as
it has been disallowed due to offside on
the advice of the video assistant referee!

Felix Passlack (Bochum) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Florian Exner
had an easy-decision to make.

Michael Olise (Bayern Munich) struck with
a perfectly taken free kick from the edge
of the box. He curled the ball straight
inside the right post. There are not enough
superlatives that can be used to describe
that goal.

It's in the back of the net! Jamal Musiala
(Bayern Munich) rises high inside the six-yard
box to meet a cross by Joshua Kimmich from
the free kick. He heads home into the middle
of the goal, making the score 0:2.

Jamal Musiala (Bayern Munich) is shown a
yellow card by the referee for making a
challenge on his opponent, but he looks
angry with the decision.

The need to improve in the second half has
brought about a change. Felix Passlack comes
off for Cristian Gamboa (Bochum).

Jamal Musiala finds Harry Kane (Bayern Munich)
with a sweet pass inside the penalty box,
who then smashes the ball inside the left
post. What a clinical finish to make it
0:3.

Vincent Kompany prepares a substitution.
Michael Olise (Bayern Munich) is replaced
by Leroy Sane.

Thomas Muller joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Jamal Musiala (Bayern Munich).

Substitution. Joao Palhinha (Bayern Munich)
makes his way off the pitch and Leon Goretzka
comes on as his replacement.

Peter Zeidler decides to make a substitution.
Tim Oermann (Bochum) will be replaced by
Lukas Daschner.

Goal! Leroy Sane (Bayern Munich) weaves
his way past opponents, and he unleashes
a magnificent effort from the edge of the
box into the top left corner. Patrick Drewes
had no chance of reaching it. The score
is 0:4.

Here is a change. Harry Kane (Bayern Munich)
is going off and Vincent Kompany gives the
last tactical orders to Mathys Tel.

Goal! Kingsley Coman (Bayern Munich) is
teed up on the edge of the box by Alphonso
Davies, and his howitzer of a shot into
the top right corner gives the keeper no
chance. 0:5.

Peter Zeidler has decided to substitute
Dani de Wit and he is replaced by Koji Miyoshi
(Bochum).

Peter Zeidler has decided to make a change.
Philipp Hofmann (Bochum) replaces Moritz
Broschinski.

Substitution. Eric Dier has come on for
Min-Jae Kim (Bayern Munich).

Peter Zeidler has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Mats Pannewig (Bochum) replacing
Ibrahima Sissoko.

GOAL! Superb work from Jeremie Frimpong,
who plays a vital role in the build-up.
He squares it to Victor Boniface (Bayer
Leverkusen), who beats Michael Zetterer
with a brilliant shot into the top of the
net. 0:1.

Mitchell Weiser (Werder Bremen) takes out
his opponent with a horrific tackle and
is relieved when the referee only shows
him a yellow card.

Substitution. Leonardo Bittencourt walks
off the pitch and Justin Njinmah (Werder
Bremen) comes on as a substitute.

Xabi Alonso has decided to substitute Victor
Boniface and he is replaced by Patrik Schick
(Bayer Leverkusen).

Marvin Ducksch (Werder Bremen) scores from
quite a difficult position as he leaps high
to connect with a cross and powers his header
inside the right post. Excellent finish.

It's an own goal! A pitiful moment for Felix
Agu (Werder Bremen), who tries to clear
a cross into the six-yard box but instead
sends the ball behind his own keeper. The
score is 1:2.

A substitution has been made. Martin Terrier
is replaced by Aleix Garcia (Bayer Leverkusen).

Here is a change. Marco Grull is going off
and Ole Werner gives the last tactical orders
to Oliver Burke (Werder Bremen).

Here comes a substitution. Derrick Kohn
(Werder Bremen) is brought on as a substitute
for Felix Agu.

The game has come to an end for Amos Pieper.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Anthony Jung (Werder Bremen).

Substitution. Julian Malatini makes way
for Keke Topp (Werder Bremen).

Florian Badstubner has issued a yellow card
to Piero Hincapie (Bayer Leverkusen).

Romano Schmid (Werder Bremen) takes a great
first touch to control a killer pass on
the edge of the box and curls the ball into
the top left corner in trademark fashion.

Goal! Donyell Malen (Dortmund) beautifully
controls a strongly hit pass from Serhou
Guirassy inside the box. He cuts inside
his marker and rifles the ball into the
top left corner. 0:1.

What a beautiful moment! Alexis Claude-Maurice
(Augsburg) got to the ball and unleashed
a strong shot from distance. It turned out
to be a good decision as his effort found
its way into the bottom left corner. Gregor
Kobel just shakes his head in disbelief.
The score changes to 1:1.

Dimitrios Giannoulis (Augsburg) is awarded
a yellow card. The referee showed him no
mercy.

The game is over for Waldemar Anton (Dortmund).
Emre Can comes on for the second half.

Nuri Sahin makes a switch. Pascal Gross
is coming on in place of Marcel Sabitzer
(Dortmund) at the start of the second period.

The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet
of Alexis Claude-Maurice (Augsburg) just
outside the box. He doesn't think twice
and fires a great shot into the bottom right
corner. His attempt was beyond the reach
of Gregor Kobel, so the score changes to
2:1.

It's time for a substitution. Maximilian
Beier (Dortmund) comes on in place of Felix
Nmecha.

Nuri Sahin has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Almugera Kabar (Dortmund) replacing
Julian Ryerson.
The booking goes to Almugera Kabar (Dortmund).

Phillip Tietz (Augsburg) was probably a
bit loose with his words to Tobias Welz,
who decides to show him a yellow.

Marius Wolf is substituted due to injury.
Jess Thorup gives a chance to Henri Koudossou
(Augsburg).

Jess Thorup prepares a substitution. Phillip
Tietz is replaced by Samuel Essende (Augsburg).

A substitution has been made. Chrislain
Matsima goes off and Maximilian Bauer (Augsburg)
comes on.

Jess Thorup has decided to substitute Alexis
Claude-Maurice and he is replaced by Yusuf
Kabadayi (Augsburg).

Substitution. Frank Onyeka is replaced by
Arne Maier (Augsburg).

Tobias Welz shows a yellow card to Jeffrey
Gouweleeuw (Augsburg) for a tough tackle.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Cole Campbell (Dortmund)
replaces Donyell Malen.

Tobias Welz shows a yellow card to Ramy
Bensebaini (Dortmund), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

Almugera Kabar (Dortmund) should have been
more careful. He commits a bad foul, receives
his second yellow card and is sent-off!

Vincenzo Grifo launches a beautiful lofted
cross into the box, where Ritsu Doan (Freiburg)
rises high to head the ball into the right
side of the goal and beyond the goalkeeper.
0:1.

Sven Jablonski shows a yellow card to Lutsharel
Geertruida (RB Leipzig) for his blatant
foul.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Junior Adamu (Freiburg) was quite harsh
and Sven Jablonski didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Marco Rose is forced to make a change. Peter
Gulacsi (RB Leipzig) is not able to carry
on due to injury. He is replaced by Maarten
Vandevoordt.

Philipp Lienhart (Freiburg) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Sven Jablonski
had an easy-decision to make.

Goal! Willi Orban (RB Leipzig) finds himself
some space inside the box to get on the
end of a pass from Benjamin Henrichs, then
sends the ball into the bottom right corner.
1:1.

Lutsharel Geertruida (RB Leipzig) latches
on to a killer pass deep inside the box
and coolly puts the ball inside the right
post!

Marco Rose has decided to substitute Amadou
Haidara and he is replaced by Arthur Vermeeren
(RB Leipzig).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Benjamin Sesko leaves the
pitch and Andre Silva (RB Leipzig) comes
on.

Junior Adamu comes off the pitch to be replaced
by Michael Gregoritsch (Freiburg).

Here is a change. Vincenzo Grifo is going
off and Julian Schuster gives the last tactical
orders to Florent Muslija (Freiburg).

Substitution. Lukas Kubler will be replaced
by Kiliann Sildillia (Freiburg).

Lois Openda (RB Leipzig) runs on to a clever
pass from Andre Silva and finds himself
one-on-one with the keeper. He still has
work to do but finishes with aplomb into
the back of the net.

Lois Openda (RB Leipzig) receives a yellow
card from the referee as expected.

Lutsharel Geertruida will be replaced by
Lukas Klostermann (RB Leipzig).

Marco Rose prepares a substitution. Castello
Lukeba is replaced by El Chadaille Bitshiabu
(RB Leipzig).

Substitution. Eren Dinkci walks off the
pitch and Lucas Holer (Freiburg) comes on
as a substitute.

Julian Schuster decides to make a substitution.
Christian Gunter will be replaced by Matthias
Ginter (Freiburg).

Arthur Vermeeren (RB Leipzig) has tested
the patience of referee Sven Jablonski and
goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

That's the end of the game for Danel Sinani,
who is replaced by Oladapo Afolayan (St.
Pauli).

Ralph Hasenhuttl has decided to make a change.
Jakub Kaminski (Wolfsburg) replaces Kilian
Fischer.

Jakub Kaminski (Wolfsburg) is awarded a
yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem
to agree with the decision, but Tobias Reichel
ignores the protests.

Ralph Hasenhuttl has decided to substitute
Jonas Wind and he is replaced by Lovro Majer
(Wolfsburg).

Joakim Maehle (Wolfsburg) gets a yellow
card.

That will be all from Johannes Eggestein
who is being replaced by the fresh legs
of Scott Banks (St. Pauli).

Here is a change. Carlo Boukhalfa is going
off and Alexander Blessin gives the last
tactical orders to Robert Wagner (St. Pauli).

A substitution has been made. Mohamed Amoura
goes off and Kevin Behrens (Wolfsburg) comes
on.

Lovro Majer (Wolfsburg) sees a yellow! His
tackle wasn't that harsh, but he probably
talked himself into Tobias Reichel's book.

GOAL! Deniz Undav (VfB Stuttgart) collects
a pass and from inside the box he lifts
the ball over Timon Weiner, who was off
his line. What a finish that is! 1:0.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Marvin Schulz (Holstein Kiel) was quite
harsh and Robert Hartmann didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Marcel Rapp makes a switch. Steven Skrzybski
(Holstein Kiel) is coming on in place of
Benedikt Pichler at the start of the second
period.

Josha Vagnoman (VfB Stuttgart) is booked
by the referee.

Substitution. Nicolai Remberg (Holstein
Kiel) has come on for Magnus Knudsen.

What a beautiful moment! El Bilal Toure
(VfB Stuttgart) got to the ball and unleashed
a strong shot from distance. It turned out
to be a good decision as his effort found
its way into the top right corner. Timon
Weiner just shakes his head in disbelief.
The score changes to 2:0.

Here comes a substitution. El Bilal Toure
is given a rest as he is replaced by Ermedin
Demirovic (VfB Stuttgart).

Sebastian Hoeness prepares a substitution.
Fabian Rieder is replaced by Chris Fuhrich
(VfB Stuttgart).

A yellow card for a tackle by Jeff Chabot
(VfB Stuttgart). Robert Hartmann doesn't
hesitate at all to make this decision.

Nicolai Remberg (Holstein Kiel) has tested
the patience of referee Robert Hartmann
and goes into the book for a previous late
challenge.

Jeff Chabot (VfB Stuttgart) receives a yellow
card! It's his second one today, which means
he will be send off!

A substitution has been made. Enzo Millot
goes off and Anthony Rouault (VfB Stuttgart)
comes on.

Marcel Rapp has decided to make a change.
Shuto Machino (Holstein Kiel) replaces Marvin
Schulz.

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Atakan Karazor (VfB Stuttgart)
replacing Deniz Undav.

Marcel Rapp has decided to substitute Finn
Porath and he is replaced by Tymoteusz Puchacz
(Holstein Kiel).

Armin Gigovic (Holstein Kiel) is booked
after bringing down an opponent. Robert
Hartmann had an easy-decision to make.

The referee shows the yellow card to Max
Geschwill (Holstein Kiel).

Today's match ends for Max Geschwill who
will be replaced by Phil Harres (Holstein
Kiel).

Jann-Fiete Arp (Holstein Kiel) is yellow-carded
for breaking the rules of the game.

Armin Gigovic (Holstein Kiel) gets to the
ball on the edge of the box and fires in
a first-time shot without any hesitation.
The strike is excellent and goes straight
into the bottom right corner. He couldn't
have done it any better. 2:1.

Here is a change. Jamie Leweling is going
off and Sebastian Hoeness gives the last
tactical orders to Ramon Hendriks (VfB Stuttgart).

Jann-Fiete Arp (Holstein Kiel) picks up
his second yellow card from referee Robert
Hartmann and is given his marching orders.

Joe Scally (B. Monchengladbach) receives
a yellow card for a nasty tackle.

Stefan Lainer (B. Monchengladbach) was unlucky
to score an own goal attempting to intercept
a cross. Hang your head in shame!

Franck Honorat showcases his great technique
and produces a beautiful lofted cross into
the box. Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach)
meets the cross and gets himself onto the
scoresheet with a header into the middle
of the goal. It's 1:1.

Gerardo Seoane has decided to make a change.
Kevin Stoger (B. Monchengladbach) replaces
Alassane Plea.

Rocco Reitz comes off the pitch to be replaced
by Philipp Sander (B. Monchengladbach).

Gerardo Seoane decides to make a substitution.
Robin Hack will be replaced by Tomas Cvancara
(B. Monchengladbach).

The expression of the referee Martin Petersen
is crystal clear. This behaviour won't be
tolerated. Anthony Caci (Mainz) is shown
a yellow card.

What was Philipp Sander (B. Monchengladbach)
thinking? He will not get away with that.
The referee shows him a yellow card.

A substitution has been made. Jae-Sung Lee
goes off and Hyun-Seok Hong (Mainz) comes
on.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Nelson Weiper (Mainz) comes
onto the pitch for Armindo Sieb.

Here is a change. Anthony Caci is going
off and Bo Henriksen gives the last tactical
orders to Silvan Widmer (Mainz).

Silvan Widmer (Mainz) has to be very careful
for the rest of the match after receiving
a yellow card from the referee for a bad
tackle on an opponent.

The game has come to an end for Franck Honorat.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Fabio Cristian Chiarodia (B. Monchengladbach).
Nadiem Amiri (Mainz) earns the yellow card.

Goal 1:0! Tiago Tomas (Wolfsburg) taps home
from close range after the rebound fell
kindly into his path.

Ole Werner is forced to make a change. Anthony
Jung is not able to carry on due to injury.
He is replaced by Amos Pieper (Werder Bremen).

Maximilian Arnold (Wolfsburg) picks up a
yellow card.

Ralph Hasenhuttl is forced to make a change.
Maximilian Arnold (Wolfsburg) is unable
to continue due to injury, Yannick Gerhardt
comes on.

Goal! Marvin Ducksch puts a cross into the
box and finds Mitchell Weiser (Werder Bremen),
who latches on to it and strikes the ball
into the roof of the net. He makes it 1:1.

Goal! Felix Agu (Werder Bremen) is quickest
to react to the rebound and stabs the ball
into the back of the net. It's 1:2.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Patrick Wimmer (Wolfsburg) is replacing
Konstantinos Koulierakis.

Ralph Hasenhuttl has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Kilian Fischer (Wolfsburg)
replacing Ridle Baku.

Mitchell Weiser sends a precise lofted cross
into the box. Marvin Ducksch (Werder Bremen)
latches on to it and finishes with a quick
shot inside the left post. The goalkeeper
had no chance. The score changes to 1:3.

Patrick Wimmer (Wolfsburg) cannot believe
that he has been told to leave the field
of play after the referee blows his whistle
and sends him off!

Goal! Marvin Ducksch plays it to Marco Grull
(Werder Bremen), whose deflected shot from
inside the box goes past the helpless Kamil
Grabara. 1:4.

Substitution. Jonas Wind makes his way off
the pitch and Joakim Maehle (Wolfsburg)
comes on as his replacement.

Joakim Maehle (Wolfsburg) scores a goal!
He makes his way to the edge of the box
without any help from his teammates and
unleashes a shot that ends in the right
side of the goal, bouncing in off the post.

The manager makes a subsitution with Derrick
Kohn (Werder Bremen) coming on for Felix
Agu.

Ole Werner prepares a substitution. Julian
Malatini is replaced by Olivier Deman (Werder
Bremen).

Substitution. Marco Grull is replaced by
Keke Topp (Werder Bremen).

Olivier Deman (Werder Bremen) receives a
yellow card for a nasty tackle.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Oliver Burke (Werder Bremen)
replaces Marvin Ducksch.

Goal! A nice lofted pass into the box by
Tom Rothe is pounced on by Aljoscha Kemlein
(Union Berlin). His close-range strike flashes
past Timon Weiner and into the top right
corner. 0:1.

Tim Skarke (Union Berlin) is being substituted
because of an injury. Bo Svensson sends
Woo-Yeong Jeong on the pitch.

Marcel Rapp is forced to make an unplanned
substitution as Alexander Bernhardsson (Holstein
Kiel) suffers an injury and Steven Skrzybski
comes on.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Marcel Rapp probably wasn't
satisfied with the performance of Magnus
Knudsen (Holstein Kiel). He is replaced
by Shuto Machino.

Timo Gerach shows a yellow card to Marco
Komenda (Holstein Kiel) for his blatant
foul.

Patrick Erras will be replaced by Tymoteusz
Puchacz (Holstein Kiel).

This is a yellow card! Frederik Ronnow (Union
Berlin) is not happy with the decision,
but from our point of view it was clear.

Here's the change. Yorbe Vertessen leaves
the pitch and Laszlo Benes (Union Berlin)
comes on as a substitute.

Here is a change. Benedict Hollerbach is
going off and Bo Svensson gives the last
tactical orders to Jordan Siebatcheu (Union
Berlin).

Nicolai Remberg (Holstein Kiel) earns the
yellow card.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Marvin Schulz (Holstein
Kiel) comes onto the pitch for Finn Porath.

Marcel Rapp has decided to substitute Armin
Gigovic and he is replaced by Jann-Fiete
Arp (Holstein Kiel).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Robert Skov is coming onto
the pitch as Jordan Siebatcheu (Union Berlin)
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Bo Svensson decides to make a substitution.
Aljoscha Kemlein will be replaced by Janik
Haberer (Union Berlin).

The score has changed – 0:2. Laszlo Benes
sends a fantastic cross into the box from
the corner. Tom Rothe (Union Berlin) jumps
highest and plants a header down inside
the right post.

Vincent Kompany is forced to make an unplanned
substitution as Aleksandar Pavlovic suffers
an injury and Joao Palhinha (Bayern Munich)
comes on.

Tobias Stieler shows a yellow card to Deniz
Undav (VfB Stuttgart) for a tough tackle.

Nice piece of skill by Harry Kane (Bayern
Munich) as he collected a pass and fired
an unstoppable thunderbolt, leaving the
goalkeeper stranded. The shot went straight
into the bottom left corner.

Goal! 2:0. Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) taps
home from almost on the goal line after
a lucky rebound fell at his feet.

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to make a
change. Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart) replaces
Ermedin Demirovic.

Ramon Hendriks goes off the pitch and Maximilian
Mittelstadt (VfB Stuttgart) comes on.

Here is a change. Raphael Guerreiro is going
off and Vincent Kompany gives the last tactical
orders to Konrad Laimer (Bayern Munich).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Kingsley Coman (Bayern
Munich) comes onto the pitch so that Serge
Gnabry can be given a rest.

Vincent Kompany has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Leroy Sane (Bayern Munich)
replacing Michael Olise.

Tobias Stieler shows the yellow card to

by Kevin Vogt (Union Berlin) into the top

Woo-Yeong Jeong (Union Berlin) picks up

The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet
of Yorbe Vertessen (Union Berlin) just outside
the box. He doesn't think twice and fires

Even though his attempt wasn't very accurate,
Gregor Kobel couldn't stop it, so the score
changes to 2:0.

Bo Svensson has decided to substitute Kevin
Vogt and he is replaced by Leopold Querfeld

Goal! Julian Ryerson (Dortmund) collects
a pass and without hesitation fires an unstoppable

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Jamie Gittens departs the

Malen (Dortmund).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Felix Nmecha (Dortmund)

Here is a change. Aljoscha Kemlein is going

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Substitution. Andras Schafer (Union Berlin)

Nuri Sahin decides to make a substitution.

The foul by Marcel Sabitzer (Dortmund) is

Tobias Reichel shows the yellow card to

Christopher Trimmel (Union Berlin) can't

Waldemar Anton (Dortmund) has received a

Ramy Bensebaini (Dortmund) sees a yellow

Maximilian Eggestein (Freiburg) is cautioned

Here comes a substitution. Skelly Alvero

Julian Schuster has decided to introduce

Eren Dinkci has picked up an injury and

Goal! Ritsu Doan (Freiburg) gets a shot

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Vincenzo Grifo walks off the pitch to

Ole Werner prepares a substitution. Derrick

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Julian Schuster decides to make a substitution.

It's time for a substitution. That's the

Anthony Jung goes off the pitch and Oliver

Tobias Welz shows a yellow card to Julian

Goal! Keven Schlotterbeck (Augsburg) pounced

Here comes a substitution. Marvin Friedrich

Here is a change. Marius Wolf is going off

The referee signals that it is time for

A yellow card for a tackle by Julian Weigl

Today's match ends for Tomas Cvancara who

Goal! Alexis Claude-Maurice (Augsburg) fires

The score is 2:0.

Jess Thorup has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Chrislain Matsima (Augsburg)

Goal! The ball is swung into the box from

is both strong and precise enough to go

Elvis Rexhbecaj (Augsburg) picks up a yellow

It is time for a substitution. Stefan Lainer

Substitution. Elvis Rexhbecaj walks off
the pitch and Fredrik Jensen (Augsburg)

The game is interrupted. Luca Netz (B. Monchengladbach)

Robin Hack (B. Monchengladbach) gets booked

The foul by Maximilian Bauer (Augsburg)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Florian Badstubner.

Goal! Mergim Berisha gets to the ball, slips
Marius Bulter (Hoffenheim) into the area
and he scores with a delightful chipped
finish to make it 1:0.

Marius Bulter (Hoffenheim) makes a great
solo run and pulls the trigger from inside
the box, beating Michael Zetterer with a
strike into the bottom left corner. He makes
it 2:0.

What was Umut Tohumcu (Hoffenheim) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee
shows him a yellow card.

Goal! Adam Hlozek (Hoffenheim) was in the
right place at the right time to get to
the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball into the top of the net.
It's 3:0.

That was really pointless! Stanley Nsoki
(Hoffenheim) made a mindless challenge and
the referee Tobias Reichel showed him a
red card.

Goal! Julian Malatini (Werder Bremen) was
in the right place at the right time to
get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball low inside the left post.
It's 3:1.

The foul by Derrick Kohn (Werder Bremen)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Tobias Reichel.

Goal! Marvin Ducksch plays a hopeful cross
into a crowded box. Jens Stage (Werder Bremen)

inside the left post from close in. 3:2.

That's the end of the game for Mergim Berisha,
who is replaced by Tim Drexler (Hoffenheim).

Goal! Jens Stage (Werder Bremen) fires the

Alexander Prass will be replaced by Valentin

Pellegrino Matarazzo decides to make a substitution.

Goal! A nice lofted pass into the box by

Ole Werner is forced to make a change. Niklas

Substitution. Marius Bulter did his best
and is replaced by Max Moerstedt (Hoffenheim).

A yellow card for a tackle by Jens Stage
(Werder Bremen). Tobias Reichel doesn't

Pellegrino Matarazzo has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Jacob Bruun Larsen (Hoffenheim)

It's time for a substitution. Olivier Deman
(Werder Bremen) comes on in place of Derrick
Kohn.

Romano Schmid comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Keke Topp (Werder Bremen).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Senne Lynen trots off the

The main referee, Tobias Reichel, is apparently
not going to tolerate any discussions. Anton

It is time for a substitution. Marco Grull
(Werder Bremen) is on for Marvin Ducksch.

Tobias Reichel shows a yellow card to Tim

Keke Topp (Werder Bremen) will have to be

An amazing individual effort from Omar Marmoush
(Eintracht Frankfurt) ends with a strike
from inside the penalty area. He sends the
ball precisely into the bottom left corner
and makes it 0:1. Timon Weiner was helpless.

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Shuto Machino (Holstein Kiel) low into
the right of the net, giving goalkeeper
Kaua Santos no chance!

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Aurele Amenda (Eintracht Frankfurt) was
quite harsh and Tobias Stieler didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Dino
Toppmoller gives a chance to Mahmoud Dahoud
(Eintracht Frankfurt) and Aurele Amenda
is off.

The score has changed – 1:2. Omar Marmoush
sends a fantastic cross into the box from

The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet
of Shuto Machino (Holstein Kiel) just outside
the box. He doesn't think twice and fires
a great shot into the bottom right corner.
His attempt was beyond the reach of Kaua
Santos, so the score changes to 2:2.

Finn Porath (Holstein Kiel) is given a fully
deserved yellow card.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Armin Gigovic as he

Goal! Omar Marmoush (Eintracht Frankfurt)
pounced on a loose ball inside the box and
beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the
bottom left corner. He makes it 2:3.

Substitution. Finn Porath makes his way
off the pitch and Steven Skrzybski (Holstein

Dino Toppmoller has decided to make a change.

Today's match ends for Igor Matanovic who

Tobias Stieler shows a yellow card to Robin

foul.

Goal! Omar Marmoush shows great vision to
find Tuta (Eintracht Frankfurt) with a cheeky

of the goal. 2:4.

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Marcel Rapp decides to make a substitution.
Carl Johansson will be replaced by Tymoteusz

Hugo Larsson (Eintracht Frankfurt) has tested

Dino Toppmoller has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Ellyes Skhiri (Eintracht
Frankfurt) replacing Hugo Larsson.

summary.incident:
It's in the back of the net! Robert Andrich
(Bayer Leverkusen) fires a brilliant volley
into the bottom left corner from the edge
of the box, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.
Granit Xhaka provided the assist. What a
finish! 0:1.

Robert Andrich (Bayer Leverkusen) gives
the referee no choice but to show him a
yellow card.

Absolutely fantastic goal! Aleksandar Pavlovic
(Bayern Munich) hits a perfect volley from
far out and the ball flies into the top
right corner. Take a bow.

Florian Wirtz (Bayer Leverkusen) makes a
bad tackle on his opponent and is angry
when the referee shows him a deserved yellow
card.

Substitution. Martin Terrier walks off the
pitch and Amine Adli (Bayer Leverkusen)
comes on as a substitute.

Here comes a substitution. Serge Gnabry
is given a rest as he is replaced by Kingsley
Coman (Bayern Munich).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Alejandro Grimaldo (Bayer Leverkusen)
was quite harsh and Felix Zwayer didn't
hesitate to show him a yellow card.

Substitution. Michael Olise will be replaced
by Leroy Sane (Bayern Munich).

Raphael Guerreiro will be replaced by Konrad
Laimer (Bayern Munich).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Nathan Tella (Bayer Leverkusen)

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Bo Svensson

The booking goes to Kevin Stoger (B. Monchengladbach).

Bo Svensson has decided to substitute Benedict

The manager has decided to make a substitution

That's the end of the game for Philipp Sander,

Tomas Cvancara (B. Monchengladbach) heads

Goal! Elias Saad (St. Pauli) pounced on

Matthias Ginter (Freiburg) is booked after

Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) has a great chance

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle

Goal! Oladapo Afolayan (St. Pauli) beautifully

Julian Schuster has decided to substitute

Timo Gerach shows a yellow card to Nicolas

This is a yellow card! Scott Banks (St.

Marvin Pieringer (Heidenheim) meets a perfect

He makes it 0:1.

RED CARD! Andreas Hanche-Olsen (Mainz) makes

That's the end of the game for Hyun-Seok

What was Omar Haktab Traore (Heidenheim)
thinking? He will not get away with that.
The referee shows him a yellow card.

Moritz Jenz (Mainz) shouldn't be surprised

The referee gives a yellow card to Patrick
Mainka (Heidenheim) for talking back. He

Florian Exner shows a yellow card to Benedikt

We are about to witness a subsitution. Maximilian

Bo Henriksen isn't happy on the touchline

The substitution is prepared. Armindo Sieb

Dominik Kohr (Mainz) commits a foul and

Omar Haktab Traore will be replaced by Luca

Here comes a substitution. Silvan Widmer

Bo Henriksen has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Paul Nebel (Mainz) replacing

Jae-Sung Lee will be replaced by Nelson

The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate
this behaviour. Marvin Pieringer (Heidenheim)

It's a foul from Niklas Dorsch (Heidenheim).
Surprisingly, the referee comes and pulls

Jan Schoppner (Heidenheim) jumps highest
inside the box to meet the resulting corner

Substitution. Marvin Pieringer makes his
way off the pitch and Lennard Maloney (Heidenheim)

Benjamin Sesko (RB Leipzig) receives a quality
pass, makes a yard for himself and smashes

bottom left corner. What a remarkable goal!

Goal! David Raum is the provider and Benjamin
Sesko (RB Leipzig) is the executioner, dispatching

close in with his head. 2:0.

Jeffrey Gouweleeuw (Augsburg) wastes a huge

Nicolas Seiwald (RB Leipzig) picks up a
yellow card.

Lois Openda (RB Leipzig) scores! He latches

the left post and past the goalkeeper.

Goal! Xavi Simons (RB Leipzig) shows perfect

the right post. It's 4:0.

Jess Thorup has decided to make a change.

The game has come to an end for Keven Schlotterbeck.

Jess Thorup decides to make a substitution.
Elvis Rexhbecaj will be replaced by Fredrik

The referee stops play so that a substitution

Marco Rose has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Benjamin Henrichs (RB Leipzig)

Frank Onyeka (Augsburg) is yellow-carded

The referee stops play so that a substitution

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Chrislain Matsima (Augsburg) was quite
harsh and Daniel Siebert didn't hesitate

Marco Rose prepares a substitution. Castello

That will be all from Benjamin Sesko who

It's a goal! Mohamed Amoura plays the ball

The game is interrupted. Atakan Karazor

Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart) wastes a huge

Maximilian Arnold (Wolfsburg) receives a

It's 2:1! Jonas Wind feeds Mohamed Amoura

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to make a

The manager has decided to make a substitution

Mohamed Amoura (Wolfsburg) is shown a red

Substitution. Mattias Svanberg makes his
way off the pitch and Aster Vranckx (Wolfsburg)

Sebastian Hoeness decides to make a substitution.
Jamie Leweling will be replaced by Nick
Woltemade (VfB Stuttgart).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Pascal Stenzel (VfB Stuttgart)
comes onto the pitch so that Josha Vagnoman

Mohamed Amoura (Wolfsburg) is not able to
continue due to his injury and will be replaced

Here is a change. Maximilian Arnold is going
off and Ralph Hasenhuttl gives the last
tactical orders to Salih Ozcan (Wolfsburg).

This is a yellow card! Aster Vranckx (Wolfsburg)
is not happy with the decision, but from

The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate
this behaviour. Konstantinos Koulierakis
(Wolfsburg) is given a yellow card.

What a hit! Deniz Undav (VfB Stuttgart)

2:2.

Goal Matus Bero (Bochum)! Matus Bero (Bochum)

GOAL! Keeper Gregor Kobel totally miss kicks
the ball straight to Dani de Wit (Bochum),

range. It’s now 0:2.

Julian Brandt produces a beautiful lofted
cross into the box, where Serhou Guirassy
(Dortmund) rises high to head the ball straight

He makes it 1:2.

The referee can't ignore those comments
and Yan Couto (Dortmund) sees a yellow card

Goal! Emre Can (Dortmund) wins the battle
