Substitution. Moritz Broschinski (Bochum)
receives a signal from the referee and is
now allowed to enter the pitch as Myron
Boadu walks off.

Jamie Gittens is not able to continue due
to his injury and will be replaced by Julien
Duranville (Dortmund).

Pascal Gross (Dortmund) has to be very careful
for the rest of the match after receiving
a yellow card from the referee for a bad
tackle on an opponent.

That's the end of the game for Philipp Hofmann,
who is replaced by Koji Miyoshi (Bochum).

Here is a change. Julian Brandt is going
off and Nuri Sahin gives the last tactical
orders to Maximilian Beier (Dortmund).

Substitution. Felix Nmecha (Dortmund) in,
Pascal Gross out.

Here's the change. Julian Ryerson leaves
the pitch and Ramy Bensebaini (Dortmund)
comes on as a substitute.

Goal! A great through ball by Karim Adeyemi
sets up Serhou Guirassy (Dortmund) inside
the box, and he makes no mistake and bangs
the ball low into the middle of the goal.
3:2.

Felix Nmecha (Dortmund) latches on to a
brilliant pass and hits a poor shot towards
the middle of the goal, but the ball goes
into the back of the net after the goalkeeper
makes a howler!

Today's match ends for Ibrahima Sissoko
who will be replaced by Moritz-Broni Kwarteng
(Bochum).

Peter Zeidler has decided to substitute
Matus Bero and he is replaced by Aliou Balde
(Bochum).

Substitution. Niklas Sule (Dortmund) on
for Yan Couto.

Amadou Haidara (RB Leipzig) picks up a yellow
card for an infringement.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Philipp Treu (St. Pauli) was quite harsh
and Robert Hartmann didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

That will be all from Yussuf Poulsen who
is being replaced by the fresh legs of Lois
Openda (RB Leipzig).

Marco Rose has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Arthur Vermeeren (RB Leipzig)
replacing Amadou Haidara.

Today's match ends for Christoph Baumgartner
who will be replaced by Antonio Nusa (RB
Leipzig).

Substitution. Johannes Eggestein leaves
the pitch and is replaced by Morgan Guilavogui
(St. Pauli).

Alexander Blessin has decided to make a
change. Adam Dzwigala (St. Pauli) replaces
Manolis Saliakas.

The referee is firm and issues Elias Saad
(St. Pauli) a deserved yellow card.

Substitution. David Raum is replaced by
Benjamin Henrichs (RB Leipzig).

Marco Rose prepares a substitution. Benjamin
Sesko is replaced by Andre Silva (RB Leipzig).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Connor Metcalfe (St. Pauli)
comes onto the pitch for Carlo Boukhalfa.

Substitution. Scott Banks (St. Pauli) on
for Oladapo Afolayan.

Deniz Undav (VfB Stuttgart) picks up a sweet
through pass and smashes it in off the post.
Not the best finish, but the ball can be
found in the back of the net and that's
the most important thing.

Jamie Leweling (VfB Stuttgart) uses bad
language while talking to the referee and
receives a yellow card for dissent.

Goal! Maximilian Mittelstadt is the provider
and Ermedin Demirovic (VfB Stuttgart) is
the executioner, dispatching the cross into
the left side of the goal from close in
with his head. 2:0.

Felix Nmecha is being substituted because
of an injury. Nuri Sahin sends Jamie Gittens
(Dortmund) on the pitch.

The referee signals a substitution. Yan
Couto (Dortmund) is brought on as a substitute
for Julian Ryerson.

Nuri Sahin has decided to substitute Karim
Adeyemi and he is replaced by Ramy Bensebaini
(Dortmund).

GOAL! A cross into the box is headed down
by Atakan Karazor and Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart)
does brilliantly to get to the ball and
fire home. 3:0.

Substitution. Pascal Gross is replaced by
Donyell Malen (Dortmund).

It's time for a substitution. Fabian Rieder
(VfB Stuttgart) comes on in place of Ermedin
Demirovic.

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Dan-Axel Zagadou (VfB Stuttgart)
replacing Jeff Chabot.

Maximilian Mittelstadt comes off the pitch
to be replaced by Anrie Chase (VfB Stuttgart).

The manager makes a subsitution with Emre
Can (Dortmund) coming on for Julian Brandt.

Emre Can (Dortmund) can't expect anything
else than a yellow card for his hard tackle.
And a yellow it is. Florian Badstubner didn't
think twice about pulling it out of his
pocket.

Serhou Guirassy (Dortmund) makes a great
solo run and pulls the trigger from inside
the box, beating Alexander Nubel with a
low strike into the middle of the goal.
He makes it 3:1.

Marcel Sabitzer (Dortmund) is awarded a
yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem
to agree with the decision, but Florian
Badstubner ignores the protests.

Here comes a substitution. El Bilal Toure
(VfB Stuttgart) is brought on as a substitute
for Josha Vagnoman.

Goal! Enzo Millot produces a great pass
that finds El Bilal Toure (VfB Stuttgart)
inside the penalty area, who takes advantage
of the situation to rifle a shot into the
bottom right corner. 4:1.

Ramy Bensebaini (Dortmund) is booked for
saying more than Florian Badstubner was
willing to tolerate.

Angelo Stiller will be replaced by Chris
Fuhrich (VfB Stuttgart).

Goal! Deniz Undav (VfB Stuttgart) takes
a short pass from Enzo Millot in his stride
in the box, jinks inside his man and unleashes
an unstoppable shot into the bottom right
corner. 5:1.

Own goal! Nordi Mukiele (Bayer Leverkusen)
suffers a good deal of misfortune as he
accidentally puts a pass from one of the
attacking players into his own net. The
score is 0:1.

Goal! Florian Wirtz (Bayer Leverkusen) shows
perfect technique and produces a first-time
effort from just outside the box that goes
inside the left post. It's 1:1.

Jonathan Tah (Bayer Leverkusen) meets the
corner and displays his eye for goal as
he coolly plants a header from close range
into the right side of the goal. The score
is 2:1.

Jeanuel Belocian (Bayer Leverkusen) gives
the referee no choice but to show him a
yellow card.

Sebastiaan Bornauw (Wolfsburg) jumped highest
inside the box to meet a perfectly executed
corner kick by Jakub Kaminski. His bullet
header went towards the middle of the goal
and behind the goalkeeper. It's 2:2.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Konstantinos Koulierakis
(Wolfsburg) will replace Ridle Baku.

What a beauty from just outside the box!
Mattias Svanberg (Wolfsburg) lashed the
ball with incredible pace and power inside
the right post.

The referee shows a yellow card to Alejandro
Grimaldo (Bayer Leverkusen). No wonder.
A clear yellow for bad language.

Half-time substitution. Xabi Alonso decided
to make a change. Jeanuel Belocian (Bayer
Leverkusen) is replaced by Piero Hincapie.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Xabi Alonso probably wasn't
satisfied with the performance of Nordi
Mukiele (Bayer Leverkusen). He is replaced
by Jeremie Frimpong.

Aleix Garcia sends in a great cross from
the corner and finds Piero Hincapie (Bayer
Leverkusen), who outjumps the defence to
put the ball into the roof of the net with
a stunning header. The score is 3:3.

Tiago Tomas (Wolfsburg) makes it easy for
the referee to show him a yellow card.

This is a yellow card! Amine Adli (Bayer
Leverkusen) is not happy with the decision,
but from our point of view it was clear.

The substitution has been made. Martin Terrier
(Bayer Leverkusen) has replaced Amine Adli.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Patrik Schick as he
is replaced by Victor Boniface (Bayer Leverkusen).

Ralph Hasenhuttl has decided to substitute
Tiago Tomas and he is replaced by Yannick
Gerhardt (Wolfsburg).

Here comes a substitution. Patrick Wimmer
is given a rest as he is replaced by Aster
Vranckx (Wolfsburg).

Substitution. Mattias Svanberg did his best
and is replaced by Salih Ozcan (Wolfsburg).

Xabi Alonso prepares a substitution. Aleix
Garcia is replaced by Exequiel Palacios
(Bayer Leverkusen).

The referee is firm and issues Cedric Zesiger
(Wolfsburg) a deserved yellow card.

Red card! Yannick Gerhardt (Wolfsburg) simply
can't believe his eyes. The referee makes
the call and sends him off.

Jeremie Frimpong (Bayer Leverkusen) violates
the laws of the game and is shown a deserved
yellow card by the referee.

Kamil Grabara (Wolfsburg) receives a yellow
card from the referee as expected.

Maximilian Arnold (Wolfsburg) is given a
fully deserved yellow card.

Mohamed Amoura (Wolfsburg) must leave the
pitch due to his teammate's red card and
Denis Vavro comes onto the pitch.

Goal! Victor Boniface (Bayer Leverkusen)
pounced on a loose ball inside the box and
beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the
bottom left corner. He makes it 4:3.

It's like he was asking for a caution. Jakub
Kaminski (Wolfsburg) receives a yellow card.

The whistle blows and Julian Weigl (B. Monchengladbach)
is booked for an infringement.

Goal! Hugo Larsson (Eintracht Frankfurt)
beautifully controls a strongly hit pass
from Ansgar Knauff inside the box. He cuts
inside his marker and rifles the ball into
the right side of the goal. 1:0.

Arthur Theate (Eintracht Frankfurt) can't
expect anything else than a yellow card
for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is.
Tobias Welz didn't think twice about pulling
it out of his pocket.

Here comes a substitution. Fares Chaibi
is given a rest as he is replaced by Junior
Dina Ebimbe (Eintracht Frankfurt).

Gerardo Seoane decides to make a substitution.
Robin Hack will be replaced by Alassane
Plea (B. Monchengladbach).

Substitution. Julian Weigl leaves the pitch
and is replaced by Philipp Sander (B. Monchengladbach).

Substitution. Tomas Cvancara (B. Monchengladbach)
replaces Nathan Ngoumou.

Dino Toppmoller has decided to make a change.
Igor Matanovic (Eintracht Frankfurt) replaces
Hugo Ekitike.

Substitution. Jean-Matteo Bahoya (Eintracht
Frankfurt) has come on for Ansgar Knauff.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Rocco Reitz departs the
field of play to be replaced by Florian
Neuhaus (B. Monchengladbach).

Goal! Jean-Matteo Bahoya manages to prod
the ball to Omar Marmoush (Eintracht Frankfurt)
after a melee inside the box, and he needs
no second invitation to slot the ball into
the roof of the net. 2:0.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Niels
Nkounkou (Eintracht Frankfurt) for Omar
Marmoush.

Dino Toppmoller prepares a substitution.
Hugo Larsson is replaced by Mahmoud Dahoud
(Eintracht Frankfurt).

Substitution. Anthony Losilla (Bochum) replaces
Erhan Masovic.

Goal! Myron Boadu displays great vision
and sends a pass to Matus Bero (Bochum),
who shows brilliant composure inside the
box to bury the ball into the bottom right
corner. The score is 1:1.

Lukas Daschner (Bochum) receives a precise
pass inside the box from Philipp Hofmann
and he beats the goalkeeper with a neat
finish into the left side of the net. 2:1.

Matus Bero (Bochum) is booked for saying
more than Martin Petersen was willing to
tolerate.

Half-time substitution. Marcel Rapp decided
to make a change. Tymoteusz Puchacz (Holstein
Kiel) is replaced by Lasse Rosenboom.

Dani de Wit (Bochum) is shown a yellow card
by the referee for making a challenge on
his opponent, but he looks angry with the
decision.

Substitution. Myron Boadu makes way for
Moritz Broschinski (Bochum).

Peter Zeidler has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Moritz-Broni Kwarteng (Bochum)
replacing Lukas Daschner.

Marcel Rapp decides to make a substitution.
Andu Yobel Kelati will be replaced by Jann-Fiete
Arp (Holstein Kiel).

Lewis Holtby will be replaced by Steven
Skrzybski (Holstein Kiel).

That will be a yellow card for one of the
players. The one who gets booked is Philipp
Hofmann (Bochum).

Is that a yellow card in the referee's hand?
It is! Felix Passlack (Bochum) gets booked.

Marcel Rapp prepares a substitution. Max
Geschwill is replaced by Shuto Machino (Holstein
Kiel).

That's the end of the game for Armin Gigovic,
who is replaced by Nicolai Remberg (Holstein
Kiel).

The substitution is prepared. Mats Pannewig
(Bochum) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Philipp Hofmann.

It's a goal! Shuto Machino (Holstein Kiel)
scores with a brilliant low shot into the
middle of the goal after being released
inside the box by a superb lofted pass from
Steven Skrzybski. The score is now 2:2.

Magnus Knudsen (Holstein Kiel) shouldn't
be surprised it's a yellow from the ref,
who cooled the situation down well.

Ritsu Doan (Freiburg) receives a precise
pass just outside the box and produces a
glorious strike into the left side of the
goal off the post. The goalkeeper was helpless.

Junior Adamu (Freiburg) is shown a yellow
card by the referee for dissent.

Goal! Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) was in the
right place at the right time to get to
the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball low inside the right post.
It's 0:2.

Substitution. Leo Scienza (Heidenheim) receives
a signal from the referee and is now allowed
to enter the pitch as Mathias Honsak walks
off.

Frank Schmidt has decided to make a change.
Stefan Schimmer (Heidenheim) replaces Maximilian
Breunig.

Substitution. Marnon Busch makes way for
Sirlord Conteh (Heidenheim).

The game has come to an end for Eren Dinkci.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Lucas Holer (Freiburg).

Goal! Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) fires the
rebound into the bottom right corner after
the ball breaks to him in the box. The score
is 0:3.

Here is a change. Junior Adamu is going
off and Julian Schuster gives the last tactical
orders to Florent Muslija (Freiburg).

The substitution is prepared. Niklas Dorsch
(Heidenheim) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Lennard Maloney.

Substitution. Jan Schoppner (Heidenheim)
replaces Paul Wanner.

Benjamin Brand shows a yellow card to Marvin
Pieringer (Heidenheim) for his blatant foul.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Christian Gunter as
he is replaced by Jordy Makengo (Freiburg).

Julian Schuster prepares a substitution.
Vincenzo Grifo is replaced by Noah Weisshaupt
(Freiburg).

Substitution. Ritsu Doan walks off the pitch
and Johan Manzambi (Freiburg) comes on as
a substitute.

Tom Rothe (Union Berlin) is the first to
get to a rebound inside the penalty area
and his weak, but precise effort finds its
way into the back of the net, bouncing in
off the crossbar.

Woo-Yeong Jeong (Union Berlin) receives
the ball inside the box, reacts quickly
and without any problems stabs the ball
inside the left post.

The foul by Jordan Siebatcheu (Union Berlin)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Matthias Jollenbeck.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Valentin Gendrey (Hoffenheim)
is coming onto the pitch as Robin Hranac
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Pellegrino Matarazzo has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Umut Tohumcu (Hoffenheim)
replacing Tim Drexler.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Jordan Siebatcheu departs
the field of play to be replaced by Tim
Skarke (Union Berlin).

Pavel Kaderabek (Hoffenheim) is awarded
a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't
seem to agree with the decision, but Matthias
Jollenbeck ignores the protests.

Substitution. Mergim Berisha did his best
and is replaced by Haris Tabakovic (Hoffenheim).

Bo Svensson has decided to substitute Benedict
Hollerbach and he is replaced by Yorbe Vertessen
(Union Berlin).

Marius Bulter (Hoffenheim) makes a great
solo run and pulls the trigger from inside
the box, beating Frederik Ronnow with a
strike into the bottom left corner. He makes
it 2:1.

Christopher Trimmel (Union Berlin) joins
the action as a substitute, replacing Janik
Haberer.

Woo-Yeong Jeong will be replaced by Laszlo
Benes (Union Berlin).

Tom Rothe (Union Berlin) has tested the
patience of referee Matthias Jollenbeck
and goes into the book for a previous late
challenge.

Bo Svensson is forced to make a change.
Tom Rothe is unable to continue due to injury,
Leopold Querfeld (Union Berlin) comes on.

Matthias Jollenbeck shows the yellow card
to Tom Bischof (Hoffenheim) for a heavy
challenge.

That's the end of the game for Tom Bischof,
who is replaced by Jacob Bruun Larsen (Hoffenheim).

Yorbe Vertessen (Union Berlin) receives
a yellow card from the referee, but it seems
like a very harsh decision.

Umut Tohumcu (Hoffenheim) takes his opponent
down and receives a yellow card from the
referee.

Substitution. Alexander Prass is replaced
by Adam Hlozek (Hoffenheim).

Goal! Harry Kane provides Michael Olise
(Bayern Munich) with a nice pass inside
the box. It allows him to finish with a
precise effort into the bottom left corner.
0:1.

Goal - 0:2! Michael Olise laid the ball
off to Jamal Musiala (Bayern Munich), who
slots it into the back of the net from close
range, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

The whistle is blown for an infringement
and Konrad Laimer (Bayern Munich) receives
a yellow card!

The need to improve in the second half has
brought about a change. Marco Grull comes
off for Derrick Kohn (Werder Bremen).

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Ole Werner
gives a chance to Keke Topp and Marvin Ducksch
(Werder Bremen) is off.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Kingsley Coman as
he is replaced by Serge Gnabry (Bayern Munich).

Vincent Kompany has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Raphael Guerreiro (Bayern
Munich) replacing Konrad Laimer.

GOAL! Superb work from Michael Olise, who
plays a vital role in the build-up. He squares
it to Harry Kane (Bayern Munich), who beats
Michael Zetterer with a brilliant shot into
the bottom right corner. 0:3.

Michael Olise (Bayern Munich) takes a great
first touch to control a killer pass on
the edge of the box and curls the ball into
the top left corner in trademark fashion.

Harry Kane produces a sweet pass and picks
out Serge Gnabry (Bayern Munich) inside
the box. He quickly takes a shot which goes
into the bottom right corner and leaves
the goalkeeper helpless. He makes it 0:5!

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Jens Stage departs the field
of play to be replaced by Skelly Alvero
(Werder Bremen).

The foul by Aleksandar Pavlovic (Bayern
Munich) is worthy of a card and a yellow
is duly shown by Bastian Dankert.

Vincent Kompany has decided to make a change.
Joao Palhinha (Bayern Munich) replaces Aleksandar
Pavlovic.

Substitution. Leroy Sane (Bayern Munich)
has come on for Michael Olise.

A substitution has been made. Harry Kane
is replaced by Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich).

Today's referee Bastian Dankert rightly
decides to book Dayot Upamecano (Bayern
Munich) for his harsh tackle.

Ole Werner has decided to substitute Amos
Pieper and he is replaced by Julian Malatini
(Werder Bremen).

The substitution is prepared. Olivier Deman
(Werder Bremen) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Felix Agu.

It's a goal! Armindo Sieb (Mainz) does well
to meet a cross inside the box and powers
a header past the helpless goalkeeper.

Jonathan Burkardt (Mainz) strikes with a
perfect low header inside the left post
after a brilliant cross! He found himself
unmarked and nodded the ball past the goalkeeper.
Brilliant finish!

Keven Schlotterbeck (Augsburg) with a wonderful
piece of finishing. He makes a yard for
himself after a well-taken pass inside the
box and nets low into the middle of the
goal.

Andreas Hanche-Olsen (Mainz) receives a
yellow card from the referee for a foul
that he committed a little earlier.

A yellow card for bad language! Nadiem Amiri
(Mainz) couldn’t remain silent and the result
is obvious.

RED CARD! Nadiem Amiri (Mainz) makes a bad
challenge and receives a second yellow card
from Soren Storks. He can have an early
bath.

Bo Henriksen is forced to make a tactical
change due to a red card. Armindo Sieb (Mainz)
will be replaced by Aymen Barkok.

Half-time substitution. Jess Thorup decided
to make a change. Maximilian Bauer (Augsburg)
is replaced by Steve Mounie.

Goal! Jonathan Burkardt (Mainz) finds some
space inside the box to meet a beautiful
cross and fires the ball inside the back
of the net.

Samuel Essende (Augsburg) scores from quite
a difficult position as he leaps high to
connect with a cross and powers his header
low inside the right post. Excellent finish.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Arne Maier (Augsburg) replaces
Kristijan Jakic.

Bo Henriksen has decided to substitute Hyun-Seok
Hong and he is replaced by Maxim Leitsch
(Mainz).

Here is a change. Ruben Vargas is going
off and Jess Thorup gives the last tactical
orders to Phillip Tietz (Augsburg).

Substitution. Elvis Rexhbecaj makes his
way off the pitch and Fredrik Jensen (Augsburg)
comes on as his replacement.

Jess Thorup has decided to make a change.
Yusuf Kabadayi (Augsburg) replaces Marius
Wolf.

Yellow card. Frank Onyeka (Augsburg) goes
into the book for a bad tackle on his opponent.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Silvan Widmer (Mainz)
comes onto the pitch so that Anthony Caci
can be given a rest.

Bo Henriksen has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Karim Onisiwo (Mainz) replacing
Jonathan Burkardt.

Dominik Kohr (Mainz) commits a foul and
is shown a yellow card without any hesitation
from the referee.

Is that a yellow card in the referee's hand?
It is! Silvan Widmer (Mainz) gets booked.

Although Elvis Rexhbecaj (Augsburg) is just
on the bench, Soren Storks has awarded him
with a yellow card. Unsporting behavior
says the referee.

Jeffrey Gouweleeuw (Augsburg) receives a
yellow card for infringement.

Goal! Marvin Ducksch (Werder Bremen) puts
the ball into the top right corner past
the outstretched arm of Robin Zentner.

Justin Njinmah doesn't have to suffer any
longer with the painful injury as Marco
Grull (Werder Bremen) comes onto the pitch
to replace him.

GOAL! Keeper Michael Zetterer totally miss
kicks the ball straight to Jae-Sung Lee
(Mainz), who slams the ball into the net
from mid range. It’s now 1:1.

The foul by Anthony Caci (Mainz) is worthy
of a card and a yellow is duly shown by
Benjamin Brand.

Dominik Kohr (Mainz) has tested the patience
of referee Benjamin Brand and goes into
the book for a previous late challenge.
Werder Bremen will take a free kick.

Marco Friedl (Werder Bremen) makes an ugly
challenge on his opponent and receives a
red card from the referee! Mainz are awarded
a free kick from a dangerous position.

Michael Zetterer (Werder Bremen) attempts
to discuss the decision with Benjamin Brand,
but he soon realises that it's not the right
thing to do as he sees the yellow.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Hyun-Seok Hong as
he is replaced by Armindo Sieb (Mainz).

The referee has issued a yellow card to
Phillipp Mwene (Mainz).

Ole Werner has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Derrick Kohn (Werder Bremen)
replacing Marvin Ducksch.

Felix Agu (Werder Bremen) goes off the pitch
and Julian Malatini comes on.

Derrick Kohn (Werder Bremen) receives the
ball inside the box, reacts quickly and
without any problems fires the ball into
the back of the net.

The substitution is prepared. Paul Nebel
(Mainz) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Anthony Caci.

Bo Henriksen decides to make a substitution.
Kaishu Sano will be replaced by Silvan Widmer
(Mainz).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Karim Onisiwo (Mainz)
will replace Phillipp Mwene.

Bo Henriksen has decided to substitute Dominik
Kohr and he is replaced by Aymen Barkok
(Mainz).

The referee signals a substitution. Keke
Topp is brought on as a substitute for Senne
Lynen (Werder Bremen).

Substitution. Skelly Alvero in, Marco Grull
(Werder Bremen) out.

Felix Zwayer shows a yellow card to Morgan
Guilavogui (St. Pauli) for his blatant foul.

Lars Ritzka (St. Pauli) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Felix Zwayer
had an easy-decision to make.

Problems for Alexander Blessin as Morgan
Guilavogui is not able to play anymore.
His injury is too serious and Oladapo Afolayan
(St. Pauli) replaces him.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Samuel Essende (Augsburg) was quite harsh
and Felix Zwayer didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Here is a change after the half-time break.
Robert Wagner is replaced by Elias Saad
(St. Pauli).

Alexander Blessin makes a half-time substitution.
Manolis Saliakas (St. Pauli) comes on in
place of Lars Ritzka.

Goal! Marius Wolf (Augsburg) was in the
right place at the right time to get to
the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball into the left side of the
goal. It's 1:0.

Elvis Rexhbecaj (Augsburg) has tested the
patience of referee Felix Zwayer and goes
into the book for a previous late challenge.

Substitution. Marius Wolf is replaced by
Mads Pedersen (Augsburg).

Jess Thorup decides to make a substitution.
Ruben Vargas will be replaced by Phillip
Tietz (Augsburg).

Dimitrios Giannoulis (Augsburg) is booked
after bringing down an opponent. Felix Zwayer
had an easy-decision to make.

Frank Onyeka sends a precise lofted cross
into the box. Phillip Tietz (Augsburg) latches
on to it and finishes with a quick shot
inside the right post. The goalkeeper had
no chance. The score changes to 2:0.

It's in the back of the net! Elias Saad
sends a superb cross into the box. Carlo
Boukhalfa (St. Pauli) latches on to it and
from near the penalty spot powers a header
low inside the right post, leaving Nediljko
Labrovic beaten. He displayed his eye for
goal there - excellent finish. The score
is 2:1.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Yusuf Kabadayi (Augsburg)
comes onto the pitch so that Samuel Essende
can be given a rest.

Jess Thorup has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Henri Koudossou (Augsburg) replacing
Dimitrios Giannoulis.

Substitution. Frank Onyeka makes way for
Arne Maier (Augsburg).

Here is a change. Johannes Eggestein is
going off and Alexander Blessin gives the
last tactical orders to Andreas Nielsen
Albers (St. Pauli).

Here comes a substitution. Adam Dzwigala
(St. Pauli) is brought on as a substitute
for Carlo Boukhalfa.

Phillip Tietz (Augsburg) receives a yellow
card from the referee as expected.

Karol Mets (St. Pauli) is rightly booked
by the referee because it could not have
been anything other than a yellow card.

Goal! Kristijan Jakic puts Yusuf Kabadayi
(Augsburg) in the clear with just the keeper
to beat. He takes his shot early from the
edge of the box and scores beautifully low
into the middle of the goal. 3:1.

It's in! Harry Kane spots his teammate in
a good position on the edge of the box and
provides him with a nice pass. Jamal Musiala
(Bayern Munich) doesn't think twice and
rifles a first-time shot into the bottom
left corner. The score is now 0:1.

GOAL! Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) gets to
the ball on the edge of the box after a
huge mistake by an opponent and slams it
into the back of the net. He makes it 0:2.

This is definitely not what Nicolai Remberg
(Holstein Kiel) wanted. Attempting to intercept
an offensive pass, he scored an own goal
and made it 0:3.

Kingsley Coman produces a killer pass to
release Harry Kane (Bayern Munich), who
then unleashes a low drive from the edge
of the box and scores! The ball goes in
off the right post, leaving the goalkeeper
stranded. 0:4!

Dirk Bremser makes a switch. Tymoteusz Puchacz
is coming on in place of Dominik Javorcek
(Holstein Kiel) at the start of the second
period.

Half-time substitution. Dirk Bremser decided
to make a change. Patrick Erras (Holstein
Kiel) is replaced by Max Geschwill.

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Vincent
Kompany gives a chance to Thomas Muller
and Jamal Musiala (Bayern Munich) is off.

The game is over for Serge Gnabry (Bayern
Munich). Michael Olise comes on for the
second half.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Shuto Machino as he
is replaced by Jann-Fiete Arp (Holstein
Kiel).

Vincent Kompany has decided to substitute
Raphael Guerreiro and he is replaced by
Alphonso Davies (Bayern Munich).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Konrad Laimer (Bayern Munich)
comes onto the pitch for Sacha Boey.

Goal! Michael Olise (Bayern Munich) was
in the right place at the right time to
get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball low inside the left post.
It's 0:5.

The substitution has been made. Mathys Tel
(Bayern Munich) has replaced Kingsley Coman.

Dirk Bremser decides to make a substitution.
Finn Porath will be replaced by Lasse Rosenboom
(Holstein Kiel).

The referee signals a substitution. Armin
Gigovic (Holstein Kiel) is brought on as
a substitute for Lewis Holtby.

Joao Palhinha (Bayern Munich) sees a yellow
card from Tobias Reichel after he sent one
of the opposing players to the ground.

Goal! Armin Gigovic (Holstein Kiel) makes
the score 1:5 after burying a close-range
header in the right side of the goal after
a good run and cross by Tymoteusz Puchacz.

Goal! Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) calmly
steps up and places the ball into the bottom
left corner.

Josha Vagnoman (VfB Stuttgart) is given
a fully deserved yellow card.

Jamie Leweling fires in a promising shot
which ricochets off the goalkeeper back
to Deniz Undav (VfB Stuttgart) inside the
box and he sends the ball into the back
of the net. The score is 0:1.

Goal! Kevin Stoger finds Alassane Plea (B.
Monchengladbach) with a headed pass and
the latter glances a header past the goalkeeper
to make it 1:1.

Alassane Plea is being substituted because
of an injury. Gerardo Seoane sends Nathan
Ngoumou (B. Monchengladbach) on the pitch.

The referee is firm and issues Julian Weigl
(B. Monchengladbach) a deserved yellow card.

What a goal! Fabian Rieder plays it to Ermedin
Demirovic (VfB Stuttgart), who finds himself
unmarked inside the box and slots a first-time
shot past Jonas Omlin into the roof of the
net. 1:2.

Ermedin Demirovic (VfB Stuttgart) jumped
highest inside the box to meet a perfectly
executed corner kick by Fabian Rieder. His
header was precise and ended up inside the
right post, leaving the goalkeeper flapping
in the wind. The score is 1:3.

The substitution is prepared. Anthony Rouault
(VfB Stuttgart) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Josha Vagnoman.

Sebastian Hoeness has decided to substitute
Deniz Undav and he is replaced by Enzo Millot
(VfB Stuttgart).

A substitution has been made. Philipp Sander
is replaced by Rocco Reitz (B. Monchengladbach).

Franck Honorat comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Robin Hack (B. Monchengladbach).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Chris Fuhrich (VfB Stuttgart)
is coming onto the pitch as Fabian Rieder
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Sebastian Hoeness prepares a substitution.
Ermedin Demirovic is replaced by El Bilal
Toure (VfB Stuttgart).

Gerardo Seoane has decided to make a change.
Florian Neuhaus replaces Kevin Stoger (B.
Monchengladbach).

Here is a change. Julian Weigl (B. Monchengladbach)
is going off and Gerardo Seoane gives the
last tactical orders to Tomas Cvancara.

Substitution. Jamie Leweling makes his way
off the pitch and Dan-Axel Zagadou (VfB
Stuttgart) comes on as his replacement.

Dan-Axel Zagadou (VfB Stuttgart) violates
the laws of the game and is shown a deserved
yellow card by the referee.

Ko Itakura (B. Monchengladbach) is booked
after bringing down an opponent. Felix Brych
had an easy-decision to make.

Merlin Rohl is substituted due to injury.
Julian Schuster gives a chance to Eren Dinkci
(Freiburg).

Goal! Myron Boadu (Bochum) pounced on a
loose ball inside the box and beats the
goalkeeper with a low shot into the middle
of the net. He makes it 0:1.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Julian Schuster probably
wasn't satisfied with the performance of
Philipp Lienhart (Freiburg). He is replaced
by Matthias Ginter.

Julian Schuster makes a switch. Nicolas
Hofler (Freiburg) is coming on in place
of Patrick Osterhage at the start of the
second period.

Goal! Junior Adamu (Freiburg) collects a
pass and without hesitation fires an unstoppable
shot into the top right corner.

Goal! Junior Adamu (Freiburg) pounced on
a loose ball inside the penalty area and
beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the
bottom right corner. He makes it 2:1.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Moritz-Broni Kwarteng
(Bochum) comes onto the pitch so that Koji
Miyoshi can be given a rest.

Peter Zeidler has decided to make a change.
Philipp Hofmann (Bochum) replaces Moritz
Broschinski.

Peter Zeidler has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Lukas Daschner (Bochum) replacing
Myron Boadu.

It is time for a substitution. Aliou Balde
(Bochum) is on for Matus Bero.

Julian Schuster decides to make a substitution.
Ritsu Doan will be replaced by Lucas Holer
(Freiburg).

Is that a yellow card in the referee's hand?
It is! Aliou Balde (Bochum) gets booked.

Moritz-Broni Kwarteng (Bochum) sees a yellow
card from Daniel Siebert after he sent one
of the opposing players to the ground.

The substitution is prepared. Samuel Bamba
(Bochum) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Dani de Wit.

Here is a change. Junior Adamu is going
off and Julian Schuster gives the last tactical
orders to Kiliann Sildillia (Freiburg).

The goal by Freiburg is DISALLOWED on the
advice of the video assistant referee due
to an offside.

Daniel Siebert shows a yellow card to Maximilian
Wittek (Bochum) for a tough tackle.

Goal! Martin Terrier (Bayer Leverkusen)
scores after an assist by Victor Boniface
that allowed him to tap in the ball into
an empty net. The score is 0:1.

Victor Boniface (Bayer Leverkusen) displays
great tekkers inside the box leading to
a fantastic goal, leaving the goalkeeper
stranded.

Alexander Prass (Hoffenheim) is awarded
a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't
seem to agree with the decision, but Daniel
Schlager ignores the protests.

Mergim Berisha (Hoffenheim) hits a shot
towards goal after getting on the end of
a cross and the goalkeeper fails to keep
it out even though the ball is not struck
perfectly!

Martin Terrier (Bayer Leverkusen) will have
to be careful for the rest of the match
as he is shown a yellow card.

Daniel Schlager shows a yellow card to Robert
Andrich (Bayer Leverkusen), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

Substitution. Jeremie Frimpong (Bayer Leverkusen)
replaces Nathan Tella.

Substitution. Valentin Gendrey (Hoffenheim)
in, Alexander Prass out.

Here is a change. Mergim Berisha is going
off and Pellegrino Matarazzo gives the last
tactical orders to Jacob Bruun Larsen (Hoffenheim).

Goal! Florian Wirtz (Bayer Leverkusen) puts
the ball into the bottom left corner past
the outstretched arm of Oliver Baumann.

An amazing individual effort from Victor
Boniface (Bayer Leverkusen) ends with a
strike from inside the penalty area. He
sends the ball low into the middle of the
goal and makes it 1:4. Oliver Baumann was
helpless.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Tom Bischof (Hoffenheim)
replaces Tim Drexler.

Xabi Alonso decides to make a substitution.
Robert Andrich will be replaced by Aleix
Garcia (Bayer Leverkusen).

Here comes a substitution. Martin Terrier
is given a rest as he is replaced by Amine
Adli (Bayer Leverkusen).

The manager makes a subsitution with Patrik
Schick (Bayer Leverkusen) coming on for
Victor Boniface.

Xabi Alonso has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Nordi Mukiele (Bayer Leverkusen)
replacing Piero Hincapie.

Here comes a substitution. Umut Tohumcu
(Hoffenheim) is brought on as a substitute
for Andrej Kramaric.

Substitution. Max Moerstedt (Hoffenheim)
receives a signal from the referee and is
now allowed to enter the pitch as Marius
Bulter walks off.

The foul by Kevin Akpoguma (Hoffenheim)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Daniel Schlager.

Laszlo Benes (Union Berlin) sees a yellow
card from Sven Jablonski after he sent one
of the opposing players to the ground.

The foul by Amadou Haidara (RB Leipzig)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Sven Jablonski.

Substitution. Jordan Siebatcheu (Union Berlin)
on for Tim Skarke.

Babak Keyhanfar has decided to substitute
Laszlo Benes and he is replaced by Yorbe
Vertessen (Union Berlin).

Sven Jablonski shows a yellow card to Rani
Khedira (Union Berlin) for a tough tackle.

Here is a change. Amadou Haidara is going
off and Alexander Zickler gives the last
tactical orders to Arthur Vermeeren (RB
Leipzig).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Antonio Nusa (RB Leipzig)
replaces Benjamin Sesko.

Babak Keyhanfar has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Woo-Yeong Jeong (Union
Berlin) replacing Benedict Hollerbach.

The referee Sven Jablonski awards Kevin
Kampl (RB Leipzig) a yellow card.

Lois Openda (RB Leipzig) blows a huge chance
to score! He sends the penalty to the bottom
left corner, but it's not enough to beat
Frederik Ronnow who easily stops the effort.
The ball is out of play. RB Leipzig will
have a chance to score from a corner.

The manager makes a subsitution with Christoph
Baumgartner (RB Leipzig) coming on for Benjamin
Henrichs.

Babak Keyhanfar prepares a substitution.
Andras Schafer is replaced by Aljoscha Kemlein
(Union Berlin).

It will be a substitution. Leopold Querfeld
(Union Berlin) is ready to enter the pitch
as Tom Rothe walks off.

What was Danilho Doekhi (Union Berlin) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee
shows him a yellow card.

It's time for a substitution. Yussuf Poulsen
(RB Leipzig) comes on in place of Kevin
Kampl.

Alexander Zickler has decided to make a
change. El Chadaille Bitshiabu (RB Leipzig)
replaces Lutsharel Geertruida.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Ellyes Skhiri (Eintracht Frankfurt) was
quite harsh and Harm Osmers didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Omar Marmoush (Eintracht Frankfurt) receives
the ball inside the box, reacts quickly
and without any problems fires the ball
into the back of the net.

Here is a change after the half-time break.
Kevin Trapp is replaced by Kaua Santos (Eintracht
Frankfurt).

Ralph Hasenhuttl makes a half-time substitution.
Mohamed Amoura comes on in place of Salih
Ozcan (Wolfsburg).

Half-time substitution. Mario Gotze will
not participate anymore and Fares Chaibi
(Eintracht Frankfurt) is coming on.

Fares Chaibi (Eintracht Frankfurt) has tested
the patience of referee Harm Osmers and
goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Niels Nkounkou trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Ansgar Knauff
(Eintracht Frankfurt).

Ralph Hasenhuttl has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Jonas Wind (Wolfsburg)
replacing Tiago Tomas.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Patrick Wimmer as
he is replaced by Kevin Behrens (Wolfsburg).

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Mattias Svanberg walks off the pitch
to be replaced by Aster Vranckx (Wolfsburg).

It's time for a substitution. Igor Matanovic
(Eintracht Frankfurt) comes on in place
of Hugo Ekitike.

Ridle Baku (Wolfsburg) takes a great first
touch to control a killer pass on the edge
of the box and drills a shot into the bottom
right corner in trademark fashion.

Maximilian Arnold (Wolfsburg) is booked
after bringing down an opponent. Harm Osmers
had an easy-decision to make.

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Omar Marmoush (Eintracht Frankfurt) into
the left of the net, giving goalkeeper Kamil
Grabara no chance!

Substitution. Aurele Amenda (Eintracht Frankfurt)
on for Hugo Larsson.

Ralph Hasenhuttl decides to make a substitution.
Kilian Fischer will be replaced by Konstantinos
Koulierakis (Wolfsburg).

Goal! Karim Adeyemi plays a short, square
pass into the path of Donyell Malen (Dortmund),
who bends a shot low into the middle of
the goal to make it 1:0. Fabulous goal!

Goal! Julian Brandt displays great vision
and sends a pass to Karim Adeyemi (Dortmund),
who shows brilliant composure inside the
box to bury the ball into the bottom right
corner. The score is 2:0.

It's a goal! Marvin Pieringer (Heidenheim)
bravely launches himself at a cross from
Omar Haktab Traore and gives Gregor Kobel
no chance with a close-range bullet header
into the left of the goal. 2:1.

Goal Karim Adeyemi (Dortmund)! Karim Adeyemi
(Dortmund) was put through by Julian Ryerson
and he showed brilliant composure inside
the box to bury the ball into the back of
the net. 3:1.

Frank Schmidt makes a half-time substitution.
Sirlord Conteh comes on in place of Adrian
Beck (Heidenheim).

Substitution. Marcel Sabitzer (Dortmund)
on for Donyell Malen.

Robert Schroder shows a yellow card to Paul
Wanner (Heidenheim) for his blatant foul.

Celebrations are cut short for Dortmund
as the referee indicates NO GOAL after the
VAR review shows it was handball!

We are about to witness a subsitution. Mikkel
Kaufmann Sorensen (Heidenheim) for Marvin
Pieringer.

Frank Schmidt has decided to make a change.
Maximilian Breunig (Heidenheim) replaces
Paul Wanner.

That's the end of the game for Leo Scienza,
who is replaced by Niklas Dorsch (Heidenheim).

Nuri Sahin decides to make a substitution.
Serhou Guirassy will be replaced by Maximilian
Beier (Dortmund).

The substitution has been made. Yan Couto
(Dortmund) has replaced Ramy Bensebaini.

Goal! Maximilian Breunig (Heidenheim) wins
the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Gregor Kobel into right side
of the goal.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Julian Brandt walks off the pitch to
be replaced by Emre Can (Dortmund).

Here is a change. Karim Adeyemi is going
off and Nuri Sahin gives the last tactical
orders to Jamie Bynoe-Gittens (Dortmund).

Jamie Bynoe-Gittens (Dortmund) gets a yellow
card.

Mikkel Kaufmann Sorensen (Heidenheim) has
tested the patience of referee Robert Schroder
and goes into the book for a previous late
challenge.

Yan Couto (Dortmund) makes a bad challenge
and receives a yellow card. The referee
had no doubt.

Substitution. Lennard Maloney walks off
the pitch and Mathias Honsak (Heidenheim)
comes on as a substitute.

GOAL! Emre Can (Dortmund) takes a real chance,
but his low driven penalty into the middle
of the net fools Kevin Muller in goal.

The foul by Dayot Upamecano (Bayern Munich)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Christian Dingert.

Goal! Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) runs up
to the ball, stops and waits for Florian
Muller to commit before slotting the penalty
into the bottom right corner.

Vincent Kompany has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Kingsley Coman (Bayern
Munich) replacing Mathys Tel.

Substitution. Michael Olise is replaced
by Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Merlin Rohl departs the
field of play to be replaced by Eren Dinkci
(Freiburg).

Julian Schuster has decided to substitute
Vincenzo Grifo and he is replaced by Roland
Sallai (Freiburg).

Substitution. Lucas Holer (Freiburg) on
for Patrick Osterhage.

Vincent Kompany decides to make a substitution.
Jamal Musiala will be replaced by Konrad
Laimer (Bayern Munich).

Here comes a substitution. Joao Palhinha
(Bayern Munich) is brought on as a substitute
for Aleksandar Pavlovic.

Serge Gnabry sends a precise lofted cross
into the box. Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich)
latches on to it and finishes with a quick
shot into the top right corner. The goalkeeper
had no chance. The score changes to 2:0.

It's time for a substitution. Jordy Makengo
(Freiburg) comes on in place of Christian
Gunter.

Julian Schuster has decided to make a change.
Bruno Ogbus (Freiburg) replaces Lukas Kubler.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Dayot Upamecano leaves the
pitch and Leon Goretzka (Bayern Munich)
comes on.

Lucas Holer (Freiburg) misses the penalty!
His poor effort goes well over the crossbar.

Goal! Paul Wanner (Heidenheim) wins the
battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Nediljko Labrovic into right
side of the goal.

Leo Scienza (Heidenheim) reacts quickly
in the penalty area and scores with aplomb,
giving the goalkeeper no chance!

Lennard Maloney is substituted due to injury.
Frank Schmidt gives a chance to Luca Kerber
(Heidenheim).

Jeffrey Gouweleeuw (Augsburg) is yellow-carded
for breaking the rules of the game.

Jess Thorup makes a half-time substitution.
Marius Wolf (Augsburg) comes on in place
of Mads Pedersen.

The need to improve in the second half has
brought about a change. Fredrik Jensen comes
off for Ruben Vargas (Augsburg).

Substitution. Phillip Tietz did his best
and is replaced by Steve Mounie (Augsburg).

Here is a change. Tim Breithaupt is going
off and Jess Thorup gives the last tactical
orders to Mert Komur (Augsburg).

Keven Schlotterbeck (Augsburg) will have
to be careful for the rest of the match
as he is shown a yellow card.

Adrian Beck (Heidenheim) has a golden opportunity
after receiving a fantastic pass. He keeps
his cool and lashes the ball in off the
right post.
Caution goes to Elvis Rexhbecaj (Augsburg).

Frank Schmidt has decided to substitute
Paul Wanner and he is replaced by Sirlord
Conteh (Heidenheim).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Maximilian Breunig (Heidenheim)
will replace Marvin Pieringer.

Goal - 4:0! Sirlord Conteh laid the ball
off to Maximilian Breunig (Heidenheim),
who shot from close range low into the back
of the net, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

Jess Thorup has decided to make a change.
Kristijan Jakic (Augsburg) replaces Arne
Maier.

Leo Scienza goes off the pitch and Mathias
Honsak (Heidenheim) comes on.

Frank Schmidt has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Tim Siersleben (Heidenheim) replacing
Adrian Beck.

Mathias Honsak (Heidenheim) gets a yellow
card after the final whistle for unsporting
behaviour.

Having seen unsporting behavior, Martin
Petersen shows a yellow card to one of the
players sitting on the bench. And Ruben
Vargas (Augsburg) is the recipient.

Victor Boniface (Bayer Leverkusen) can count
himself lucky for not being sent off after
only receiving a caution from the referee.

Amadou Haidara is unable to continue after
that nasty looking head injury. Marco Rose
ushers on Nicolas Seiwald (RB Leipzig) to
replace him.

The referee gives a yellow card to Jeremie
Frimpong (Bayer Leverkusen).

Goal! Jeremie Frimpong (Bayer Leverkusen)
pounced on a loose ball inside the penalty
area and beats the goalkeeper with a shot
into the bottom right corner. He makes it
1:0.

It's in the back of the net! Florian Wirtz
sprays a pass out to Alejandro Grimaldo
(Bayer Leverkusen), and he has an easy job
to slot the ball into an empty net. The
score is 2:0.

Benjamin Henrichs produces a beautiful lofted
cross into the box, where Kevin Kampl (RB
Leipzig) rises high to head the ball into
the bottom left corner and beyond the goalkeeper.
He makes it 2:1.

Goal! Benjamin Sesko plays a pass to the
feet of Lois Openda (RB Leipzig), and he
shoots inside the left post from inside
the box. It's 2:2.

Lukas Klostermann (RB Leipzig) receives
a harsh yellow card from the referee after
committing a minor foul on his opponent.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Benjamin Sesko as
he is replaced by Antonio Nusa (RB Leipzig).

Xabi Alonso has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Amine Adli (Bayer Leverkusen)
replacing Martin Terrier.

It is time for a substitution. Patrik Schick
(Bayer Leverkusen) is on for Victor Boniface.

Here is a change. Jeremie Frimpong is going
off and Xabi Alonso gives the last tactical
orders to Nathan Tella (Bayer Leverkusen).

Goal! Antonio Nusa tees up Lois Openda (RB
Leipzig) on the edge of the box and he fires
the ball into the bottom left corner. 2:3.

Edmond Tapsoba (Bayer Leverkusen) was probably
a bit loose with his words to Matthias Jollenbeck,
who decides to show him a yellow.

It's time for a substitution. Arthur (Bayer
Leverkusen) comes on in place of Edmond
Tapsoba.

Today's match ends for Kevin Kampl who will
be replaced by Christoph Baumgartner (RB
Leipzig).

Marco Rose has decided to make a change.
Yussuf Poulsen (RB Leipzig) replaces Lois
Openda.

A substitution has been made. Benjamin Henrichs
goes off and Arthur Vermeeren (RB Leipzig)
comes on.

Here is a change after the half-time break.
Moritz Broschinski is replaced by Aliou
Balde (Bochum).

Peter Zeidler prepares a substitution. Anthony
Losilla is replaced by Myron Boadu (Bochum).

Philipp Hofmann comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Lukas Daschner (Bochum).

Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach) leaps
to connect with a delightful cross and places
his sweet header into the roof of the net.
The goalkeeper had no chance to make a save.

Gerardo Seoane has decided to substitute
Alassane Plea and he is replaced by Rocco
Reitz (B. Monchengladbach).

That's the end of the game for Philipp Sander,
who is replaced by Robin Hack (B. Monchengladbach).

Franck Honorat (B. Monchengladbach) received
a delightful pass inside the box before
slotting the ball past the goalkeeper. What
a brilliant finish!

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Ibrahima Sissoko leaves
the pitch and Mats Pannewig (Bochum) comes
on.

Here is a change. Jakov Medic is going off
and Peter Zeidler gives the last tactical
orders to Tim Oermann (Bochum).

Franck Honorat will be replaced by Nathan
Ngoumou (B. Monchengladbach).

Substitution. Tim Kleindienst will be replaced
by Tomas Cvancara (B. Monchengladbach).

Gerardo Seoane has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Stefan Lainer (B. Monchengladbach)
replacing Luca Netz.

The yellow card is received by Mats Pannewig
(Bochum).

Tim Drexler (Hoffenheim) has tested the
patience of referee Florian Badstubner and
goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

Goal - 1:0! Omar Marmoush tees up Hugo Ekitike
(Eintracht Frankfurt) inside the box and
he slams the ball past Oliver Baumann.

It's 2:0! Hugo Ekitike feeds Hugo Larsson
(Eintracht Frankfurt) inside the box, who
is unmarked and buries the ball in the bottom
left corner.

Pellegrino Matarazzo (Hoffenheim) picks
up a yellow card for unsporting behaviour
after the half-time whistle. He should have
gone straight into the dressing room instead.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Pellegrino Matarazzo probably
wasn't satisfied with the performance of
Tim Drexler. He is replaced by Robin Hranac
(Hoffenheim).

The game is over for Marius Bulter. Mergim
Berisha (Hoffenheim) comes on for the second
half.

Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) meets a perfect
cross from Adam Hlozek deep inside the box
and controls it with a nice first touch.
He produces an accurate strike into the
bottom left corner via the post. It's 2:1.

Goal - 3:1! Mario Gotze tees up Omar Marmoush
(Eintracht Frankfurt) inside the box and
he curls the ball into the left side of
the net and past Oliver Baumann.

Pellegrino Matarazzo has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Florian Micheler (Hoffenheim)
replacing Dennis Geiger.

The referee had an easy-decision to make.
A yellow card is given to Florian Micheler
(Hoffenheim) for a foul that he committed
a little earlier.

It is time for a substitution. Igor Matanovic
(Eintracht Frankfurt) is on for Hugo Ekitike.

Florian Badstubner shows a yellow card to
Kevin Akpoguma (Hoffenheim) for his blatant
foul.

Substitution. Alexander Prass will be replaced
by Jacob Bruun Larsen (Hoffenheim).

Dino Toppmoller has decided to substitute
Mario Gotze and he is replaced by Can Yilmaz
Uzun (Eintracht Frankfurt).

Substitution. Omar Marmoush is replaced

Mattias Svanberg (Wolfsburg) takes his opponent

Maximilian Arnold (Wolfsburg) can showcase

Sebastiaan Bornauw (Wolfsburg) celebrates

Patrick Wimmer (Wolfsburg) receives a yellow

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle

What was Kilian Fischer (Wolfsburg) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee

Marcel Rapp has decided to make a substitution

Alexander Bernhardsson (Holstein Kiel) goes

Tiago Tomas (Wolfsburg) is booked after

Magnus Knudsen (Holstein Kiel) makes a bad

Jann-Fiete Arp (Holstein Kiel) is given

Max Geschwill (Holstein Kiel) makes a really

Goal! Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart) has the

Goal! Jamie Leweling (VfB Stuttgart) weaves

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Atakan Karazor (VfB Stuttgart) was quite
harsh and Timo Gerach didn't hesitate to

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot

There will be a change on the pitch for

some space inside the box and lashes the
ball inside the right post. The score is
0:2.

Goal! Nico Elvedi (B. Monchengladbach) fires
the rebound low into the middle of the goal
after the ball breaks to him in the box.
The score is 1:2.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Jonas Hofmann leaves the
pitch and Martin Terrier (Bayer Leverkusen)
comes on.

Alassane Plea will be replaced by Tomas
Cvancara (B. Monchengladbach).

Here is a change. Rocco Reitz is going off
and Gerardo Seoane gives the last tactical
orders to Philipp Sander (B. Monchengladbach).

The manager makes a subsitution with Aleix
Garcia (Bayer Leverkusen) coming on for
Robert Andrich.

Xabi Alonso prepares a substitution. Victor
Boniface is replaced by Amine Adli (Bayer
Leverkusen).

Goal! Tim Kleindienst (B. Monchengladbach)
finds himself some space inside the box
to get on the end of a pass from Kevin Stoger,
then sends the ball into the bottom left
corner. 2:2.

Luca Netz goes off the pitch and Fabio Cristian
Chiarodia (B. Monchengladbach) comes on.

A substitution has been made. Franck Honorat
is replaced by Stefan Lainer (B. Monchengladbach).

Gerardo Seoane has decided to make a change.
Nathan Ngoumou (B. Monchengladbach) replaces
Tim Kleindienst.

Florian Wirtz (Bayer Leverkusen) places
the ball on the penalty spot and sends it
towards the bottom left corner. His effort
isn't powerful enough, allowing Jonas Omlin
to dive and keep the ball out with an excellent
save.

Goal! Florian Wirtz (Bayer Leverkusen) was
in the right place at the right time to
get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball into the middle of the net.
It's 2:3.

Stefan Lainer (B. Monchengladbach) is awarded
a yellow card. The referee showed him no
mercy.
